title: Traveling With Ai: A Comparison Of Ai Travel Planners
affiliations: University of Novi Sad

detail.title: Traveling With Ai: A Comparison Of Ai Travel Planners

publicationDetails.detailsText: Green Tourism Transitions – Collection of Papers, from the 20th CTTH Conference (Novi Sad, Nov 28–30, 2024), organized by the Faculty of Sciences, University of Novi Sad. ISBN: 978-86-7031-699-7. Publisher: Faculty of Sciences, University of Novi Sad.

detail.abstract: Artificial intelligence increasingly influences how we plan and experience travel in a dynamic digital environment. It is also being used more and more for planning tourist trips. Since artificial intelligence is still under development, research has been conducted to determine which available artificial intelligence is the most reliable for planning individual travel. To conduct this research, a case study was undertaken, focusing on planning a personalized trip to New York City from Belgrade. A comprehensive analysis of various AI-driven travel planners was conducted, considering both standalone AI applications and web-based platforms. These tools were assessed based on several key criteria: Planner Design: The user-friendliness, intuitiveness, and overall design of the interface; Chat Communication: The ability to interact with the AI through natural language processing, enabling real-time queries and personalized recommendations; Pre-Trip Itinerary Planning: The AI’s capacity to generate detailed itineraries, including suggested activities, attractions, and transportation options; Enriched Travel Experiences: The integration of multimedia content, such as videos and photos, to enhance the overall travel experience; Location Information and Time Estimates: The provision of comprehensive information about destinations, including descriptions, opening hours, and estimated visit durations; Transfer and Transportation Planning: The AI’s ability to suggest optimal transportation modes and routes between different locations; Meal Planning: Recommendations for dining options, including local cuisine, budget-friendly choices, and dietary preferences; Cost Planning: Estimated budgets for accommodation, transportation, food, and activities, helping travelers plan their expenses effectively; Language Support: The availability of AI in Serbian and other languages to cater to a diverse user base. By comparing the performance of these AI-powered travel planners, the study aims to identify the most reliable and user-friendly tools for individual travelers. While leading AI systems demonstrate high reliability in generating detailed itineraries and timetables, there are still areas for improvement, particularly in terms of accurate cost estimations. Inconsistent pricing information can lead to user distrust and the need for additional verification. This research contributes to a better understanding of the current state of AI-powered travel planning tools and provides insights for future developmenst and refinement of these technologies.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过案例研究评估了多种AI驱动的旅行规划工具，旨在确定最可靠的个性化旅行规划AI，重点关注用户友好性、功能性和语言支持等方面。
AI.research_question: 当前可用的AI工具中，哪种最适合用于个性化旅行规划？
AI.motivation: 随着AI在旅行规划中的应用日益增多，研究其可靠性和功能性对提升用户体验至关重要。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于用户友好性、自然语言处理、行程规划功能等多维度评估AI工具。
AI.method: 采用案例研究方法，分析多种AI驱动的旅行规划工具在纽约市旅行规划中的表现。
AI.findings: 领先的AI系统在生成详细行程和时间表方面表现可靠，但在成本估算准确性上仍有改进空间。
AI.theory_contributions: 研究为AI在旅行规划中的应用提供了实证基础，并提出了改进方向。
AI.practical_contributions: 为旅行者和开发者提供了选择和改进AI旅行规划工具的依据。

title: Halal Tourism in Bangladesh: An Exploratory Study on its Demand and Opportunities
affiliations: Noakhali Science and Technology University - Department of Tourism and Hospitality Management and Noakhali Science and Technology University

detail.title: Halal Tourism in Bangladesh: An Exploratory Study on its Demand and Opportunities
detail.abstract: Halal tourism is gaining significant attention within the tourism business and academia, recognized for its potential by the sector. This study aims to evaluate visitor awareness and motivations for halal travel in Bangladesh, measure halal-compliant facilities, understand sector barriers, and examine cultural, religious, and economic impacts. The goal is to suggest strategies for establishing Bangladesh as a leading halal travel destination and fostering stakeholder cooperation. The growth of halal tourism in Bangladesh is hindered by a lack of study on consumer perceptions, influencing factors, opportunities, and the inclusion of informal migrants, necessitating extensive scholarly investigation. Using qualitative methods, including interviews and focus groups, this study addresses these gaps and finds key insights into market demand and opportunities. Despite safety concerns and negative perceptions being the main obstacles, the sector shows promise, especially among youth who perceive halal tourism as secure and culturally resonant. Challenges include integrating cultural standards and ensuring effective certification methods. With Bangladesh's growing Muslim population, there are major growth prospects for halal tourism. However, addressing safety and cultural nuances is important for successful positioning.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨孟加拉国清真旅游的游客认知、动机及设施合规性，分析文化、宗教和经济影响，并提出发展策略。研究发现安全与文化整合是主要挑战，但青年市场潜力巨大。
AI.research_question: 如何评估孟加拉国清真旅游的游客认知、动机及设施合规性，并分析其文化、宗教和经济影响？
AI.motivation: 清真旅游在孟加拉国潜力巨大，但缺乏对消费者认知和影响因素的研究，阻碍了行业发展。
AI.theoretical_framework: 清真旅游理论、消费者行为理论、文化影响理论。
AI.method: 定性研究，包括访谈和焦点小组。
AI.findings: 安全和文化整合是主要障碍，但青年市场对清真旅游持积极态度。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了清真旅游在孟加拉国的研究空白，丰富了消费者行为和文化影响的理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为孟加拉国发展清真旅游提供了策略建议，促进利益相关者合作。

title: Back to School When Times are Bad? The Role of Housing Wealth
affiliations: European Central Bank (ECB) and TBS Business School

detail.title: Back to School When Times are Bad? The Role of Housing Wealth

publicationDetails.journalName: ECB: Working Paper Series (Topic)

detail.abstract: College enrolment typically rises during recessions. This paper demonstrates that housing wealth destruction dampened this countercyclical effect in areas most affected by the U.S. housing bust of 2008-2011. By combining household data with a mortgage credit register and housing price data, we reveal that negative shocks to housing wealth significantly reduced college enrolment among homeowners relative to renters during this period. Up to 2% of the local college-age population did not pursue college enrolment at the height of the bust due to housing wealth destruction. The negative impact of homeownership on college education persists for a decade, contributing to persistently lower incomes among homeowners in the most affected areas.

AI.tldr: 本文研究发现，2008-2011年美国房地产泡沫破裂期间，住房财富的破坏显著抑制了经济衰退时期大学入学率的上升趋势，导致受影响最严重地区的房主子女大学入学率下降，并对其长期收入产生负面影响。
AI.research_question: 住房财富破坏如何影响经济衰退时期的大学入学率？
AI.motivation: 探究房地产泡沫破裂对教育投资行为的长期影响，尤其是在经济衰退时期。
AI.theoretical_framework: 住房财富效应与教育投资决策的关系。
AI.method: 结合家庭数据、抵押贷款信用登记和房价数据进行分析。
AI.findings: 住房财富破坏导致房主子女大学入学率下降，最高影响达当地适龄人口的2%，且负面影响持续十年。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了住房财富对教育投资行为的长期影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于住房市场波动对教育不平等影响的实证依据。

title: Assessing Financial Performance
affiliations: Southern New Hampshire University

detail.title: Assessing Financial Performance
detail.abstract: This memorandum provides a detailed analysis of ABC Beauty Company Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to determine the success and efficiency of a proposed marketing and sales initiative to increase loyalty card memberships. The target demographic is neighborhoods with predominately low-income populations regardless of urban to rural community classification types. The analysis also provides data to demonstrate sustainability and growth for the initiative while meeting standards for Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR). A Multicapital Scorecard (MSC) (Thomas & MacElroy, 2015) that contextualizes the Triple Bottom Line (TBL) measuring the Three P’s (People, Profit and Planet), is attached to help determine efforts for a positive impact on vital capital of ABC.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了ABC美容公司的关键绩效指标（KPIs），以评估其营销和销售计划在低收入社区中推广会员卡的成效和效率，同时结合企业社会责任（CSR）标准，使用多资本计分卡（MSC）评估其对“三重底线”（TBL）的影响。
AI.research_question: 如何通过营销和销售计划在低收入社区中有效增加ABC美容公司的会员卡会员数量，并确保其符合企业社会责任（CSR）标准？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在验证营销计划在低收入社区中的可行性，同时确保其对社会、环境和经济的积极影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于三重底线理论（TBL）和多资本计分卡（MSC）框架，评估营销计划对“人、利润和地球”的影响。
AI.method: 通过分析ABC美容公司的关键绩效指标（KPIs），并结合多资本计分卡（MSC）进行定量评估。
AI.findings: 研究发现营销计划在低收入社区中具有潜力，能够同时实现会员增长和企业社会责任目标。
AI.theory_contributions: 研究扩展了三重底线理论（TBL）在营销领域的应用，并验证了多资本计分卡（MSC）的实用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为ABC美容公司提供了可操作的营销策略，确保其在低收入社区中的可持续发展和社会责任履行。

title: Empathic Algorithm Collaboration: Decision Augmentation for Socially Consequential Decision-Making
affiliations: University of Pittsburgh - University of Pittsburgh, Katz Graduate School of Business, Students, Arizona State University (ASU) - Department of Information Systems, Arizona State University - W. P. Carey School of Business and Arizona State University (ASU) - Department of Information Systems

detail.title: Empathic Algorithm Collaboration: Decision Augmentation for Socially Consequential Decision-Making
detail.abstract: The integration of artificial intelligence (AI) into decision-making systems presents new challenges for maintaining human intentionality, empathy, and accountability, particularly in socially consequential contexts where outcomes materially affect individuals’ lives. This study introduces a re-humanizing approach to AI-assisted decision-making by framing algorithmic collaboration through the lens of structural embeddedness, where AI is not simply a tool for optimization, but a socially situated actor in decision ecosystems. We propose Empathic Algorithm Collaboration (EAC) as a mechanism to restore individualized, ethically grounded consideration in human-AI decision environments. Drawing on theories of social empathy and person-situation interactionism, EAC consists of two key components – Interpersonal Perspective-Taking (IPT) and Contextual Understanding (CU) – which guide human evaluators to engage more reflectively with AI recommendations. Through a field experiment in a micro-lending context, we examine the impact of EAC on deliberative intensity and decision quality. Results show that EAC not only fosters more conscientious deliberation but also improves decision accuracy. Furthermore, differences in evaluator responses across borrower conditions suggest that person-situation interactionism plays a critical role in shaping the cognitive and ethical engagement of decision-makers. These findings highlight the potential of EAC to support human-centered, context-sensitive decision augmentation and contribute to a broader understanding of how AI can be aligned with social values in structurally embedded domains of socially consequential decision-making.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种“重新人性化”的AI辅助决策方法，通过“共情算法协作”（EAC）机制，结合人际视角转换和情境理解，提升决策质量和伦理考量。实验表明EAC能增强决策者的反思性，并提高决策准确性。
AI.research_question: 如何在AI辅助决策中恢复人类意图、共情和责任？
AI.motivation: AI在决策系统中的广泛应用可能削弱人类的情感和伦理考量，特别是在影响个体生活的社会性决策中。
AI.theoretical_framework: 社会共情理论、人与情境互动理论。
AI.method: 通过微贷款领域的实地实验，测试EAC对决策质量和反思强度的影响。
AI.findings: EAC不仅促进更谨慎的决策反思，还提高了决策准确性，且决策者反应因借款人情境而异。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了EAC机制，丰富了AI与人类决策协作的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为设计更具伦理和社会敏感性的AI辅助决策系统提供了实践指导。

title: Development of a Private Blockchain-Based Framework for Digital Asset Management and Authentication within Industrial Metaverses
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Development of a Private Blockchain-Based Framework for Digital Asset Management and Authentication within Industrial Metaverses
detail.abstract: This paper presents a novel approach for secure and efficient digital asset management and authentication in industrial metaverses using private blockchain (BC) technology. Industrial metaverses represent the next evolution of cyber-physical systems (CPS), integrating physical assets with their digital twins (DTs) for enhanced monitoring, simulation, and control. However, ensuring the integrity and security of critical digital assets within these environments remains a key challenge. To address this, we propose a private BC architecture based on Hyperledger Fabric, specifically designed to authenticate and manage digital assets in real time.The proposed framework features three layers: (1) a private BC network for secure transaction handling, (2) an API bridging layer enabling cross-platform integration, and (3) a Unity-based industrial metaverse application for user interaction. Through smart contracts (Chaincode), the framework manages digital asset creation, modification, deletion, and authentication, ensuring tamper-proof records and robust traceability. Performance evaluation using Hyperledger Caliper demonstrates the system's high throughput (up to 2500 TPS for read operations) and low latency (<0.03s) with no upfront costs, significantly outperforming public blockchain alternatives in performance and cost.A case study involving a physical production workshop validates the framework’s feasibility. The results show that the framework can securely manage and authenticate all digital assets within an industrial metaverse. Compared to public BCs, the proposed private BC approach eliminates transaction fees and supports real-time digital asset management and authentication. This establishes private BCs as a secure and cost-effective foundation for trustworthy digital asset management and digital transformation in industrial environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于私有区块链（Hyperledger Fabric）的新方法，用于工业元宇宙中数字资产的安全高效管理和认证。通过三层架构（私有区块链网络、API桥接层和Unity应用），结合智能合约，实现了高吞吐量、低延迟且无交易费用的解决方案，显著优于公有区块链。
AI.research_question: 如何在工业元宇宙中实现安全、高效的数字资产管理和认证？
AI.motivation: 工业元宇宙作为网络物理系统（CPS）的演进，需要确保关键数字资产的完整性和安全性，但目前仍存在挑战。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于私有区块链（Hyperledger Fabric）和智能合约（Chaincode）的理论框架。
AI.method: 提出三层架构：私有区块链网络、API桥接层和Unity应用，并通过Hyperledger Caliper进行性能评估。
AI.findings: 系统具有高吞吐量（2500 TPS）和低延迟（<0.03s），无交易费用，且通过案例研究验证了可行性。
AI.theory_contributions: 为工业元宇宙中的数字资产管理和认证提供了私有区块链的理论基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出了一种低成本、高效的解决方案，支持实时数字资产管理和认证，适用于工业环境的数字化转型。

title: From Gamification to Gamblification? Exploring Hedonic Adaptation Traps for Gamified Lottery in Livestreaming Industry
affiliations: City University of Hong Kong (CityU) - Department of Information Systems, City University of Hong Kong and The Hong Kong Polytechnic University

detail.title: From Gamification to Gamblification? Exploring Hedonic Adaptation Traps for Gamified Lottery in Livestreaming Industry
detail.abstract: In the fierce competition among hosts on livestreaming platforms, gamified chance-based rewards (i.e., gamified lotteries) stand out as a distinct mechanism to enhance audience engagement and revenue generation. This study presents an investigation into the instant effects versus slope effects of gamified lotteries on pay-as-you-wish (PAYW) gifting and audience engagement in the entertaining livestreaming industry. Employing a quasi-experimental design, the research utilizes an interrupted time series analysis with a reversed treatment design (ITS-RTD) to capitalize on an unexpected suspension and subsequent reintroduction of the lottery function on a leading livestreaming platform in China. Our findings reveal that the implementation of gamified lottery correlates with a short-term increase of 14% in host income and a 10% rise in audience engagement. However, based on the hedonic adaptation theory, our findings also highlight the double-edged nature of lotteries, indicating the risks of over-reliance on gamified elements that can lead to a hedonic adaptation trap. The impacting mechanisms incorporate perspectives from traffic transference and hedonic adaptation, offering insights into the nuanced impact of gamified lotteries while suggesting a balanced approach for hosts to leverage gamification alongside other engagement strategies to mitigate the risks of over-dependence.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了直播平台中游戏化抽奖对观众参与和收入的即时与长期影响，发现短期收益显著但存在享乐适应陷阱。
AI.research_question: 游戏化抽奖对直播平台中观众打赏和参与度的即时效应与斜率效应有何影响？
AI.motivation: 直播平台竞争激烈，游戏化抽奖作为一种独特机制，其效果和潜在风险值得研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 享乐适应理论、流量转移视角。
AI.method: 采用准实验设计，利用中断时间序列分析（ITS-RTD）研究抽奖功能暂停与重新引入的影响。
AI.findings: 游戏化抽奖短期内使主播收入增加14%，观众参与度提升10%，但存在享乐适应陷阱风险。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了游戏化抽奖的双刃剑效应，丰富了享乐适应理论的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议主播平衡使用游戏化策略，避免过度依赖抽奖机制。

title: Stealthdev: Side-Channel-Resistant Forensic Framework for Investigating Websites with Anti-Debugging
affiliations: IIT Delhi and IIT Delhi

detail.title: Stealthdev: Side-Channel-Resistant Forensic Framework for Investigating Websites with Anti-Debugging
detail.abstract: The analysis of JavaScript within websites is a foundational step in web security analysis. One of the most powerful tools available for such an analysis is the browser's integrated developer tools (DevTools), which provide deep visibility into the client-side code execution. However, sophisticated malicious websites often employ anti-debugging techniques to detect the presence of such tools and alter their behavior to appear benign. Prior research into such polymorphic sites has focused mainly on isolated client-side detection vectors, those that operate independently within the browser without requiring any coordination from the server. In this work, we argue that collusive vectors, which involve explicit communication between the client and an attacker-controlled server, are common, highly effective, and stealthy. These collusive client-attacker techniques evade detection by minimizing observable client-side artifacts, making them particularly challenging to analyze. Furthermore, despite the growing prevalence of such tactics, the security community still lacks a comprehensive framework to counter these anti-debugging tactics effectively.In this paper, we examine the prevalence of isolated and collusive anti-debugging vectors and then develop a solution that enables stealthy analysis of websites. First, we introduce a novel class of anti-debugging techniques in which adversaries exploit debugger-related resource requests, such as those for source maps or debugging symbols, initiated by the browser to detect DevTools. This mechanism allows attackers to detect the presence of active debuggers with a minimal client-side footprint. Through a large-scale analysis of the top 100,000 websites and their subpages, we find that approximately 1 in 17 websites employing severe anti-debugging measures leverage such collusive vectors to identify and obstruct DevTools-based analysis. Second, to defend against these threats, we present StealthDev, a policy-driven debugging framework built on a modified Chromium browser. StealthDev is specifically designed to remain stealthy and resilient against isolated and collusive anti-debugging techniques, including those relying on timing side channels. Our evaluation shows that StealthDev  successfully bypasses anti-debugging defenses on over 97% of the most evasive websites, while incurring a modest performance overhead of just 5% on average page load times.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了JavaScript在网站安全分析中的重要性，重点关注了反调试技术的演变，尤其是客户端与攻击者服务器协同的隐蔽技术。通过大规模分析，发现此类技术广泛存在，并提出了一种名为StealthDev的解决方案，有效抵御这些威胁。
AI.research_question: 如何有效检测和防御网站中客户端与攻击者服务器协同的反调试技术？
AI.motivation: 现有的反调试研究主要关注独立的客户端检测向量，而忽视了客户端与攻击者服务器协同的隐蔽技术，这些技术更难以检测和分析。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于反调试技术的分类（独立向量与协同向量），提出了协同向量在隐蔽性和有效性上的理论优势。
AI.method: 通过大规模分析（前10万个网站及其子页面）验证协同反调试技术的普遍性，并开发了StealthDev框架（基于修改的Chromium浏览器）进行防御。
AI.findings: 约1/17的严重反调试网站采用协同向量；StealthDev能绕过97%的高隐蔽性网站的反调试防御，性能开销仅为5%。
AI.theory_contributions: 首次系统分析了协同反调试技术的普遍性和隐蔽性，填补了安全社区在此领域的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出的StealthDev框架为安全分析人员提供了有效的工具，能够在不被检测的情况下分析恶意网站。

title: Cybersecurity and Uavs: A Resilience Perspective
affiliations: Polytechnic University of Milan, Polytechnic University of Milan, Qatar University, Qatar University and University of Denver

detail.title: Cybersecurity and Uavs: A Resilience Perspective
detail.abstract: The rapid advancement of Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) technology has the potential to revolutionise industries such as logistics, surveillance, and disaster management, offering transformative operational capabilities. However, the growing capacities of UAVs have introduced significant cybersecurity challenges that threaten their operational integrity and reliability, preventing them from reaching the potential that technological progress has made possible. Through a systematic mapping review this study identifies and analyses these challenges, highlighting critical vulnerabilities associated with communication systems, data integrity, physical and remote threats, software weaknesses, and regulatory compliance gaps. Developing a resilience framework grounded in the principles of redundancy, flexibility, modularity, diversity, and tightness of feedback loops, the study offers insights into countering these vulnerabilities and enhancing the capacity of UAVs to withstand unforeseen disturbances. The findings demonstrate the urgency of developing a robust cyber-resilience framework that integrates advanced security measures, standardised regulations, and collaborative efforts among stakeholders to address both current and emerging threats. By linking key cybersecurity challenges to core resilience attributes, this research establishes an essential foundation for strengthening the security of UAVs and subsequently their increased secure deployment across various domains.

AI.tldr: 本文通过系统性映射综述，识别并分析了无人机（UAV）技术快速发展带来的网络安全挑战，提出了基于冗余、灵活性、模块化、多样性和紧密反馈循环的韧性框架，以增强无人机抵御干扰的能力。
AI.research_question: 无人机技术快速发展带来的网络安全挑战是什么？如何通过韧性框架应对这些挑战？
AI.motivation: 无人机技术的快速发展为物流、监控和灾害管理等领域带来变革性能力，但其网络安全挑战威胁了其操作完整性和可靠性，阻碍了其潜力的实现。
AI.theoretical_framework: 韧性框架（基于冗余、灵活性、模块化、多样性和紧密反馈循环原则）
AI.method: 系统性映射综述

title: Infrastructure Economics of Sparse Mixture-of-Experts in Cloud-Native NLP: Benchmarking Cost, Accuracy, and Performance
affiliations: Microsoft Research

detail.title: Infrastructure Economics of Sparse Mixture-of-Experts in Cloud-Native NLP: Benchmarking Cost, Accuracy, and Performance
detail.abstract: As natural language processing (NLP) models grow in size and complexity, the cost and infrastructure demands of training and serving dense transformer architectures have become a significant barrier. Sparse Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) architectures offer a promising alternative by enabling conditional computation—activating only a subset of model parameters per input—thereby dramatically improving computational efficiency without compromising model quality. This paper investigates the infrastructure economics of sparse MoE architectures in cloud-native environments, with a focus on benchmarking their cost, performance, and accuracy across major platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. It presents a comparative analysis of leading MoE models including Switch Transformer, GLaM, DeepSpeed-MoE, and Mixtral-8x7B, highlighting their ability to achieve state-of-the-art results at a fraction of the resource consumption. The study also explores deployment challenges, such as load balancing, memory constraints, and software tooling, and discusses optimizations that enable scalable, cost-effective NLP systems. Through empirical benchmarks and real-world case studies, this paper illustrates how MoE architectures are reshaping the economics of large-scale NLP and paving the way for more sustainable and accessible AI development in the cloud.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了稀疏混合专家（MoE）架构在云原生环境中的基础设施经济学，比较了其在AWS、Google Cloud和Microsoft Azure等平台上的成本、性能和准确性，并分析了部署挑战与优化策略。
AI.research_question: 稀疏MoE架构如何在云原生环境中优化成本、性能和准确性？
AI.motivation: 随着NLP模型规模和复杂度的增加，密集Transformer架构的训练和服务成本成为重要障碍，稀疏MoE架构提供了一种高效替代方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 稀疏混合专家（MoE）架构、条件计算理论、云计算经济学。
AI.method: 通过实证基准测试和真实案例研究，比较AWS、Google Cloud和Microsoft Azure平台上MoE模型的成本、性能和准确性。
AI.findings: 稀疏MoE架构（如Switch Transformer、GLaM等）能以较低资源消耗实现最先进的结果。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了稀疏MoE架构在云计算环境中的经济性和性能优势。
AI.practical_contributions: 为大规模NLP系统提供了可扩展、经济高效的部署优化策略。

title: Entrepreneurs’ Willingness to Use Crowdfunding Mediated by a Social Network: What Influences, What Matters, and What is Necessary
affiliations: Universidad de San Buenaventura - Cali, Institución Universitaria Antonio José Camacho and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Entrepreneurs’ Willingness to Use Crowdfunding Mediated by a Social Network: What Influences, What Matters, and What is Necessary
detail.abstract: The aim of this research is to contribute to the survival of entrepreneurial ventures. In Colombia, the business failure rate before five years of operation reaches 70% (Confecamaras, 2025), with lack of financing and investors being one of the main international causes of closure (47%)  (Growth List, 2025). Crowdfunding emerges as an alternative for entrepreneurs to secure funding or investors for their projects. This study explores entrepreneurs' willingness to use crowdfunding, incorporating the mediating role of a business social network—previously an unexplored gap in research—and complementing the significance analysis with Importance-Performance Map Analysis (IPMA) and Necessary Condition Analysis (NCA), to identify the thresholds at which variables become necessary conditions for adopting crowdfunding as a financial alternative. Data were analyzed using SMART-PLS software and its IPMA and NCA tools. Key findings highlight that having a financial or business-oriented social network is significant, important, and necessary to support entrepreneurs in their willingness to use crowdfunding platforms. Results also reaffirm previous research on the significance of trust in crowdfunding platforms, financial education, perceived usefulness, and ease of use. Additionally, The Conclusion states that while these variables significantly influence entrepreneurs' willingness to adopt crowdfunding, they differ in levels of performance, importance, and necessity.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了企业家使用众筹的意愿，发现商业社交网络是关键因素，同时验证了信任、金融教育等因素的重要性。
AI.research_question: 企业家使用众筹平台的意愿受哪些因素影响？
AI.motivation: 哥伦比亚创业企业五年内失败率达70%，缺乏资金是主要原因，众筹成为潜在解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究结合商业社交网络的中介作用，并采用IPMA和NCA分析方法。
AI.method: 使用SMART-PLS软件及其IPMA和NCA工具分析数据。
AI.findings: 商业社交网络对企业家使用众筹意愿具有显著、重要且必要的影响；信任、金融教育等因素也得到验证。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了商业社交网络在众筹研究中中介作用的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业家和政策制定者提供了众筹采纳的关键因素和必要条件。

title: Ccipos: A Clustering-Aided and Center-Connected Interpolation Method for Wifi Fingerprinting
affiliations: Hunan University, Hunan University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Dalat University, Hallym University and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Ccipos: A Clustering-Aided and Center-Connected Interpolation Method for Wifi Fingerprinting
detail.abstract: WiFi Fingerprinting has become a popular solution for indoor positioning due to its cost-effectiveness. However, achieving high accuracy and stability requires extensive data collection from densely distributed reference points (RPs), which can be resource-intensive. Interpolation is a common technique that helps increase the number of RPs without incurring excessive costs. Nonetheless, generating the locations for interpolated points, i.e., virtual reference points (VRPs), can be a big challenge since it might affect the positioning results. This paper proposes a novel method that uses a hybrid clustering algorithm combined with a center-connected interpolation approach (CCIPOS) to automatically and efficiently generate VRPs, adapting to irregular RP distribution. First, the method uses the two-phase clustering algorithm including the k-means algorithm and Voronoi diagram to group the RPs in the fingerprinting database (DB) with similar characteristics to the same cluster. Then, VRP locations within each cluster are estimated using a proposed center-connected algorithm. To fulfill the WiFi data at each VRP, Inverse Distance Weighting, a simple but effective interpolation method, is applied. From the experimental results based on the public datasets, it is demonstrated that the CCIPOS method effectively generates more VRPs into the original fingerprinting DB but reduces much time for finding the user’s position. To be specific, CCIPOS increases the total number of RPs in the DB by about seven times on average, increases the positioning accuracy by up to 6%, and decreases the computation time by nearly 90%. This study illustrates the feasibility of enhancing the WiFi fingerprint DB, particularly in large and complex environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结合混合聚类算法和中心连接插值方法（CCIPOS）的新方法，用于高效生成虚拟参考点（VRPs），以提高WiFi指纹定位的准确性和效率。实验结果表明，该方法显著增加了参考点数量，提升了定位精度，并大幅减少了计算时间。
AI.research_question: 如何在WiFi指纹定位中高效生成虚拟参考点（VRPs），以提高定位准确性和减少资源消耗？
AI.motivation: WiFi指纹定位需要密集分布的参考点（RPs），但数据收集成本高。插值技术可以增加RPs数量，但生成虚拟参考点的位置可能影响定位结果。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于k-means聚类算法和Voronoi图的两阶段聚类方法，以及中心连接插值算法（CCIPOS）。
AI.method: 1. 使用k-means和Voronoi图对指纹数据库中的RPs进行聚类；2. 在每个聚类内使用中心连接算法生成VRPs；3. 应用逆距离加权法填充VRPs的WiFi数据。
AI.findings: CCIPOS方法将指纹数据库中的RPs数量平均增加7倍，定位精度提高6%，计算时间减少近90%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合聚类和插值的新方法，为WiFi指纹定位中的虚拟参考点生成提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 该方法显著提高了定位系统的效率和准确性，适用于大规模复杂环境中的WiFi指纹定位。

title: Words Meet Photos: How Visual Content Impact Rating
affiliations: Harbin Institute of Technology - School of Management, Harbin Institute of Technology, University of Macau and Harbin Institute of Technology

detail.title: Words Meet Photos: How Visual Content Impact Rating
detail.abstract: The fit information of multi-modal user-generated content has its unique value. In this study, the authors investigate how fit between photos and text within a hotel review influences tourist rating behavior. Employing deep learning technologies and econometric analysis shows that the fit between photos and text has an inverted U-shape effect on tourists' rating using online hotel review data from Qunar.com. The dispersion of rating and the number of reviews can weaken above effect due to the varying amount of cognitive resources possessed by tourists. Endogeneity bias from text and photos are excluded by conducting the two-stage residual analysis. The information uncertainty reduction mechanism is tested between phototext fit and ratings. Theoretical and practical implication are discussed.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了酒店评论中照片与文本的契合度如何影响游客评分行为，发现契合度对评分呈倒U型影响，且评分分散度和评论数量会削弱此效应。
AI.research_question: 酒店评论中照片与文本的契合度如何影响游客的评分行为？
AI.motivation: 多模态用户生成内容（如照片与文本的契合度）具有独特价值，但其对评分行为的影响尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信息不确定性减少机制；认知资源理论。
AI.method: 采用深度学习技术和计量经济学分析，使用Qunar.com的在线酒店评论数据，并通过两阶段残差分析排除内生性偏差。
AI.findings: 照片与文本的契合度对游客评分呈倒U型影响；评分分散度和评论数量会削弱此效应。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了信息不确定性减少机制在照片与文本契合度与评分关系中的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为酒店和平台优化用户生成内容提供了实践指导。

title: Decoupling an Ifc Model Before Making Modification
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Tsinghua University and Tsinghua University

detail.title: Decoupling an Ifc Model Before Making Modification
detail.abstract: - This paper explains how the effect of modification is transmitted in the IFC data structure and why the shared references may cause unexpected changes.- The definition of a decoupling-modification task is proposed with the required input and output specifications.- The IFCDecoupling algorithm is proposed to redirect the shared references to ensure that the modification may only affect the user-required references.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了IFC数据结构中修改效果的传递机制及共享引用可能导致意外变更的原因，提出了解耦修改任务的定义及输入输出规范，并提出了IFCDecoupling算法以重定向共享引用，确保修改仅影响用户所需的引用。
AI.research_question: IFC数据结构中修改效果的传递机制是什么？共享引用为何可能导致意外变更？
AI.motivation: 理解IFC数据结构中修改的传播机制，解决共享引用导致的意外变更问题。
AI.theoretical_framework: IFC数据结构、共享引用机制、解耦理论。
AI.method: 提出解耦修改任务的定义及规范，开发IFCDecoupling算法。
AI.findings: IFCDecoupling算法能有效重定向共享引用，确保修改仅影响目标引用。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了解耦修改任务的理论框架和IFCDecoupling算法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为IFC数据结构中的修改操作提供了实用工具，减少意外变更风险。

title: Climate Change, Firms, and Aggregate Productivity
affiliations: Universitat Pompeu Fabra (UPF) - Department of Economics and Business (DEB), University of Oxford, Stockholm School of Economics and ESADE Business School

detail.title: Climate Change, Firms, and Aggregate Productivity

publicationDetails.journalName: ECB: Working Paper Series (Topic)

detail.abstract: This paper uses a general equilibrium framework to examine the effects of temperature on firm-level demand, productivity, and input allocation efficiency, deriving an aggregate damage function for climate change. Using data from Italian firms and detailed climate data, it uncovers a sizable negative effect of extreme temperatures on firm-level productivity and revenue-based marginal product of capital. Based on these estimates, the model generates aggregate productivity losses from local temperature fluctuations that are higher than previously thought, ranging from 0.60 to 6.82 percent depending on the scenario and the extent of adaptation. Notably, these losses are approximately four times greater than those estimated by averaging firm-level losses in a representative firm model, which does not capture frictions that alter allocative efficiency in a heterogeneous firm setting. Therefore, incorporating our framework into Integrated Assessment Models is likely to revise upwards the estimated economic costs of climate change.

AI.tldr: 本文通过一般均衡框架研究温度对企业需求、生产率和投入分配效率的影响，并推导出气候变化的总体损害函数。研究发现极端温度对企业生产率和资本边际产出有显著负面影响，且总体生产率损失高于以往估计。
AI.research_question: 温度如何影响企业层面的需求、生产率和投入分配效率？
AI.motivation: 探讨气候变化对企业经济活动的具体影响，填补现有研究中对异质性企业环境下分配效率摩擦的忽视。
AI.theoretical_framework: 一般均衡框架，结合企业异质性理论。
AI.method: 使用意大利企业数据和详细气候数据，通过模型估计极端温度的影响。
AI.findings: 极端温度显著降低企业生产率和资本边际产出，总体生产率损失在0.60%至6.82%之间，高于代表性企业模型的估计。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种更准确的框架来估计气候变化的经济成本，强调分配效率摩擦的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究结果建议将新框架纳入综合评估模型，以更准确地评估气候变化的经济影响。

title: Dynamic Scharr-Gaussian Learning with Skeletal Topology Awareness for Camouflaged Object Detection
affiliations: Northeast Petroleum University, Xinjiang University, Northeast Petroleum University and Northeast Petroleum University

detail.title: Dynamic Scharr-Gaussian Learning with Skeletal Topology Awareness for Camouflaged Object Detection
detail.abstract: Existing camouflaged object detection (COD) models often struggle with inadequate modeling of target topological structures, semantic features that are compromised by background noise and almost methods typically depend on independent edge extraction modules to capture edge cues, resulting in the loss of essential features and information fragmentation. However, this paper proposes a novel Dynamic Scharr-Gaussian Learning with Skeletal Topology Awareness Network (DSLSTA), which enhances the model’s ability to perceive target structures and edges through multi-stage feature interaction and adaptive filtering. First, we design a Skeleton Extraction Network to generate precise skeleton labels that represent the core topological structure of the targets. Second, we propose a Stage-Adaptive Dual-Filter Module (SADFM) that utilizes Scharr and Gaussian filters to dynamically smooth target regions based on variance estimation while preserving sharp edge details. This approach effectively suppresses background noise and improves the accuracy of the boundary. Furthermore, we construct a Cross-Stage Skeleton-Driven Interaction Module (CSSDIM) to progressively integrate skeleton information into multi-scale semantic features, allowing the network to perceive internal target structures and enhance global consistency. Extensive experiments on three COD benchmark datasets demonstrate that DSLSTA outperforms 13 state-of-the-art (SOTA) models, achieving average improvements of 4.05%, 3.32%, 11.14% and 23.81% in Sα, Eϕ, Fβ ω and M, respectively. These results validate the effectiveness of skeleton guidance and adaptive filtering mechanisms  in complex camouflage scenarios. The code will be published after the article is accepted.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新型动态Scharr-Gaussian学习与骨骼拓扑感知网络（DSLSTA），通过多阶段特征交互和自适应滤波增强模型对目标结构和边缘的感知能力，显著提升了伪装目标检测的性能。
AI.research_question: 如何通过增强目标拓扑结构和边缘感知能力来提升伪装目标检测模型的性能？
AI.motivation: 现有伪装目标检测模型在目标拓扑结构建模和语义特征提取方面存在不足，且依赖独立的边缘提取模块导致信息丢失和碎片化。
AI.theoretical_framework: 动态Scharr-Gaussian学习、骨骼拓扑感知网络、多阶段特征交互、自适应滤波。
AI.method: 设计了骨骼提取网络生成精确的骨骼标签，提出阶段自适应双滤波模块（SADFM）和跨阶段骨骼驱动交互模块（CSSDIM）。
AI.findings: 在三个COD基准数据集上，DSLSTA优于13个SOTA模型，平均性能提升显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了骨骼引导和自适应滤波机制的理论框架，增强了模型对复杂伪装场景的感知能力。
AI.practical_contributions: 为伪装目标检测任务提供了一种更高效的方法，代码将在文章接受后公开。

title: Violent Backlash to Political Reform: Evidence from Anti-Jewish Pogroms in the 1905 Russian Revolution
affiliations: University of Wisconsin-Madison, University of Chicago, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Department of Economics and Stanford University

detail.title: Violent Backlash to Political Reform: Evidence from Anti-Jewish Pogroms in the 1905 Russian Revolution

publicationDetails.detailsText: University of Chicago, Becker Friedman Institute for Economics Working Paper No. 2025-96
publicationDetails.journalName: Becker Friedman Institute for Economics Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: Local violence often accompanies momentous political change, as feelings of political threat intersect with preexisting prejudices to endanger groups popularly associated with reform. We examine the relationship between such violence and settlement characteristics in the context of the 1905 Russian Revolution, which triggered numerous anti-Jewish pogroms. Counter to an extensive literature that emphasizes the contribution to conflict of ethno-religious polarization, we show that the sharp increase in pogroms after October 1905, when publication of the October Manifesto and accompanying anti-Semitic propaganda increased feelings of political threat among many non-Jews, was smaller in settlements with relatively large Jewish populations. We demonstrate that this empirical pattern can be rationalized with an elaborated version of the Esteban-Ray (2008) model of diversity and conflict when, as with the October Manifesto, political reform systematically alters the distribution of benefits across groups.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了1905年俄国革命期间反犹太暴力事件与定居点特征的关系，发现犹太人比例较高的地区暴力事件增加较少，挑战了传统关于种族宗教极化导致冲突的观点。
AI.research_question: 1905年俄国革命期间，反犹太暴力事件与定居点特征之间的关系是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨政治变革如何通过改变群体间利益分配影响暴力冲突，挑战传统关于种族宗教极化导致冲突的观点。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Esteban-Ray（2008）的多样性与冲突模型，结合政治改革对群体利益分配的影响。
AI.method: 利用历史数据，分析1905年俄国革命期间反犹太暴力事件与犹太人比例的关系。
AI.findings: 犹太人比例较高的定居点在政治威胁增加时，暴力事件增加较少。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了Esteban-Ray模型，提出政治改革对群体利益分配的影响是冲突的关键因素。
AI.practical_contributions: 为理解政治变革期间的暴力冲突提供了新视角，挑战了传统极化理论。

title: Parental Attitudes Toward Childhood Vaccination in Madinah, Saudi Arabia: A Cross-Sectional Study
affiliations: Ministry of Health, Saudi Arabia and Ministry of Health, Saudi Arabia

detail.title: Parental Attitudes Toward Childhood Vaccination in Madinah, Saudi Arabia: A Cross-Sectional Study

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare no conflict of interest.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Ethical approval was obtained from the Ministry of Health Institutional Review Board (IRB), Saudi Arabia (Reference No. 2024-1601). Written informed consent was provided by participants.
declarations.funderStatement: This research received no external funding.

detail.abstract: Background: Vaccine hesitancy remains a significant barrier to achieving optimal immunization coverage, particularly among parents who make critical vaccination decisions for their children. Despite high vaccination rates in Saudi Arabia, regional variations in vaccine confidence persist. This study aimed to assess the prevalence and determinants of vaccine hesitancy among parents in Madinah using the validated Parent Attitudes About Childhood Vaccines (PACV) survey. Methods: A cross-sectional study was conducted among 322 parents in Madinah, Saudi Arabia. Vaccine hesitancy was assessed using the Arabic version of the PACV (score ≥50 indicating hesitancy). Receiver operating characteristic (ROC) analysis evaluated model discrimination (AUC = 0.561, 95% CI). Logistic regression identified predictors of hesitancy while adjusting for sociodemographic factors. Results: The study revealed a high prevalence of vaccine hesitancy (73.9%, 238/322 parents). Significant occupational disparities were observed: healthcare workers exhibited markedly lower hesitancy (15.5%, 11/71) compared to non-healthcare parents (70.9%, 178/251; χ² = 5.302, p = 0.021). Logistic regression identified healthcare occupation as the sole significant predictor of reduced hesitancy (OR = 0.16, 95% CI 0.07-0.36, p < 0.001). No significant associations were found between hesitancy and age, gender, education level, marital status, or income (p > 0.05 for all). The model demonstrated good fit (Hosmer-Lemeshow χ² = 7.816, p = 0.045) but moderate discrimination (AUC = 0.561), suggesting additional unmeasured factors influence hesitancy. Conclusion: Vaccine hesitancy is highly prevalent among parents in Madinah, with healthcare workers demonstrating significantly greater vaccine confidence. These findings highlight the need for targeted interventions that focus on non-healthcare parents while leveraging healthcare professionals as trusted advocates. Future research should explore specific reasons for hesitancy to inform culturally tailored public health strategies in this region.

AI.tldr: 本研究评估了沙特阿拉伯麦地那地区父母对疫苗犹豫的普遍性及其决定因素，发现疫苗犹豫率高达73.9%，医疗工作者显著低于非医疗工作者。
AI.research_question: 麦地那地区父母对疫苗犹豫的普遍性及其决定因素是什么？
AI.motivation: 尽管沙特阿拉伯疫苗接种率高，但地区间疫苗信心存在差异，需针对性干预。
AI.theoretical_framework: 使用验证过的PACV量表评估疫苗犹豫。
AI.method: 横断面研究，322名父母参与，逻辑回归分析预测因素。
AI.findings: 疫苗犹豫率73.9%，医疗工作者显著低于非医疗工作者（15.5% vs 70.9%）。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了PACV量表在阿拉伯语环境中的适用性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议针对非医疗父母设计干预措施，并利用医疗工作者作为信任倡导者。

title: Biodiversity Risk, Corporate Governance, and Firm Performance: Empirical Evidence from China

detail.title: Biodiversity Risk, Corporate Governance, and Firm Performance: Empirical Evidence from China
detail.abstract: We examined the relationship between China corporate biodiversity risk exposure, corporate governance attributes and firm performance in Chinese A share listed companies from 2014 to 2022. The findings of panel baseline regression models indicate negative and significant link between biodiversity risk and firm performance i.e Tobin’s q and returns on assets. Similarly, the outcomes showed negative and significant relationship between biodiversity risk and board size, board independence and institutional ownership while positive for auditor tenure. The findings still hold after the robustness and endogeneity tests using other models and instrumental variables approach. The results have implications for the policy makers, businesses, investors.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了中国A股上市公司2014-2022年间生物多样性风险暴露、公司治理属性与企业绩效的关系。结果显示生物多样性风险与企业绩效（托宾Q和资产回报率）呈显著负相关，且与董事会规模、独立性和机构持股也呈负相关，但与审计任期呈正相关。

title: Disseration on the Role of Leadership in Fostering Innovations in Startups

detail.title: Disseration on the Role of Leadership in Fostering Innovations in Startups
detail.abstract: Creativity is an important aspect in startup success, and strong leadership is vital for developing an environment that promotes creation and ongoing growth. The main leadership characteristics and tactics that encourage creativity in startup ecosystems are examined in this research. It is being determined that startups need leadership that is innovative, flexibility, and a risk-taking mentality in order to effectively face uncertainty while creating groundbreaking solutions. likewise transformational leadership is especially good at fostering an innovative culture since it encourages and inspires teams with a common objective. Innovative ideas can flourish in psychologically secure surroundings created by leaders who promote experimentation, empower staff, and encourage open communication. Furthermore, the function of resource allocation, strategic decision-making, and exterior participation to promote innovation is analyzed. per the study's results leadership is in addition to overseeing an operation; it's also about fostering an environment that supports inventiveness and eventually produces long-term success for startups.

title: Disinformation and Health: Fact-Checking Strategies of Spanish Health Public Institutions Through YouTube (Desinformación y salud: estrategias de verificación de datos de las instituciones sanitarias públicas españolas a través de YouTube)
affiliations: University of Vigo, Universidade de Vigo and Universidade de Vigo

detail.title: Disinformation and Health: Fact-Checking Strategies of Spanish Health Public Institutions Through YouTube (Desinformación y salud: estrategias de verificación de datos de las instituciones sanitarias públicas españolas a través de YouTube)

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare that the research was conducted in the absence of any commercial or financial relationships that could be construed as a potential conflict of interest.

PID2021-124293OB-I00), funded by the Ministry of Science and Innovation, the State Research Agency (AEI) of the Government of Spain and by the ERDF of the European Union (EU).

detail.abstract:
English Abstract: Introduction: Through their social media, public institutions address fake news and tackle disinformation that affects both them and the general public. With the rise of online video platforms, the audiovisual format has made its way as a dynamic and engaging format that allows for the creation of narratives to counter distorted information. This circumstance is particularly noticeable in the healthcare sector, where most of the recent fact-checking activity is taking place. 

Methodology: Through the analysis of the official YouTube channels of the health departments of all Spanish autonomous communities from 1 January 2021 to 31 December 2023, this paper explores the use of audiovisual factchecking by Spanish regional governments, and it describes the nature of these videos and the strategies undertaken on that platform to tackle disinformation. 

Results: Despite the expected territorial disparities, the research findings show that an increasing number of Spanish regional health authorities are using YouTube to fight disinformation. They also show that the videos posted on that platform provide a strong response to fake news, either as a preventive measure or in response to existing publications. Discussion: In the current landscape of declining mass media, where audience dispersion leads a to (sometimes deliberate) fragmentation of discourse, we are confronted with the paradox of being a society with access to a vast amount of information, but not well-informed. Therefore, it is essential to have strong institutions that verify fake content through
popular formats.

Spanish Abstract: Introducción: A través de sus redes sociales, las instituciones públicas abordan las noticias falsas y enfrentan la desinformación que afecta tanto a ellas como al público general. Con el auge de las plataformas de video en línea, el formato audiovisual se ha consolidado como un formato dinámico y atractivo que permite la creación de narrativas para contrarrestar la información distorsionada. Esta circunstancia es especialmente visible en el sector sanitario, donde se concentra la mayor parte de la actividad reciente de verificación de hechos.

Metodología: Mediante el análisis de los canales oficiales de YouTube de los departamentos de salud de todas las comunidades autónomas españolas desde el 1 de enero de 2021 hasta el 31 de diciembre de 2023, este estudio explora el uso de la verificación audiovisual por parte de los gobiernos regionales españoles y describe la naturaleza de estos videos y las estrategias empleadas en dicha plataforma para combatir la desinformación.

Resultados: A pesar de las disparidades territoriales esperadas, los resultados muestran que un número creciente de autoridades sanitarias regionales españolas utiliza YouTube para luchar contra la desinformación. También evidencian que los videos publicados en esa plataforma ofrecen una respuesta contundente a las noticias falsas, ya sea como medida preventiva o en reacción a publicaciones existentes.

Discusión: En el contexto actual de declive de los medios masivos, donde la dispersión de la audiencia conduce a una fragmentación (a veces deliberada) del discurso, se presenta la paradoja de ser una sociedad con acceso a una gran cantidad de información pero poco bien informada. Por ello, es esencial contar con instituciones sólidas que verifiquen el contenido falso mediante formatos populares.

AI.tldr: 西班牙地区卫生部门通过YouTube平台使用视听形式打击虚假信息，研究分析了2021年至2023年的数据，发现尽管存在地域差异，但越来越多的机构利用视频作为预防或应对假新闻的工具。

affiliations: University of Calcutta

detail.title: An Empirical Evaluation of the Ethical Decision-Making Process of Indian Business Students with Work Experience

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The research was conducted independently and does not reflect the views of any affiliated institution
declarations.ethicsApproval: This study involved voluntary survey-based research with adult participants and did not involve any intervention. All responses were anonymous to ensure confidentiality.
declarations.funderStatement: The research received no grant from any funding agency in the public, commercial or not for profit sectors

detail.abstract: In this paper, we look at the ethical reasoning of Business students with corporate work experience in India. Six ethical theories with intuitive decision-making qualities are chosen for the analysis. A questionnaire is designed to identify a) the prevalence of these theories in the actual corporate scenario in the Indian context and b) the role ethical theories play when students have to decide while confronted with a dilemma in a working situation. The two main conclusions of the analysis are (a) the ex post situation in the Indian corporate sector is perceived to be co-dominated by both controlled and automatic responses, namely utilitarian and deontology & rights respectively however (b) deliverance of justice is flagged as the main concern for the respondents in the Indian work environment.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了印度有企业工作经验的商学院学生的伦理推理，分析了六种具有直觉决策特性的伦理理论。通过问卷调研，探讨了这些理论在印度企业环境中的实际应用及其在决策困境中的作用。研究发现，印度企业环境中功利主义与义务论/权利理论共同主导，但正义的实现是受访者的主要关注点。

title: Are Earnings Inequality and Firm Concentration Connected? Evidence from an Assignment Model
affiliations: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System

detail.title: Are Earnings Inequality and Firm Concentration Connected? Evidence from an Assignment Model
detail.abstract: This paper develops a unified theoretical and quantitative framework to explain two major economic trends: the rise in earnings inequality and the growing firm concentration. Using a general equilibrium assignment model with hierarchical firms and monopolistic competition, I show that firm concentration can increase even as productivity dispersion remains stable or declines-driven instead by organizational flattening and rising skill dispersion. Calibrated to U.S. data from the 1980s and 2010s, the model replicates the rise in both earnings and firm size inequality and matches several untargeted distributional features. Counterfactual decompositions reveal that changes in firm structure - not widening productivity gaps - account for most of the observed increase in employment concentration. These findings complement emerging evidence that concentration is increasingly shaped by differential scalability and organizational structure, rather than divergence in firm-level fundamentals.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一个统一的理论和量化框架，解释收入不平等和企业集中度上升两大经济趋势。通过使用分层企业和垄断竞争的一般均衡分配模型，作者表明即使生产率分散稳定或下降，企业集中度仍可能因组织扁平化和技能分散上升而增加。模型基于1980年代和2010年代的美国数据校准，重现了收入和企业规模不平等的上升，并匹配了多个非目标分布特征。反事实分解表明，企业结构变化（而非生产率差距扩大）是就业集中度上升的主要原因。
AI.research_question: 如何解释收入不平等和企业集中度上升的经济趋势？
AI.motivation: 研究这两大经济趋势背后的驱动因素，特别是企业集中度上升的原因。
AI.theoretical_framework: 分层企业和垄断竞争的一般均衡分配模型。
AI.method: 使用校准模型分析美国1980年代和2010年代的数据，并进行反事实分解。
AI.findings: 企业集中度上升主要由组织扁平化和技能分散驱动，而非生产率差距扩大。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个统一框架解释收入不平等和企业集中度的关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业集中度上升提供了新的解释视角，强调组织结构和技能分散的作用。

title: Resilience Model: A Strategic Framework for Business Adaptation in Inflation, Recession, and Stagflation
affiliations: Shahid Beheshti University and Shahid Beheshti University

detail.title: Resilience Model: A Strategic Framework for Business Adaptation in Inflation, Recession, and Stagflation

declarations.funderStatement: No financial support or funding was received for this research.

detail.abstract: In today's volatile global economy, the ability of businesses to anticipate, adapt, and respond to economic disruptions is critical to long-term sustainability. This paper examines the implications of inflation, recession, and stagflation on strategic business management and outlines practical approaches for organizational resilience. A conceptual framework-Responsive Economic Strategy for Integrated Leadership in Navigating Economic Crises (RESILIENCE Model)-is proposed to align each crisis type with targeted managerial responses. Drawing from scholarly literature, market insights, and a comparative case study of Iran Khodro and Walmart, the study explores strategies such as inflation-adjusted pricing, cost control, essential product focus, adaptive workforce management and leadership. It emphasizes that although each economic condition presents distinct challenges, strategic agility and contextual awareness are key to ensuring business continuity and competitiveness. The findings highlight that all three crisis types-inflation, recession, and stagflation-require tailored yet proactive responses and may serve as opportunities for transformation and growth.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了通胀、衰退和滞胀对战略业务管理的影响，提出了RESILIENCE模型，强调战略敏捷性和情境意识对企业韧性的重要性。

title: Evolutionary Deep Reinforcement Learning Framework for Enhancing Community Engagement in Smart Cities Sustainability and Reliability
affiliations: Yangtze University and Yangtze University

detail.title: Evolutionary Deep Reinforcement Learning Framework for Enhancing Community Engagement in Smart Cities Sustainability and Reliability
detail.abstract: This paper proposes an innovative hybrid framework that synergizes Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) with a modified Multi-Objective Evolutionary Algorithm based on Decomposition (MOEA/D) to optimize multi-objective policies for smart city management. The framework explicitly balances community engagement, sustainability, service reliability, and cost, addressing the complex trade-offs inherent in urban governance. Key modifications to MOEA/D include adaptive weight vector adjustment, Differential Evolution (DE) operators for enhanced exploration, gradient-based local search for fine policy refinement, and dynamic environment adaptation to respond to evolving city dynamics. Extensive simulations in a realistic smart city environment demonstrate superior convergence speed, robustness under uncertainty, and improved Pareto front quality compared to baseline methods such as GA-PPO and PSO-SAC. The results confirm the framework’s capability to generate diverse, high-quality policies that empower decision-makers to effectively navigate conflicting objectives. This work advances AI-driven smart city governance by providing a flexible, scalable, and reliable optimization tool adaptable to real-world uncertainties and social behaviors. Future directions include real-time deployment, multi-agent system extensions, and integration with citizen digital twins to enhance personalization and responsiveness.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种创新的混合框架，结合深度强化学习（DRL）和改进的多目标分解进化算法（MOEA/D），用于优化智慧城市管理的多目标策略。该框架平衡了社区参与、可持续性、服务可靠性和成本，解决了城市治理中的复杂权衡问题。实验表明，该方法在收敛速度、鲁棒性和帕累托前沿质量上优于基线方法。

AI.motivation: 智慧城市管理涉及多目标权衡，现有方法难以平衡复杂性和动态性，需要一种灵活且高效的优化工具。
AI.theoretical_framework: 深度强化学习（DRL）、多目标分解进化算法（MOEA/D）、差分进化（DE）算子和梯度局部搜索。
AI.method: 提出混合框架，结合DRL和改进的MOEA/D，包括自适应权重调整、DE算子、梯度局部搜索和动态环境适应。
AI.findings: 实验表明，该框架在收敛速度、鲁棒性和帕累托前沿质量上优于基线方法（GA-PPO和PSO-SAC）。

title: Reflecting on the Recent Banking Crisis, what are the New Financial Stability Determinants?
affiliations: Central Bank of Nigeria

detail.title: Reflecting on the Recent Banking Crisis, what are the New Financial Stability Determinants?
detail.abstract: Little attention has been paid to the role of inflation and financial inclusion in influencing financial stability. These factors have become all the more important in light of the recent banking crisis in the United States. The lessons learnt from the recent banking crisis have heightened the need for financial regulators and bank supervisors to undertake continuous search for the non-traditional determinants of financial stability to identify risks early and mitigate risks to financial system stability. In this article, we examine some non-traditional determinants of financial stability using data from sixty-one countries from 2009 to 2021. The first-difference panel GMM regression method was used to estimate the model, and we find that greater financial stability in the previous period is followed by greater financial stability in the subsequent period in all regions, signalling the persistence of financial stability. The loan-to-deposit ratio improves financial stability in European and Americas countries while countries that have a high level of financial inclusion, and whose banking sector have a high loan-to-deposit ratio, are more financially stable. Financial inclusion improves financial stability in high inflation environments particularly in African and Americas countries. High levels of financial inclusion impair financial stability during a recession particularly in Asian countries. African banks with a high loan-to-deposit ratio are more financially stable during a recession. Also, Americas and African countries that have a combined high financial inclusion and inflation rates and whose banking sector have a high loan-to-deposit ratio are less financially stable, indicating that high inflation hinders financial inclusion and loan-to-deposit ratio from improving financial stability.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了通胀和金融包容性对金融稳定的影响，发现金融稳定具有持续性，且金融包容性和贷存比对不同地区和情境下的金融稳定有不同影响。
AI.research_question: 通胀和金融包容性如何影响金融稳定？
AI.motivation: 近期美国银行业危机凸显了研究非传统金融稳定决定因素的重要性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 金融稳定、金融包容性、通胀和贷存比的关系。
AI.method: 使用2009-2021年61个国家的数据，采用一阶差分面板GMM回归方法。
AI.findings: 金融稳定具有持续性；金融包容性和贷存比对不同地区和情境下的金融稳定有不同影响；高通胀会削弱金融包容性和贷存比对金融稳定的积极作用。

title: Mutual-to-Stock Conversions and Customer Welfare: Evidence from U.S. Savings Banks
affiliations: Université Paris Dauphine - PSL and Auckland University of Technology

detail.title: Mutual-to-Stock Conversions and Customer Welfare: Evidence from U.S. Savings Banks
detail.abstract: We study the customer welfare implications of conversions from mutual to stock ownership in the banking industry. Using U.S. data and a structural model of bank deposit account demand, we show that when a bank is mutual, depositors are less sensitive to price, and each unit of cash and liquidity services is valued more positively. We measure the effect of mutual-to-stock conversions on deposit account characteristics, and combine this with demand estimates to assess the impact on depositor welfare. Our estimations indicate that mutual-to-stock conversions improve depositor welfare, challenging the idea that mutuals operate for the benefit of their members.

detail.abstract: Be it a consideration of the ruptured spatialities and urban forms of Baghdad in the present or reaching back into a volatile past, the city lives out arresting contradictions that beckon a different kind of understanding. Spatial woundedness carries within it many implications for how that pain is rendered. This is most visible in forms of cultural production that have settled the hurt exacted into a place of innovation. It is a full mutuality between architecture and the destruction that has violently defaced it so much so that a new image of urbanity begins to emerge. Beyond the agony felt by the capital, intellectualizing the spatial wound that has manifested and been given life as it were suggests a pressing need to comprehend this phenomenology. Historicizing and then theorizing what is a poetics of destruction assists in coming to comprehend not simply the features of an urban character necessarily born out of ruin but doing so against an orientalist narrative that seeks to entrench the Baghdadi space in perpetual liminality. The city fights back so that it may have a chance to survive but also creates lasting meaning between the real and unreal.

title: Does Transparency Hinder Technological Novelty? Evidence from Large Pharmaceutical Firms
affiliations: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign - Gies College of Business, University of Illinois at Chicago - College of Business Administration and University of Minnesota - Twin Cities, Carlson School of Management, Students

detail.title: Does Transparency Hinder Technological Novelty? Evidence from Large Pharmaceutical Firms
detail.abstract:
Problem Definition: The drug development process has historically lacked transparency, leading to selective reporting of clinical trial results. While clinical trial transparency aims to address this issue, increased public scrutiny may make managers more risk-averse, potentially stifling novel R&D initiatives. This raises the question: Does transparency hinder technologically novel R&D? 

Methodology/Results: Using data from nearly 10,000 clinical trials from 2000 to 2014, we examine how a 2005 policy to increase transparency affects drug novelty. Using a continuous difference-in-differences approach, we find that transparency prompts firms to rely more on previously-used technologies (i.e., exploitative R&D) without reducing their pursuit of never-before-tested technologies (i.e., exploratory R&D). We identify negative informational spillovers as a mechanism: technology failures that are now more visible because of transparency could erode confidence in related trials, prompting firms towards familiar technologies to avoid reputational damage. Consistent with this mechanism, the impact of transparency is strongest among firms with less-diversified portfolios that are the most exposed to negative informational spillovers. 

Managerial implications: Our primary theoretical contribution is in demonstrating the unintended negative impact of transparency on novelty. For managers, we highlight diversification as a mitigation strategy. We urge policymakers to create incentives to support novel R&D despite transparency pressures.

title: Strengthening Jewish Ethics: Legal, Divine, and Rhetorical Mechanisms in the Talmud
affiliations: City University of New York (CUNY) - Koppelman School of Business

detail.title: Strengthening Jewish Ethics: Legal, Divine, and Rhetorical Mechanisms in the Talmud

keywords: Going Beyond the Strict Letter of the Law

detail.abstract: The rigid application of rules can, paradoxically, be the undoing of ethics. When individuals become fixated on technical compliance, they risk losing their moral compass, skillfully navigating loopholes while forsaking the very spirit of the law. The Talmudic scholars, acutely aware of this peril, countered it by saturating the law with compelling stories, pronouncements of divine consequences, and powerful literary devices. Their aim was not just obedience, but the cultivation of a holistic ethical vision-one that inspired deeds far beyond legal requirements, deeply integrating explicit obligations with their underlying moral bedrock.

title: Stand Structure Assessment for Sustainable Forest Management in Conifer Plantations: Examining the Relationships between Forest Ownership, Productivity, and Biodiversity
affiliations: Forestry and Forest Products Research Institute and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Stand Structure Assessment for Sustainable Forest Management in Conifer Plantations: Examining the Relationships between Forest Ownership, Productivity, and Biodiversity
detail.abstract: Effective forest resource management is required not only to sustain harvests but also to promote ecosystem conservation. However, the final decision-making authority for forest management lies with the landowner, and policies promoting resource management must also consider the characteristics of forest conditions under each ownership type. In this study, we used National Forest Inventory (NFI) data to determine the current structures of Japanese cedar plantations in terms of productivity and biodiversity, as well as differences among ownership types. The stand structure indices for productivity and biodiversity were calculated; cluster analysis identified four distinct forest stand types: high-mixed, low-mixed, managed, and dense plantation forests (PF). Notable relationships emerged between ownership and stand types. Forest stratification, the number of standing dead trees, and number of nonplanted trees differed significantly among the stand types. Furthermore, national forests had considerably more high-mixed PF (characterized by high species diversity and a mix of planted and nonplanted trees), indicating the efforts of successful diversification. Community forests exhibited more well-managed PFs, signifying effective management resulting from communal efforts and economies of scale. Individually owned forests were predominantly dense PFs, often reflecting under-managed conditions with high tree density, potentially owing to factors such as aging owners and low timber prices. On-site environmental factors could have less influence on stand structure than long-term forest management practices. Stand structure evaluation using NFI data could help monitor and evaluate progress in achieving the policy goal of converting monospecific PF into more diversified planted forests.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用国家森林资源清查数据，分析了日本柳杉人工林的生产力和生物多样性结构，以及不同所有权类型下的差异。研究发现，所有权类型与林分结构显著相关，国有林表现出更高的物种多样性，而社区林管理较好，个体所有林则多为高密度林分。
AI.research_question: 不同所有权类型下日本柳杉人工林的生产力和生物多样性结构有何差异？
AI.motivation: 森林资源管理需兼顾可持续采伐和生态保护，而决策权在土地所有者手中，因此需考虑不同所有权类型对森林条件的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于国家森林资源清查数据，分析林分结构指数（生产力和生物多样性）与所有权类型的关系。
AI.method: 使用聚类分析将林分分为四类（高混合、低混合、管理和密集人工林），并比较不同所有权类型下的林分结构差异。
AI.findings: 国有林高混合林分较多，显示多样化努力；社区林管理较好；个体所有林多为密集林分，管理不足。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了所有权类型对林分结构的影响，为政策制定提供理论依据。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议通过监测林分结构评估政策目标（单一人工林向多样化转变）的进展。

title: Economic and Ecological Optimization of the London Urban Logistics System Considering Infection Risk during Pandemic Periods
affiliations: Erasmus University Rotterdam

detail.title: Economic and Ecological Optimization of the London Urban Logistics System Considering Infection Risk during Pandemic Periods
detail.abstract: Urban delivery, especially the last-mile delivery, has become an increasingly important area in the global supply chain along with the boom of e-commerce. Delivery companies and merchants can introduce some innovative solutions such as the equipment of autonomous vehicles (AVs) to decrease their operating costs, environmental impact, and social risks during the delivery process. This paper mainly develops a mathematical model to get the best allocation of AVs among city logistics centers (CLCs) as a mixed delivery method. The advantage of the presented model stems from considering the equipment cost, the delivery cost, and the CO2 emission, which is measured through social carbon cost (SCC). In addition, this paper establishes a risk model considering the impact of seasonal variations to evaluate the infection risk of delivery during pandemic periods for four potential delivery scenarios: customers going to CLCs, ordering online and picking-up at CLCs, delivering by traditional vehicles (TVs), and delivering by the mixed method with the optimal allocation of AVs. The research finds the optimal allocation for a London case, reveals the relationship between the nominal service capacity (NCpa) of CLCs and the optimal number of CLCs equipped with AVs, concludes that the more CLCs are equipped with AVs, the fewer CO2 emissions and the fewer citizens will be infected, and provides some managerial insights that may help delivery companies and merchants make appropriate decisions about the allocation of AVs.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了城市物流中心（CLCs）中自动驾驶车辆（AVs）的最优分配问题，通过数学模型考虑了设备成本、配送成本和CO2排放（通过社会碳成本衡量），并建立了季节性变化对疫情期间配送感染风险的影响模型。研究发现，AVs的分配能减少CO2排放和感染风险，并提供了管理建议。
AI.research_question: 如何在城市物流中心中实现自动驾驶车辆的最优分配，以降低运营成本、环境影响和疫情期间的感染风险？
AI.motivation: 随着电子商务的兴起，最后一公里配送的重要性日益凸显，而自动驾驶车辆的引入可以优化配送效率并减少负面影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于社会碳成本（SCC）和季节性风险模型，结合数学优化方法。
AI.method: 建立了数学模型以优化AVs在CLCs中的分配，并评估了四种配送场景的风险。
AI.findings: 研究发现，AVs的最优分配能减少CO2排放和感染风险，且CLCs的服务容量与AVs的分配数量相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合社会碳成本和季节性风险的综合优化模型。
AI.practical_contributions: 为配送公司和商家提供了关于AVs分配的管理建议，以优化成本和风险。

detail.abstract: Public procurement regimes may be constrained by rules, but people - procurement professionals - animate the process. Despite spending over $750 billion last year on federal contracts, the U.S. Government continues to deprioritize the professional capacity of its acquisition workforce. This article bemoans and critiques the persistent failure to recruit, develop, and retain procurement personnel, a failure exacerbated by politically driven downsizing, inadequate investments in workforce development, and misplaced reliance on procedural reform—most recently evidenced by the so-called “Revolutionary FAR Overhaul.” Drawing on historical data, case studies, and recent Government Accountability Office reports, the authors document how decades of underinvestment have produced a fragile procurement infrastructure, incapable of effectively managing increasingly complex acquisitions. The article calls for a sustained, strategic, and statutory commitment to and investment in workforce capacity as the cornerstone of procurement reform.

AI.tldr: 本文批评美国政府长期忽视采购人员的招募、培养和保留，指出政治驱动的裁员、对人员发展的投资不足以及对程序改革的过度依赖导致了采购基础设施的脆弱。作者呼吁将提升人员能力作为采购改革的核心。
AI.research_question: 美国政府为何长期未能有效提升采购人员的能力，以及如何解决这一问题？

AI.method: 通过历史数据、案例研究和政府报告分析采购人员能力问题的成因和影响。
AI.findings: 长期对采购人员能力的忽视导致采购基础设施脆弱，无法有效管理复杂采购。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了采购人员能力对采购体系效能的关键作用，填补了相关理论空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出将提升采购人员能力作为改革核心，为政策制定者提供了具体建议。

title: Dual Facets of Work-Life Balance, Stress, and Burnout Impact on Employee Performance Through the Lens of Authoritarian Leadership
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Curtin University Malaysia, University of Management and Technology, Sialkot and Al-Ahliyya Amman University

detail.title: Dual Facets of Work-Life Balance, Stress, and Burnout Impact on Employee Performance Through the Lens of Authoritarian Leadership
detail.abstract: This study seeks to scrutinize the impact of work-life balance, work stress, and burnout on employee performance mediated by authoritarian leadership. The research is quantitative, which aims to use simple random sampling based on Slovin to examine 350 respondents among steel industry employees. The study collects data using research instruments and conducts quantitative or statistical analysis to test predetermined hypotheses. Data analysis was performed using Smart PLS 4.0 software, and data testing was carried out through descriptive and verifiable analysis methods. The hypothesis was tested using the T-test and F-test. The findings indicate that work-life balance, work stress, and burnout substantially influence leadership style, which in turn affects employee performance. The study underlines the prominent role of leadership in moderating workplace stressors and maintaining employee productivity. By understanding these relationships, organizations can devise strategies to improve the well-being of employees, reduce burnout, and improve overall performance.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨工作与生活平衡、工作压力和倦怠对员工绩效的影响，并以专制领导风格为中介变量。研究发现领导风格在调节职场压力源和维持员工生产力方面起重要作用。

AI.motivation: 研究旨在揭示领导风格在职场压力与员工绩效关系中的作用，为企业提供改善员工福祉和绩效的策略。

AI.method: 采用定量研究方法，通过简单随机抽样（基于Slovin公式）调查350名钢铁行业员工，使用Smart PLS 4.0软件进行数据分析，包括描述性和验证性分析，以及T检验和F检验。
AI.findings: 工作与生活平衡、工作压力和倦怠显著影响领导风格，进而影响员工绩效。领导风格在调节压力源和维持生产力方面起关键作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了领导风格在职场压力与绩效关系中的中介作用研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业提供了通过改善领导风格来减少员工倦怠、提升绩效的具体策略。

title: Do US Government and Commercial Media Concern Similar Topics? - A Text-mining (NLP) Approach
affiliations: Erasmus University Rotterdam

detail.title: Do US Government and Commercial Media Concern Similar Topics? - A Text-mining (NLP) Approach
detail.abstract: Text Mining and nature language processing (NLP) has become an important tool in many research areas. Text Mining is the discovery by computer of new, previously unknown information, by automatically extracting information from different written resources. This task conducted a series of text mining jobs mainly based on the New York Times news titles corpus from Jan 2020 to Apr 2021. This task also did some analyses based on the US congressional speeches during the same period. The result shows that compared with the focuses of US congressional speeches, the focuses of New York Times news titles better reflected the changing hotspot issues over time.
