title: Side by Side or ”Get Out of My Way!” - Examining the Impact of Picker Blocking and Agv Assistance in Picker-to-Parts Order Picking Systems
affiliations: Technical University of Darmstadt and Polytechnic University of Milan - School of Management

detail.title: Side by Side or ”Get Out of My Way!” - Examining the Impact of Picker Blocking and Agv Assistance in Picker-to-Parts Order Picking Systems
detail.abstract: Manual order picking remains a labor- and cost-intensive warehouse process. As automation technologies gain traction, automated guided vehicles (AGVs) assist human pickers by handling transport tasks and optimizing workflows. However, due to high cost levels and infrastructural constraints, AGVs are often introduced incrementally, resulting in mixed-technology scenarios where workers with a prior technology generation and workers with the new (AGV) technology generation operate side by side, for example in the same warehouse aisle. One challenge in such settings is picker blocking, which occurs when the actions of one picker impede or delay the movements of another picker. This study empirically examines pick column blocking and within-aisle blocking regarding their impact on task performance time. Using a mixed-effects regression model, we analyze 490,398 pick events from a German retailer during 2023. Our results show that both types of blocking significantly increase task performance time. However, AGV assistance mitigates these negative effects. Our results demonstrate that AGVs go beyond transport assistance by reducing congestion and ensuring smoother, more efficient movement. The study provides valuable insights into the theory and management to optimize warehouse operations and contributes to the growing research on human-AGV collaboration in logistics.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了在混合技术仓库环境中，人工拣货员与自动导引车（AGV）协作时，拣货阻塞（picker blocking）对任务完成时间的影响。实证分析表明，AGV辅助能显著缓解阻塞的负面影响。
AI.research_question: 在混合技术仓库环境中，拣货阻塞（picker blocking）如何影响任务完成时间？AGV辅助是否能缓解这种影响？
AI.motivation: 人工拣货是仓库中劳动力和成本密集的环节，AGV的引入虽优化了流程，但混合技术环境下的拣货阻塞问题尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于仓库运营管理和人机协作理论，研究拣货阻塞对效率的影响。
AI.method: 采用混合效应回归模型，分析2023年德国零售商的490,398个拣货事件数据。
AI.findings: 拣货阻塞（包括列阻塞和通道内阻塞）显著增加任务完成时间，但AGV辅助能有效缓解这种负面影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了人机协作理论，揭示了AGV在缓解拣货阻塞中的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为仓库管理者提供了优化运营的实证依据，支持AGV的逐步引入策略。

title: A Decision-Support Model for Rescheduling Maintenance Plans Using Opportunistic Task Grouping
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE)

detail.title: A Decision-Support Model for Rescheduling Maintenance Plans Using Opportunistic Task Grouping
detail.abstract: Efficient maintenance scheduling is crucial for increasing system availability and minimizing downtime in capital-intensive industries. However, many existing models tend to be highly complex, making them difficult for industrial managers to adopt practically. This article introduces a decision-support model that reprograms already scheduled maintenance activities, based on predefined plans, to lower the number and duration of planned downtimes. The approach uses integer linear programming and incorporates key operational parameters such as resource availability, task duration, and maintenance frequency. The model employs an opportunistic grouping strategy to identify compatible tasks during scheduled shutdowns, maximizing resource use and cutting down on interruptions. To ensure real-world applicability, the model is implemented using a user-friendly software tool with an interactive interface, allowing maintenance professionals to use it without advanced technical skills. An application in an electricity distribution company showed the model’s effectiveness. Results revealed a 44.4% reduction in scheduled shutdowns and a 25.5% decrease in total downtime. Even with the addition of corrective maintenance events, the rescheduling maintained significant improvements. This work enhances the literature by introducing a post-planning rescheduling stage that optimizes existing maintenance plans through intelligent grouping, respecting constraints, and increasing management flexibility. Besides technical gains, the model offers economic advantages by lowering resource mobilization costs and extending equipment availability. Its design aligns with digital systems, supporting the transition toward Maintenance 4.0, and encouraging more efficient, adaptive, and sustainable industrial maintenance practices.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于整数线性规划的决策支持模型，通过重新编程已计划的维护活动，减少停机次数和时长，提升资源利用效率。
AI.research_question: 如何通过智能分组和重新调度优化现有维护计划，以减少停机时间和资源成本？
AI.motivation: 现有维护调度模型过于复杂，难以实际应用，亟需一种用户友好且高效的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 整数线性规划和维护调度理论。
AI.method: 采用整数线性编程，结合资源可用性、任务时长和维护频率等参数，设计用户友好的软件工具。
AI.findings: 在电力分销公司的应用中，计划停机减少44.4%，总停机时间减少25.5%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了后规划重新调度阶段，通过智能分组优化维护计划。
AI.practical_contributions: 降低资源成本，提升设备可用性，支持维护4.0转型。

title: Beds of the Future: Reconfiguring Supply Chains and Valuing Practices Through a Bedding Product Stewardship Initiative
affiliations: Monash University

detail.title: Beds of the Future: Reconfiguring Supply Chains and Valuing Practices Through a Bedding Product Stewardship Initiative
detail.abstract: End of life bedding poses both practical and conceptual challenges for circular economy approaches and imagined futures. We examine how these challenges manifest in the initiative to develop a voluntary product stewardship scheme for bedding in Australia. The study is based on a research collaboration with the Australian Bedding Stewardship Council (ABSC), interviews and site visits with 15 of its member organisations, followed by an interactive online workshop called ‘Beds of the Future’. We first examine how motivations for participating in the ABSC’s product stewardship initiative differ among the different types of organisations in the bedding supply chain, from manufacturers to retailers to waste managers and materials recyclers. Informed by scholarship on business ecosystems, diverse economies and sustainability transitions, we pose questions about the trajectories of change that supply chain actors are currently engaged with and the valuing practices that support them. We then examine the potential for synergies between these trajectories to generate system-level change and the agency of key organisations required to achieve this, focusing in particular on design-led and waste management-led trajectories. The case of the bedding stewardship initiative in Australia demonstrates both strengths and limitations of the product focus for progressing circular economy concepts. It highlights the need for orchestration by both manufacturers and government agencies to coordinate change trajectories informed by circuits of value, and the significance of diversity among organisation types and their valuing practices.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了澳大利亚床上用品自愿产品管理计划中，循环经济面临的实践和概念挑战，探讨了不同供应链组织参与动机的差异，以及协同变革的潜力。
AI.research_question: 床上用品供应链中不同组织参与自愿产品管理计划的动机差异及其对循环经济变革的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 研究床上用品生命周期结束时对循环经济的挑战，探索如何通过供应链协同实现系统级变革。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于商业生态系统、多元经济和可持续转型理论。
AI.method: 与澳大利亚床上用品管理委员会合作，包括访谈15家成员组织、实地考察及互动在线研讨会。
AI.findings: 揭示了供应链中不同组织的动机差异，强调了制造商和政府机构在协调变革中的关键作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了循环经济中供应链协同和变革轨迹的理论理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 为床上用品行业和其他行业提供了实现循环经济的实践启示。

title: Bank Stability, Bank Business Models, and the Financial Resource Curse
affiliations: University Paris-Est Créteil (UPEC) - ERUDITE, African Economic Research Consortium and University of Sussex Business School

detail.title: Bank Stability, Bank Business Models, and the Financial Resource Curse
detail.abstract: This study uses a set of bank-level data to examine how natural resource rents affect bank stability. Our findings indicate that bank business models and credit policies are adversely influenced by natural resource wealth. Unlike previous research, which attributes the low level of financial development in resource-based countries to external factors, our study emphasises banks’ internal behaviours. We argue that limited bank intermediation in these countries serves as a protective measure against the additional risks posed by natural resource rents. Credit rationing helps banks mitigate credit risks, which are particularly pronounced in resource-based economies. Furthermore, risk diversification through bank business models appears to be less effective in the presence of natural resource rents, contributing to greater financial instability in these countries.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用银行层面数据探讨自然资源租金对银行稳定性的影响，发现银行商业模式和信贷政策受自然资源财富的负面影响。与以往研究不同，本文强调银行内部行为，认为有限的银行中介是对抗自然资源租金额外风险的保护措施。信贷配给有助于银行缓解信贷风险，而风险分散在自然资源租金存在时效果较差，导致金融不稳定。
AI.research_question: 自然资源租金如何影响银行稳定性？
AI.motivation: 以往研究将资源型国家金融发展水平低归因于外部因素，本研究关注银行内部行为，填补研究空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于银行中介理论和风险分散理论，分析自然资源租金对银行行为的影响。
AI.method: 使用银行层面数据，实证分析自然资源租金与银行稳定性的关系。
AI.findings: 自然资源租金对银行商业模式和信贷政策有负面影响；信贷配给是银行应对额外风险的保护措施；风险分散效果较差，加剧金融不稳定。
AI.theory_contributions: 强调银行内部行为在资源型国家金融稳定性中的作用，补充现有理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为资源型国家的银行监管和政策制定提供参考，帮助缓解金融不稳定。

title: Dynamic Risk Spillover Effects of Vietnam's Stock Market: A New Perspective of Network Analysis
affiliations: Nanning University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Nanning University and Nanning University

detail.title: Dynamic Risk Spillover Effects of Vietnam's Stock Market: A New Perspective of Network Analysis
detail.abstract: As one of the fastest-growing emerging markets among ASEAN countries, the Vietnamese stock market combines high growth potential with significant vulnerability, and its risk spillover effect poses a unique challenge to global financial stability and supply chain security. This paper constructs a time-varying spillover network model for the first time. By combining the dynamic Diebold-Yilmaz spillover index with the TVP-VAR-DY risk spillover network and the TVP-VAR-FAVAR impulse response mechanism, it systematically examines the dynamic mechanism and structural characteristics of risk spillover in the Vietnamese stock market from 2011 to 2025. Research findings: (1) Vietnam presents a "dual role" : Under normal circumstances, it acts as a risk receiver, but turns into a risk amplifier in extreme events (such as the tariff shock in 2025). Its pivotal position fluctuates significantly with the policy cycle of the Federal Reserve and geopolitical conflicts. (2) Policy intervention significantly altered the network topology. In 2022, the strengthening of financial regulation reduced the risk correlation among internal sectors of the Vietnamese stock market by 23%, but it exacerbated the volatility of cross-border capital flows. (3) The main risk transmission mechanism is cross-border trade. Through innovative methods and regional focus, we helps to improve the accuracy of risk contagion mechanism analysis, and expands a new perspective of "micro-macro" collaborative governance for risk regulation in emerging markets. This framework can be extended to systematic risk warning research in other high volatility markets.

AI.tldr: 本文首次构建了时变溢出网络模型，结合动态Diebold-Yilmaz溢出指数与TVP-VAR-DY风险溢出网络及TVP-VAR-FAVAR脉冲响应机制，系统研究了2011-2025年越南股市风险溢出的动态机制与结构特征。研究发现越南在极端事件中扮演风险放大器角色，政策干预显著改变网络拓扑，跨境贸易是主要风险传导机制。
AI.research_question: 越南股市风险溢出的动态机制与结构特征是什么？
AI.motivation: 越南作为东盟增长最快的新兴市场之一，其高风险溢出效应对全球金融稳定与供应链安全构成挑战。
AI.theoretical_framework: 动态Diebold-Yilmaz溢出指数、TVP-VAR-DY风险溢出网络、TVP-VAR-FAVAR脉冲响应机制。
AI.method: 构建时变溢出网络模型，结合动态溢出指数与网络分析。
AI.findings: 越南在极端事件中扮演风险放大器角色；政策干预显著改变网络拓扑；跨境贸易是主要风险传导机制。
AI.theory_contributions: 为新兴市场风险监管提供了“微观-宏观”协同治理的新视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 提高了风险传染机制分析的准确性，可扩展至其他高波动市场的系统性风险预警研究。

title: Generative Design for Additive Manufacturing Inventory Pooling: A Cost and Circular Economy Analysis in Aviation Spare Parts Supply Chain
affiliations: Aalto University, Aalto University and Aalto University

detail.title: Generative Design for Additive Manufacturing Inventory Pooling: A Cost and Circular Economy Analysis in Aviation Spare Parts Supply Chain
detail.abstract: The potential for machine learning-enabled generative design (GD) algorithms for additive manufacturing (AM) design optimization is vast. By employing GD, parts are optimized for material efficiency, structural performance, longevity, and reduced waste, aligning with circular economy principles. This study conducts a quantitative comparison of cost and environmental impacts between conventional manufacturing (CM) and generatively designed additive manufacturing (GDAM) in the context of aviation industry centralized spare part inventory pooling. We estimate the total annual and lifecycle cost of each scenario using a developed cost model integrating the inventory models. Our sensitivity analysis reveals that on an equal part longevity, GDAM becomes cost-competitive beyond ~84% part weight reduction. While GDAM part being 53% lighter than CM part, a 50% increase in the part longevity yields cost savings of up to 24.6%, demonstrating that durability is a more influential driver than lightweighting in aerospace industry. Furthermore, GDAM offers substantial sustainability advantages, including significant reductions in fuel consumption cost, material waste, and CO2 emissions. These environmental benefits become increasingly evident under high weight-reduction scenarios. This paper contributes to the literature by integrating GDAM into spare part supply chain (SPSC) cost analysis. We clarify under which conditions GDAM inventory pooling requires centralized stocking to avoid excessive aircraft on the ground (AOG) costs. We also provide practical insights into when GDAM production capacity pooling is viable, particularly for non-critical parts. The findings inform strategic decisions for supply chain managers and policymakers by quantifying the economic and environmental trade-offs of adopting GDAM-based inventory pooling in aviation.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过定量比较传统制造（CM）与生成设计增材制造（GDAM）在航空业集中备件库存共享中的成本和环境影响，发现GDAM在重量减少84%以上时具有成本竞争力，且耐久性比轻量化更能节省成本。GDAM还显著减少燃料消耗、材料浪费和CO2排放。
AI.research_question: 在航空业集中备件库存共享中，生成设计增材制造（GDAM）与传统制造（CM）相比，其成本和环境影响如何？
AI.motivation: 探索GDAM在航空备件供应链中的经济与环境潜力，以支持循环经济原则。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合库存模型和成本模型，分析GDAM与CM的经济与环境表现。
AI.method: 开发成本模型，结合库存模型进行定量比较和敏感性分析。
AI.findings: GDAM在重量减少84%以上时成本竞争力显著；耐久性比轻量化更能节省成本（高达24.6%）；GDAM显著减少燃料消耗、材料浪费和CO2排放。
AI.theory_contributions: 将GDAM纳入备件供应链成本分析，明确了集中库存的条件和GDAM产能共享的可行性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为供应链管理者和政策制定者提供经济与环境权衡的量化依据，支持航空业GDAM的采用。

title: Corporate Financing Effects of the Ecb's Cspp: Evidence from Bond Spreads and Firm Leverage
affiliations: University of Lisbon - ISEG School of Economics and Management

detail.title: Corporate Financing Effects of the Ecb's Cspp: Evidence from Bond Spreads and Firm Leverage
detail.abstract: This study evaluates the impact of the ECB’s Corporate Sector Purchase Programme (CSPP) on corporate bond spreads at issuance, as measured by Option-Adjusted Spreads (OAS), and on subsequent changes in firms' capital structures, as proxied by year-on-year changes in the debt ratio. Using a sample of 1,275 Eurozone corporate bonds issued between 2015:Q1 and 2018:Q4, we estimate a two-stage empirical model to evaluate. In the first stage, we find that the initial association between CSPP eligibility and lower spreads disappears once firm- and bond-level characteristics are controlled for, suggesting that observed differences reflect issuer and instrument features rather than programme eligibility. While the CSPP’s effect does not vary systematically by firm or bond characteristics, the results indicate broader market effects, likely driven by the programme’s signaling power and perceived credibility, which extended beyond the impact of direct bond purchases. In the second stage, we assess changes in leverage following the issuance of bonds. CSPP eligibility did not seem to affect the debt ratio in the issuance year. However, longer-maturity eligible bonds are associated with delayed increases in leverage, as firms expanded their debt ratios in the year following issuance. This pattern suggests that improved financing conditions under the programme may have encouraged firms to raise additional debt at a later stage.

AI.tldr: 本研究评估了欧洲央行企业部门购买计划（CSPP）对企业债券发行时的利差（以期权调整利差OAS衡量）及企业资本结构变化（以债务比率同比变化衡量）的影响。研究发现，CSPP资格对利差的直接影响被企业及债券特征所掩盖，但市场整体效应显著。此外，长期债券资格与延迟的杠杆增加相关。
AI.research_question: 欧洲央行企业部门购买计划（CSPP）如何影响企业债券发行时的利差及企业资本结构的变化？
AI.motivation: 探讨CSPP对企业融资行为及市场影响的机制，以评估其政策效果。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于金融市场信号理论及企业资本结构理论。
AI.method: 使用两阶段实证模型，分析2015-2018年间1275只欧元区企业债券数据。
AI.findings: 1. CSPP资格对利差的直接影响被企业及债券特征掩盖；2. 市场整体效应显著；3. 长期债券资格与延迟的杠杆增加相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了CSPP的信号效应及市场整体影响，补充了货币政策传导机制的研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了CSPP实际效果的证据，有助于优化未来货币政策设计。

title: Exploring Common Volatility in Cryptocurrencies: A Subsectoral Perspective
affiliations: University of Aberdeen, University of Aberdeen - Business School, Massey University, Albany campus and University of Central Oklahoma - Department of Economics

detail.title: Exploring Common Volatility in Cryptocurrencies: A Subsectoral Perspective
detail.abstract: Cryptocurrencies offer the potential for high returns but are subject to extreme volatility driven by economic shifts, technological developments, and regulatory changes, as exemplified by events like the Terra collapse and FTX bankruptcy. Although all cryptocurrencies share fundamental features, such as decentralization and blockchain-based infrastructure, they may differ significantly in design, consensus mechanisms, and governance structures. These differences categorize them into distinct subsectors with unique risk profiles. This study applies the novel methodology proposed by Engle and Campos-Martins (2023) to analyse the common volatility (COVOL) across cryptocurrency subsectors, including Proof of Work (PoW), Proof of Stake (PoS), and Smart Contract platforms. Using a sample of the largest 17 cryptocurrencies from March 2016 to April 2024, our findings reveal distinct volatility patterns within these subsectors, driven by macroeconomic factors such as the term spread and interest rates. COVOL proves to be a strong predictor of market volatility and correlations, offering valuable insights into the dynamics of different cryptocurrency groups. The results provide essential guidance for investors and policymakers aiming to improve risk management and develop targeted strategies in the volatile cryptocurrency market.

AI.tldr: 本研究应用Engle和Campos-Martins（2023）提出的新方法，分析了加密货币子行业（如PoW、PoS和智能合约平台）的共同波动性（COVOL），揭示了宏观经济因素对其波动模式的影响，为投资者和政策制定者提供了风险管理策略的指导。
AI.research_question: 加密货币子行业（如PoW、PoS和智能合约平台）的共同波动性（COVOL）如何受宏观经济因素影响？
AI.motivation: 加密货币市场的高波动性及其子行业的独特风险特征需要更深入的分析，以帮助投资者和政策制定者优化风险管理策略。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Engle和Campos-Martins（2023）提出的共同波动性（COVOL）理论框架。
AI.method: 使用2016年3月至2024年4月期间17种最大加密货币的样本数据，应用COVOL方法分析子行业的波动模式。
AI.findings: 不同加密货币子行业（如PoW、PoS和智能合约平台）表现出独特的波动模式，受宏观经济因素（如期限利差和利率）驱动。COVOL是市场波动和相关性的强预测指标。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了加密货币波动性研究的理论框架，验证了COVOL方法在分析子行业波动性中的有效性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者和政策制定者提供了优化风险管理策略的实用指导，特别是在高波动的加密货币市场中。

title: Bank Efficiency and Stability as Short- and Long-Term Determinants of Sovereign Credit Risk
affiliations: Universidad de Zaragoza and University of Zaragoza

detail.title: Bank Efficiency and Stability as Short- and Long-Term Determinants of Sovereign Credit Risk
detail.abstract: This paper investigates the role of banking sector fundamentals as short‑ and long‑term determinants of sovereign credit ratings. Building on a panel of annual ratings from Moody’s, S&P, and Fitch for over 104 countries between 1996 and 2022, we augment a macro‑fiscal model with contemporaneous and time‑averaged measures of bank efficiency, profitability, capitalization and liquidity. Adopting a fully Bayesian framework with a LASSO shrinkage prior, we estimate a linear panel model via three sampling algorithms: the Bayesian Gibbs Slice Sampler (BGSS), its QR decomposition (QR‑BGSS), and the No‑U‑Turn Sampler (NUTS). Our findings reveal that sustained improvements in bank efficiency and robust capital buffers significantly elevate sovereign ratings over the long term, while short‑run banking shocks receive comparatively little weight. We also document some heterogeneity across agencies. Profitability’s unexpected long‑run negative association with ratings suggests that persistently high returns may mask risk‑taking behaviours detrimental to sovereign creditworthiness. Finally, and from a methodological viewpoint, we find that BGSS and QR‑BGSS deliver virtually identical posterior inferences to NUTS at a fraction of the computational cost, highlighting their potential for scalable, real‑time credit‐risk applications

AI.tldr: 本文研究了银行业基本面作为主权信用评级的短期和长期决定因素的作用，发现银行效率和资本缓冲对长期评级有显著提升作用，而短期银行冲击影响较小。
AI.research_question: 银行业基本面如何影响主权信用评级的短期和长期决定因素？
AI.motivation: 探讨银行业对主权信用评级的影响，填补现有研究的空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于宏观财政模型，引入银行效率、盈利能力、资本化和流动性指标。
AI.method: 采用贝叶斯框架和LASSO收缩先验，使用BGSS、QR-BGSS和NUTS三种采样算法估计线性面板模型。

detail.title: Mergers and Acquisitions as a Growth Strategy
detail.abstract: The Ethiopian banking sector is undergoing a significant transformation, marked by an increasing number of domestic financial institutions and a recent pivotal policy shift that has opened the door to foreign banks after decades of a closed market.1 This liberalization, while promising for overall economic growth, introduces a new era of competition, particularly for nascent domestic banks. These institutions now face the prospect of competing with potentially larger, more experienced, and technologically advanced foreign entities, creating an urgent need to explore strategies that can rapidly enhance their scale and competitiveness.

title: Öcalan’s U-Turn from Resisting to Embracing Turkey
affiliations: Middle East Forum

detail.title: Öcalan’s U-Turn from Resisting to Embracing Turkey
detail.abstract: Abdullah Öcalan’s recent call for the PKK to disarm and integrate into the Turkish nation-state marks a dramatic departure from the movement’s foundational principles. Declaring that the Kurdish struggle’s core aim “has been achieved,” Öcalan overlooks the Turkish state’s continued repression and its lack of legal or constitutional recognition of Kurdish identity. His insistence on disarmament without guarantees risks dissolving decades of resistance in exchange for unfulfilled promises. At a time when regional shifts could open historic opportunities for Kurdish autonomy in Syria and Iraq, Öcalan’s approach threatens to squander a moment that may not come again.

AI.tldr: 阿卜杜拉·奥贾兰近期呼吁库尔德工人党（PKK）解除武装并融入土耳其民族国家，这与该运动的基本原则形成鲜明对比。他声称库尔德斗争的核心目标“已经实现”，却忽视了土耳其政府持续的镇压以及对库尔德身份的法律或宪法承认的缺失。他坚持在没有保障的情况下解除武装，可能使数十年的抵抗因未兑现的承诺而瓦解。在当前地区局势可能为库尔德自治在叙利亚和伊拉克带来历史性机遇的时刻，奥贾兰的做法可能浪费这一可能不再来的机会。
AI.research_question: 奥贾兰呼吁PKK解除武装并融入土耳其民族国家的提议是否合理？
AI.motivation: 探讨奥贾兰的提议对库尔德运动及其未来可能的影响。

AI.method: 文献分析与批判性评论。
AI.findings: 奥贾兰的提议忽视了土耳其政府的持续镇压，且缺乏对库尔德身份的保障，可能使库尔德运动的成果付诸东流。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了在民族冲突中，领导人的决策可能与社会运动的长期目标相冲突。
AI.practical_contributions: 为库尔德运动及其支持者提供了对当前局势的批判性视角，警示盲目妥协的风险。

title: Evaluation of Deep Tunnel Sewer System in Mitigating Urban Flood Damage: An Econometric Approach
affiliations: Chungnam National University, University of Seoul and Jeonbuk National University - Department of Economics

detail.title: Evaluation of Deep Tunnel Sewer System in Mitigating Urban Flood Damage: An Econometric Approach
detail.abstract: Climate change is intensifying the risk of urban flooding, particularly in densely populated cities, such as Seoul in South Korea. Deep tunnel sewer systems (DTSS) have been developed as a primary infrastructural response to mitigate flood risks; however, empirical evidence of their actual effectiveness remains limited. This study evaluates the flood mitigation effect of South Korea’s first operational DTSS, located in Yangcheon District in Seoul. Using district-level panel data on flood damage and rainfall from 2010 to 2023, we apply Difference-in-Differences and Synthetic Difference-in-Differences methods to evaluate the effectiveness of the DTSS in reducing flood damage. The results consistently showed that the DTSS substantially reduced monetarily quantified flood damage, with estimated reductions ranging from 97.6% to 99.2% across the specifications and methods. These findings provide empirical support for the cost-effectiveness of large-scale flood infrastructure investments, offering real-world validation that moves beyond simulation-based assessments.

AI.tldr: 本文评估了韩国首尔阳川区深隧排水系统（DTSS）在减少洪水损害方面的实际效果，发现其显著降低了洪水损害。

AI.practical_contributions: 为城市防洪基础设施投资提供了现实依据。

affiliations: Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University, Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University, Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University, Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University, Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University, Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University, Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University and Don Mariano Marcos Memorial State University

detail.title: Cytobacillus (Bacillus) Firmus: An Endophytic Bacterium Isolated from Avicennia Marina (Gray Mangrove) in La Union, Philippines

declarations.ethicsApproval: Necessary permits were secured for the collection.

detail.abstract: This study focused on the isolation, morphological characterization, and molecular identification of an endophytic bacterium from Avicennia marina, a dominant mangrove species. The bacterium, identified as Cytobacillus firmus (previously classified under Bacillus) using 16S rRNA sequence, is Gram-positive, rod-shaped, and endospore-forming. It was successfully isolated from the pneumatophores of A. marina found along the eco-tourism trail in Bauang, La Union, Philippines. Identification was meticulously performed through a combination of traditional morphological assessment and advanced molecular analysis, confirming its classification. These findings contribute to the understanding of microbial diversity within Philippine mangrove ecosystems by detailing the presence and precise identification of this endophyte. This research provides a foundation for further investigations into the diverse endophyte communities within Philippine mangrove ecosystems and their potential contribution to developing sustainable disease management strategies in agriculture, while also raising concerns regarding the proper use of chemicals in controlling plant diseases.

title: Roots Of Change: Cultivating Environmental Awareness Through Rural Participation In India
affiliations: Hidayatullah National Law University

detail.title: Roots Of Change: Cultivating Environmental Awareness Through Rural Participation In India
detail.abstract:
Focusing on the environment is crucial to address India's escalating environmental issues, which include deforestation, water scarcity, pollution, and climate variability. Despite great efforts, massive segments of the Indian population, particularly in rural and village areas, remain unaware of the importance of environmental protection. This lack of information has led to exploitation of natural resources, unsustainable practices, and environmental degradation. This paper highlights the critical position of people's participation in promoting ecological awareness and sustainable practices across India, with particular awareness of rural areas where the connection between communities and nature is deeply intertwined. 

India's rural population, which constitutes nearly 65% of the total, is closely dependent on natural sources of livelihood. However, Ignorance of sustainability has resulted in indiscriminate extraction of groundwater, deforestation, and poor waste control. According to the National Green Tribunal, more than 70% of the rural water in our bodies is polluted due to inadequate waste management, while deforestation continues to push upwards. These issues highlight the urgent need for tailored environmental education in rural areas. 

This paper examines the success of local fads such as Village Forest Committees under the Joint Forest Management Program, which expanded forest cover by 30%, and national campaigns, along with the Swachh Bharat Abhiyan and Jal Shakti Abhiyan, which mobilized one thousands upon thousands for sustainable practices. Programs like the National Green Corps, bringing together more than 200,000 schools, show the potential of teaching a younger era about conservation.

Persistent barriers, including socio-financial inequality, illiteracy, and limited access to records, impede progress. Integrating environmental education into higher education curricula, involving panchayats and self-service corporations, and leveraging digital systems are critical to empowering rural groups. 

This observation implies that well-informed citizens, supported through local initiatives and authority rules, are essential for sustainable development. Empowering rural India with know-how and tools can reduce the beneficial use of resources and achieve long-term ecological stability.

title: International Transport Infrastructure and Regional Economic Development
affiliations: Maastricht University - Department of Economics, INSE at Peking University and Shenzhen University

detail.title: International Transport Infrastructure and Regional Economic Development

publicationDetails.journalName: CESifo Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: We evaluate how access to international transport infrastructure promotes trade and economic development. Exploiting the gradual unfolding of transcontinental rail freight connections between China and Europe, our empirical findings indicate increasing exports from connected cities, with positive spillovers to neighboring cities and other indicators economic activity. Not all products and cities are equally responsive to new rail export opportunities. We set up a multi-sector heterogeneous firms model with a rich specification of trade costs, in which firms optimize trade costs by choosing alternative transportation modes and routes. Leveraging a unique data set on trade flows between Chinese cities, we calibrate our model to discuss local welfare effects, relying on sufficient statistics that quantify changes in city-level trade costs. We also highlight significant spatial distributional effects of trade infrastructure development.

AI.tldr: 研究评估了国际交通基础设施对贸易和经济发展的促进作用，利用中欧铁路货运的逐步开通，发现连接城市的出口增加，并对周边城市及其他经济活动产生积极溢出效应。不同产品和城市的反应存在差异。通过多部门异质性企业模型和独特数据集，量化了贸易成本变化对地方福利的影响，并揭示了贸易基础设施发展的空间分配效应。

title: The Determinants and Consequences of U.S. Firms' Differences in Post-Pandemic Inflation Expectations
affiliations: SKEMA Business School

detail.title: The Determinants and Consequences of U.S. Firms' Differences in Post-Pandemic Inflation Expectations
detail.abstract: This study introduces a novel measure of inflation expectations among U.S. firms post-COVID, using large language models (LLMs) to classify expectations as transitory or persistent during the high-inflation period. The measure strongly correlates with established inflation indicators, such as the Consumer Price Index and Cleveland Fed estimates. We investigate the drivers of heterogeneity in these expectations, including sector, CEO age, geographical location, and labor market tightness. Our findings reveal that firms with older CEOs, located in regions with tight labor markets, were more likely to expect inflation to be persistent post-pandemic. Furthermore, firms expecting transitory inflation significantly reduced short-term borrowing and inventory, while firms with persistent inflation expectations increase capital expenditures. These results highlight the economic implications of heterogeneous inflation expectations, while providing a novel approach to measuring disaggregated inflation expectations.

AI.tldr: 本研究利用大型语言模型（LLMs）对美国企业在后疫情时代对通胀预期的分类（暂时性或持续性）提出了一种新测量方法，发现其与传统通胀指标高度相关，并探讨了企业异质性预期的驱动因素及其经济影响。
AI.research_question: 如何测量和解释美国企业在后疫情时代对通胀的异质性预期？
AI.motivation: 高通胀时期，企业对通胀的预期差异可能影响其经济行为，但现有研究缺乏对异质性预期的测量和分析。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于通胀预期理论和企业行为理论，结合大型语言模型（LLMs）的分类能力。
AI.method: 使用大型语言模型（LLMs）对通胀预期进行分类，并与传统通胀指标（如CPI和克利夫兰联储估计）进行相关性分析；探讨企业异质性预期的驱动因素。
AI.findings: 企业CEO年龄较大、位于劳动力市场紧张地区的企业更倾向于认为通胀是持续性的；预期暂时性通胀的企业减少短期借贷和库存，而预期持续性通胀的企业增加资本支出。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种基于LLMs的新方法测量企业异质性通胀预期，丰富了通胀预期理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 揭示了企业通胀预期的异质性对其经济行为的影响，为政策制定者和企业提供了决策参考。

title: Is it Time to Put a Moratorium on List Experiments for Domestic Violence Elicitation?
affiliations: University of Oslo - Ragnar Frisch Centre for Economic Research and OsloMet - Oslo Metropolitan University

detail.title: Is it Time to Put a Moratorium on List Experiments for Domestic Violence Elicitation?

publicationDetails.journalName: CESifo Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: Using data from over 24,000 respondents in the Norwegian Crime Victimization Survey, we conducted a double list experiment to measure domestic violence (DV). Both list experiments revealed a statistically significant decrease in reporting when including a sensitive DV item. This clear violation of the “no design effects” assumption is not only explained by floor effects. One possibility is that the results indicate a "fleeing" behavior whereby respondents try to avoid association with DV. Combined with the inherent power limitations of list experiments in many contexts, these results underscore the need for caution in employing list experiments to measure DV, even inlarge samples

AI.tldr: 本文通过挪威犯罪受害调查的24,000多名受访者数据，使用双重列表实验测量家庭暴力（DV）。两项列表实验均显示，在包含敏感DV项目时，报告率显著下降。这一结果不仅由地板效应解释，还可能表明受访者试图避免与DV关联的“逃避”行为。结合列表实验在许多情境中的固有局限性，这些结果强调在测量DV时需谨慎使用列表实验，即使在大样本中。
AI.research_question: 如何通过双重列表实验准确测量家庭暴力（DV）的报告率？
AI.motivation: 家庭暴力（DV）是一个敏感话题，传统调查方法可能导致报告偏差。列表实验被认为能减少这种偏差，但其在DV测量中的有效性尚不明确。

AI.method: 使用挪威犯罪受害调查的24,000多名受访者数据，进行双重列表实验。
AI.findings: 包含敏感DV项目时，报告率显著下降，表明可能存在“逃避”行为。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了列表实验在测量敏感话题时的局限性，挑战了“无设计效应”假设。
AI.practical_contributions: 提醒研究者在测量DV时需谨慎使用列表实验，即使在大样本中也可能存在偏差。

title: Circular Economy: Transition to Sustainable Development or a New Model of Economic Transformation

detail.title: Circular Economy: Transition to Sustainable Development or a New Model of Economic Transformation
detail.abstract: The present study and research aim to briefly analyse the development of the idea of realizing a circular economy in Bulgaria. A comprehensive review of the basic strategic documents developed in Bulgaria, such as a national strategy and an action plan in this direction, is made, by defining and analyzing the goals and objectives in detail. Emphasis is placed on the problems that have arisen during the implementation and the author's analysis of the current state is made, which is considered as part of the general state of the country and the European Union. Examples are given to support the author's theses, as well as those that serve to support the conclusions and conclusions. The circular economy is examined in both planes as a revolutionary model or a model that exists and is being upgraded. The main emphasis is placed on the approaches and relevant sectors in which the principles of the circular economy can and are successfully applied. The development is supported by a project survey and statistical data from Eurostat. Bulgaria is significantly lagging behind in implementing the strategy and planned activities, which is a result of the political crisis of the last few years and the inability to elect a regular government. All this and a complex of economic and other social factors further complicate the situation and create obstacles to the implementation of the national strategy.

title: Mind the Income Gap: How Public Transit Shapes Labor Market Inequality
affiliations: Duke University

detail.title: Mind the Income Gap: How Public Transit Shapes Labor Market Inequality
detail.abstract: This paper examines the socioeconomic impacts of the Expo Line Phase II extension in Los Angeles, using a Difference-inDifferences (DiD) framework with microdata from the IPUMS USA database. I compare areas directly affected by the new transit line to adjacent control areas, focusing on changes in public transit usage, labor market outcomes, and indicators of gentrification. Results suggest a substantial increase in public transit usage and a significant decline in unemployment rates in treated areas relative to controls. Additionally, monthly rents rose significantly, accompanied by a modest increase in the share of college-educated residents, suggesting early signs of gentrification. Effects are estimated relative to a 2013-2015 pre-treatment baseline, and pre-trend validity is confirmed through a placebo regression using only pre-treatment years. These findings contribute to understanding how major public transit investments can reshape local labor markets and urban inequality.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了洛杉矶Expo Line二期扩建的社会经济影响，采用双重差分法（DiD）分析IPUMS USA数据库的微观数据，发现公共交通使用率显著上升、失业率下降，同时租金上涨，表明早期绅士化迹象。

title: Threshold Effect of Bioenergy Technology on Carbon Intensity in US and China: The Role of Capital Accumulation, Education and Inequality
affiliations: Xinjiang Normal University, East China University of Political Science and Law (ECUPL), Beijing Technology and Business University, University of Florida and University of Florida

detail.title: Threshold Effect of Bioenergy Technology on Carbon Intensity in US and China: The Role of Capital Accumulation, Education and Inequality
detail.abstract: Bioenergy technology holds significant promise for reducing carbon intensity and fostering sustainable development, yet its impact remains unclear. This article employs both a panel threshold model and a random forest model, analyzing data from the primary administrative regions in the United States and China to explore the threshold effects and regional heterogeneity of bioenergy technology on carbon intensity. In the United States, the impact of bioenergy technology on carbon intensity initially shows a positive effect, which later turns negative as per capita capital stock increases. The technology's inhibitory effect strengthens with higher levels of education but becomes insignificant as the Gini coefficient rises. In China, increasing per capita capital stock shifts the impact of bioenergy technology from negative to insignificant, while higher education levels enhance its inhibitory effect. The Gini coefficient, however, does not significantly affect the technology's impact. Additionally, these threshold effects exhibit notable regional variations. The findings provide valuable policy insights for optimizing the use of bioenergy technology to mitigate carbon intensity.

AI.tldr: 本文通过面板阈值模型和随机森林模型，分析了美国和中国的数据，发现生物能源技术对碳强度的阈值效应和区域异质性。研究结果为优化生物能源技术以降低碳强度提供了政策启示。

title: Democratizing AI Governance: A Commons-Based Model for ASEAN's Skills Transition
affiliations: The University of Sydney

detail.title: Democratizing AI Governance: A Commons-Based Model for ASEAN's Skills Transition
detail.abstract: Business-Process Outsourcing (BPO) remains a key ladder for over 8 million ASEAN women. Median entry wages are around $410/month, yet IMF automation models put 18% of voice-support roles at risk. LLM automation erodes entry tasks, threatening recent female gains while AI-secure jobs demand training. How can governments and industry turn LLMs from a displacement threat into a community-governed productivity multiplier that develops AI-complementarity skills to avert displacement and safeguard women’s human capital?

AI.tldr: BPO是东盟800万女性的重要职业阶梯，但自动化和LLM技术威胁其就业机会。研究探讨如何通过政府和行业合作，将LLM从威胁转变为生产力工具，保护女性人力资源。
AI.research_question: 政府和行业如何将LLM从就业威胁转变为社区治理的生产力倍增器，以培养AI互补技能，避免女性劳动力被替代？

title: Can Country Policy and Institutional Frameworks Reduce Global Inflation?
affiliations: Central Bank of Nigeria

detail.title: Can Country Policy and Institutional Frameworks Reduce Global Inflation?
detail.abstract: The study investigates the effect of country policy and institutional frameworks (CPIFs) on global inflation while controlling for the rate of unemployment and economic growth rate from 2005 to 2023. The country policy and institutional frameworks examined are the economic management policies, social inclusion/equity policies, structural policies, and public sector management and institutions. The findings reveal that public sector management and institutions as well as social inclusion and social equity policy have a significant effect on global inflation. The results imply that the presence of strong public sector management and institutions lead to a significant decrease in the inflation rate while social inclusion and social equity policies lead to an increase in the inflation rate. The implication of the findings is that public sector management and institutions as well as social inclusion and social equity policies are crucial for the persistence of global inflation.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了2005年至2023年间国家政策和制度框架（CPIFs）对全球通胀的影响，同时控制了失业率和经济增长率。研究发现，公共部门管理和制度以及社会包容与公平政策对全球通胀有显著影响。

AI.motivation: 探讨政策与制度对全球通胀的影响，为政策制定提供依据。

title: Zoning Reforms and Housing Affordability: Evidence from the Minneapolis 2040 Plan
affiliations: Middlebury College and Middlebury College

detail.title: Zoning Reforms and Housing Affordability: Evidence from the Minneapolis 2040 Plan

declarations.declarationOfInterest: No personal or financial relationships relevant to this project.

detail.abstract: In December 2018, Minneapolis became the first U.S. city to eliminate single-family zoning through the Minneapolis 2040 Plan, a landmark reform with a central focus on improving housing affordability. This paper estimates the effect of the Minneapolis 2040 Plan on home values and rental prices. Using a synthetic control approach we find that the reform lowered housing cost growth in the five years following implementation: home prices were 16% to 34% lower, while rents were 17.5% to 34% lower relative to a counterfactual Minneapolis constructed from similar metro areas. Placebo tests document these housing cost trajectories were the lowest of 83 donor cities (p=0.012). The results remain consistent and robust to a series of subset analyses and controls. We explore the possible mechanism of these impacts and find that the reform did not trigger a construction boom or an immediate increase in the housing supply. Instead, the observed price reductions appear to stem from a softening of housing demand, likely driven by altered expectations about the housing market.

AI.tldr: 明尼阿波利斯2040计划通过取消单户分区，显著降低了住房成本和租金增长，可能是通过改变市场需求预期实现的。
AI.research_question: 明尼阿波利斯2040计划对住房价值和租金价格的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在评估取消单户分区对住房市场的实际影响，以验证政策对住房可负担性的效果。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于住房市场供需理论，探讨政策干预对价格的影响机制。
AI.method: 采用合成控制法，比较政策实施前后明尼阿波利斯与类似城市的住房成本和租金变化。
AI.findings: 政策实施后五年内，房价降低了16%至34%，租金降低了17.5%至34%。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了政策干预通过改变需求预期而非直接增加供给来影响住房市场的理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为其他城市提供取消单户分区政策的实证支持，帮助改善住房可负担性。

title: Environmental Federalism
affiliations: Gujarat National Law University and Pt. Ravishankar Shukla University Raipur

detail.title: Environmental Federalism
detail.abstract: Sound governance is indispensable for sustainable development in a period of growing environmental challenges. The system of environmental federalism in India, whereby central and state governments cooperate to preserve the environment, is examined in this paper. It looks at how the Indian Constitution divides the several duties for environmental protection and what laws and court rulings have done to mold this intricate but cooperative system. The study reveals some important prospects, for example the ability for distributed decision-making that fits the very varied local ecosystems of the nation. However, it also highlights some major issues, such as the regular overlaps of jurisdiction that can impede what should be seamless paths for decisive action and the necessary clear fiscal picture for any effective federal effort. This paper adds to the current debate on Indian federalism

title: Designing Scale-Sensitive Risk-Sharing Models for Financing Green Hydrogen in India
affiliations: Tyche Investments - Climate Consulting Group

detail.title: Designing Scale-Sensitive Risk-Sharing Models for Financing Green Hydrogen in India
detail.abstract:
The study aims to identify and evaluate fit-for-purpose, scale-sensitive risk-sharing models to mobilize private capital for both large-scale industrial and decentralized green hydrogen projects in India. In the context of high investment risks, technology immaturity, and policy fragmentation, the research seeks to inform the design of a financing architecture that aligns with India's National Green Hydrogen Mission (NGHM) and broader climate finance goals. This research employs a qualitative, desk-based methodology using secondary data sources. It analyzes global best practices, national policy frameworks, and institutional arrangements to develop a typology of risk-sharing instruments. A comparative matrix is used to evaluate applicability by project scale, while thematic coding informs a tiered de-risking framework suitable for Indian hydrogen ecosystems.

The study identifies 12 risk-sharing instruments—including blended finance, PPPs, viability gap funding (VGF), sovereign guarantees, and results-based finance (RBF)—and categorizes them by their applicability to different hydrogen project typologies. It demonstrates that large-scale projects benefit from capital-intensive, sovereign-backed instruments, whereas small-scale and MSME-led applications require grant-based and performance-linked tools. Institutional coherence and policy predictability emerge as critical enablers for financial mobilization. This is the first study to offer a comparative typology of risk-sharing mechanisms tailored to India’s hydrogen sector, emphasizing scale-differentiated financial design. It proposes a four-tier de-risking architecture aligned with investor risk appetites, project characteristics, and implementation capacities. The research bridges the gap between climate finance theory and operational investment frameworks for green hydrogen in emerging markets. The findings can inform policymakers, DFIs, and private investors in structuring blended finance vehicles, PPP models, and credit enhancement schemes. It provides actionable insights for agencies such as MNRE, SECI, NIIF, and SIDBI to anchor de-risking strategies and align India’s green hydrogen finance ecosystem with global climate goals and Article 6 mechanisms.

title: Markups, Markdowns, and Bargaining in a Vertical Supply Chain
affiliations: UMR SMART, INRAE, University Paris-Saclay, INRAE, AgroParisTech, Paris-Saclay Applied Economics, Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich (LMU) and University Paris-Saclay, INRAE, AgroParisTech, Paris-Saclay Applied Economics

detail.title: Markups, Markdowns, and Bargaining in a Vertical Supply Chain

publicationDetails.journalName: CESifo Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: This article bridges monopoly, monopsony, and countervailing power theories to analyze their welfare implications in a vertical supply chain. We develop a bilateral monopoly model with bargaining that accommodates upstream monopsony and downstream monopoly power. In equilibrium, the “short-side rule” applies: the quantity exchanged is determined by the firm willing to trade less. Welfare is maximized when each firm’s bargaining power exactly countervails the other’s market power. Otherwise, double marginalization arises in the form of double markdownization under excessive downstream bargaining power, or double markupization under excessive upstream bargaining power. We offer novel insights for price regulation and competition policy.

AI.tldr: 本文通过结合垄断、买方垄断和抗衡力量理论，分析了垂直供应链中的福利影响。通过双边垄断模型和谈判机制，研究发现交易量由交易意愿较低的一方决定，福利最大化需双方议价能力与市场力量相互抵消。

title: Impact of Super-Aging on the Monetary Policy Environment: Implications for Korea
affiliations: Bank of Korea - Economic Research Institute, Bank of Korea - Economic Research Institute, Bank of Korea - Economic Research Institute, Bank of Korea - Economic Research Institute, Bank of Korea - Economic Research Institute, Bank of Korea - Economic Research Institute and Bank of Korea - Economic Research Institute

detail.title: Impact of Super-Aging on the Monetary Policy Environment: Implications for Korea

publicationDetails.detailsText: Bank of Korea "Chapter 3 in Korea Economic Outlook (May 2025)"
publicationDetails.journalName: Bank of Korea Economic Research Institute Research Paper Series

detail.abstract:
I. The study analyzes how population aging affects the monetary policy environment and explores appropriate policy responses. As of the end of 2024, Korea has become a “super-aged” society with over 20% of the population aged 65 or older, and it is projected to have the highest elderly population share among OECD countries by 2045.

II. Aging is found to induce structural shifts in the monetary policy environment—namely, slower growth, lower real interest rates, and weaker soundness of financial institutions—which can narrow monetary policy space and exacerbate trade-offs between policy objectives when the foundations of growth and financial stability weaken simultaneously. The sectoral breakdown of these structural shifts is as follows:

• Slower growth and lower real rates: An open-economy life-cycle model for Korea shows that aging reduces labor supply, thereby lowering potential growth, and through reduced investment and increased savings, exerts downward pressure on equilibrium real interest rates. For example, if fertility and life expectancy had remained at 1991 levels (1.71 births per woman; life expectancy 72.2 years), the equilibrium real rate in 2024 would have been approximately 1.4 percentage points higher. Scenario analyses incorporating future demographic projections likewise indicate persistent downward pressure on both growth and real rates.

• Modest disinflationary pressure: Panel data analyses across OECD countries, combined with simulations for Korea, suggest that aging is projected to exert downward pressure on inflation of about a 0.15 percentage point per year from 2025 to 2070. However, offsetting upward pressures—such as deglobalization, supply-chain restructuring, and climate change—imply significant uncertainty about the long-term inflation trajectory.

• Weakened financial stability foundations: An analysis of panel data covering 7,148 banks over 27 years in OECD countries shows that aging tends to reduce banks’ capital ratios and increase default risk, driven by declining profits and subsequent pursuit of higher-risk, higher-return activities. Institutions with lending structures heavily concentrated in real estate exhibit larger negative impacts.

III. Structural shifts due to aging should be addressed through structural reforms in the real and financial sectors rather than short-term measures. Should the low growth trend persist, calls for accommodative monetary policy may intensify. However, low growth driven by structural factors cannot be effectively addressed by short-term, demand-side policies and such measures may entail side effects including financial imbalances. Therefore, a sustainable solution should be sought through structural reforms aimed at strengthening the fundamentals of the real and financial sectors.

IV. Specifically, structural reforms in the real and financial sectors should proceed as follows: To offset the decline in labor supply caused by aging, policies should expand female labor force participation and support continued employment among older workers. At the same time, improving youth employment, housing, and childcare conditions is necessary to encourage fertility recovery. To boost total factor productivity, policymakers should promote technological innovation and enhance the efficiency of resource allocation across the economy. Given that real estate–focused lenders are more vulnerable to aging effects, the current reliance on lending-based real estate financing needs to be gradually reduced. Additionally, in light of the financial market’s sensitivity to external price variables, the base of the demand for the Korean won must be broadened, and foreign exchange markets should be deepened to enhance stability and resilience.

V. These structural reforms are expected to raise real interest rates and potential growth, thereby expanding monetary policy space and reinforcing the foundations of financial stability. Scenario analyses indicate that, if three structural reforms are implemented—a gradual recovery in fertility to the OECD average, expanded employment among older cohorts, and a 0.5 percentage point increase in TFP growth—both real interest rates and potential growth will be approximately 1 percentage point higher on average during 2025–2070, compared to a no- reform baseline. Higher real rates would widen policy space and alleviate structural constraints on monetary policy; stronger growth would bolster borrowers’ profitability and soundness, strengthening the foundation of financial stability.

VI. In addition, efforts to enhance monetary policy effectiveness under the changed conditions should be pursued. These include continued refinement of the environment for open market operations to better reflect aging-induced changes in the policy environment; improved policy communication to more effectively manage market expectations; the use of an integrated policy framework that combines multiple instruments to achieve policy objectives; and, in particular, stronger coordination between monetary policy and macroprudential measures to improve overall policy effectiveness.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析了人口老龄化如何影响货币政策环境，并探讨了适当的政策应对措施。研究发现老龄化会导致经济增长放缓、实际利率下降和金融机构稳健性减弱，从而缩小货币政策空间并加剧政策目标间的权衡。建议通过实际和金融部门的结构性改革来解决这些问题。
AI.research_question: 人口老龄化如何影响货币政策环境，以及应采取哪些政策应对措施？
AI.motivation: 韩国已成为“超高龄”社会，预计到2045年将成为OECD国家中老年人口比例最高的国家。老龄化可能对经济增长、利率和金融稳定产生深远影响，因此需要研究其对货币政策环境的影响及应对策略。

title: On the Long-Run Effects of Multihoming in Platform Markets
affiliations: Yonsei University and Yonsei University

detail.title: On the Long-Run Effects of Multihoming in Platform Markets
detail.abstract: Two platforms engage in an infinite-horizon competition in two-sided markets. A group of new consumers arrive each period and live for two periods, and "old consumers" form an installed base "one side," who interact with "the other side" formed by new consumers. We consider two regimes-the one where multihoming is allowed and the other where it is not-and derive a unique linear Markov perfect equilibrium for each regime. Multihoming allowance slows down the convergence to the steady state, but improves steady state total surplus, and this welfare-improving effect is higher when the platforms are more patient. Under certain conditions, the platforms prefer to restrict multihoming due to higher steady state profits, so the firms' incentives can be misaligned with the social and consumers' incentives.

AI.tldr: 两平台在双边市场中无限期竞争，新消费者每期到达并存活两期，旧消费者形成安装基础。研究多归属允许与否两种制度下的线性马尔可夫完美均衡。多归属减缓稳态收敛但提高稳态总剩余，平台更耐心时福利效应更强。某些条件下平台因更高稳态利润倾向限制多归属，企业与社会及消费者激励不一致。
AI.research_question: 双边市场中多归属允许与否如何影响平台竞争、稳态福利及企业与社会激励的一致性？

title: Low-Rank Covariance Estimation via Randomized Singular Value Decomposition for Scalable Portfolio Optimization

detail.title: Low-Rank Covariance Estimation via Randomized Singular Value Decomposition for Scalable Portfolio Optimization
detail.abstract: Classic mean-variance optimization of investment portfolios relies on the accurate estimation of the covariance matrix of asset returns for optimization. However, in a high-dimensional setting, where the asset universe comprises hundreds to thousands of symbols, covariance matrices are frequently too noisy and ill-conditioned, often resulting in portfolios that underperform. This paper examines the application of randomized singular value decomposition to enable low-rank approximation of a high-dimensional covariance matrix, thereby improving the signal-to-noise ratio that supports optimization gradient methods.

detail.abstract:
This book, Silent Wheel of America profound economic contributions of immigrants who have shaped and continue to shape the American landscape. While the Statue of Liberty welcomes newcomers with its iconic promise, the reality for many immigrants is a silent struggle – a journey fraught with challenges, sacrifices, and unwavering determination. Their stories, often untold, are the driving force behind this work.

We often hear statistics about immigration's impact on the US economy, but those numbers rarely capture the human element. This book aims to bridge that gap. Through meticulous research, analysis of economic data, we will explore the multifaceted contributions of immigrants – from their tireless work in essential sectors to their groundbreaking innovations and crucial role in times of crisis.

The chapters will explore into the historical context of immigration to the United States, examining the patterns, challenges, and economic impacts throughout different eras. This isn't simply an economic analysis; it’s a social commentary. We'll address the policy implications affecting immigration and economic growth, examine the complex interplay of cultural integration and economic benefits, and discuss the critical issue of public perception and its influence on economic opportunities for immigrants. Also, we will highlight the unique experiences and contributions of immigrant women and explore the impact of immigration at both local and national levels.

This book is intended as a valuable resource for students and scholars across numerous disciplines including political science, sociology, finance, economics, Administrative science, Management, Immigration, Travel, History and statistics. Its comprehensive exploration of past, present, and future trends in immigration and its economic consequences offers a wealth of knowledge and insight. It is my hope that Silent Wheel of America will contribute to a more significant understanding of immigrants and its crucial role in the ongoing American story. It's time to strengthen the voices and acknowledge the enduring legacy of these unseen economic heroes.

title: Infiltration Control Efficiency of Soil Cover Thickness in Reducing Coal Gangue Leachate Under Simulated Rainfall Conditionsinfiltration Control Efficiency of Soil Cover Thickness in Reducing Coal Gangue Leachate Under Simulated Rainfall Conditions

detail.title: Infiltration Control Efficiency of Soil Cover Thickness in Reducing Coal Gangue Leachate Under Simulated Rainfall Conditionsinfiltration Control Efficiency of Soil Cover Thickness in Reducing Coal Gangue Leachate Under Simulated Rainfall Conditions
detail.abstract: A B S T R A C T: The massive accumulation of coal gangue not only occupies large areas of land but also poses serious environmental threats. Using coal gangue for backfill reclamation offers an effective solution to these issues by enabling both land rehabilitation and solid waste utilization. This study investigates the regulation of rainfall infiltration by varying soil cover thicknesses through a combination of numerical simulations, laboratory soil column experiments, and field-scale infiltration monitoring.  Based on measured hydraulic parameters of soil and coal gangue, the water movement under both short-term and long-term rainfall scenarios was simulated using the Van Genuchten model. The results indicate that: (1) under extreme short-term rainfall, a 50 cm intermediate soil layer significantly delays infiltration, reducing interface moisture content by approximately 40% and effectively minimizing leachate generation; (2) although increasing the cover thickness to 70–100 cm further delays infiltration, the marginal benefits decline; (3) a stratified structure consisting of 5 m coal gangue alternated with 0.5 m soil layers, topped by a 1 m surface layer, facilitates smooth moisture transitions and reduces deep percolation under prolonged rainfall; (4) even under extreme rainfall conditions (50 cm/day), the system maintains hydrological stability; and (5) multi-objective optimization using NSGA-II suggests that a total soil cover thickness of 50–60 cm achieves a favorable balance between leachate control, economic cost, and ecological risk in both arid and humid regions.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过数值模拟、实验室土柱实验和现场监测，探讨了不同土壤覆盖厚度对降雨渗透的调控作用，提出了一种优化的煤矸石回填结构，以平衡渗滤液控制、经济成本和生态风险。
AI.research_question: 如何通过调节土壤覆盖厚度来优化煤矸石回填的降雨渗透调控效果？
AI.motivation: 煤矸石的大量堆积不仅占用土地，还对环境造成严重威胁，利用煤矸石进行回填复垦是一种有效的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Van Genuchten模型模拟水和煤矸石的水力参数，研究短期和长期降雨情景下的水分运动。
AI.method: 结合数值模拟、实验室土柱实验和现场监测，分析不同土壤覆盖厚度对渗透的影响。
AI.findings: 1. 50 cm中间土层显著延迟渗透；2. 覆盖厚度增至70–100 cm时边际效益下降；3. 分层结构（5 m煤矸石+0.5 m土层+1 m表层）优化水分过渡；4. 极端降雨下系统保持稳定；5. NSGA-II多目标优化建议50–60 cm总覆盖厚度。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了Van Genuchten模型在煤矸石回填渗透调控中的适用性，提出了优化的分层结构。
AI.practical_contributions: 为煤矸石回填工程提供了具体的土壤覆盖厚度建议，平衡了渗滤液控制、经济成本和生态风险。

title: Decisions Without Execution: The Crisis of Effectiveness of State Administrative Courts in the Indonesian Administrative Law System
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Decisions Without Execution: The Crisis of Effectiveness of State Administrative Courts in the Indonesian Administrative Law System
detail.abstract: Plato, through Politea and Nomos, offers guidance on the structure of legal order and state administration to adapt to changes within the community. Therefore, stakeholders, specifically state administrative officials should act according to their duties and authorities in line with applicable provisions (law in abstracto) and specifically comply with court decisions as concrete law (law in concreto). The compliance ensures the creation of legal certainty and justice. This study used a normative legal method through a literature review combined with a case study method focusing on the State Administrative Court (“PTUN”) in Mataram, Indonesia. The following study problems were addressed, namely (1) How effective is the implementation of the PTUN decisions in Indonesia in this case? and (2) What factors influence the ineffectiveness of the Court’s decisions implementation?. The results showed that the implementation of the State Administrative Court’s decisions was ineffective due to the absence of a dedicated executive enforcement institution, weak sanctions against disobedient officials, and a bureaucratic culture permissive of legal violations. The three factors emphasized that the weaknesses in Indonesian administrative law originated from the substance of the law as well as the institutional structure and the legal culture of a bureaucracy that did not comply with court decisions.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了印度尼西亚国家行政法院（PTUN）判决的执行效果及其影响因素，发现执行不力源于缺乏专门执行机构、对违规官员的制裁薄弱以及官僚文化容忍违法行为。

title: Sustainable Pilgrimage Corridor: A Case of Vrindavan

detail.title: Sustainable Pilgrimage Corridor: A Case of Vrindavan
detail.abstract: Vrindavan, a sacred town in Uttar Pradesh's Mathura district, holds immense spiritual importance in Hinduism as the legendary playground of Lord Krishna. Despite its global pilgrimage appeal, the urban environment of Vrindavan is under severe stress due to unmanaged religious tourism, unregulated commercial expansion, and fragmented civic infrastructure. Core precincts like the Banke Bihari Temple zone, Loi Market, Yamuna Ghats, and the 21-kilometer Parikrama Marg experience extreme congestion, sanitation challenges, and environmental degradation, especially during peak festivals. The absence of a coordinated urban planning mechanism has resulted in piecemeal interventions, compromising both spiritual sanctity and urban functionality. This study proposes a Comprehensive Pilgrimage Corridor that integrates sacred geography, pedestrian connectivity, heritage preservation, and ecological restoration within a unified governance framework. Anchored around the Banke Bihari precinct and extending to Nidhivan, Keshi Ghat, Rangji Temple, and other religious-spiritual landmarks, the project seeks to transform Vrindavan into a model of sustainable pilgrimage urbanism. Key features include the creation of a Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) for coordinated implementation, rehabilitation zones for affected vendors and residents, smart mobility interventions, and financial models combining state, central, and private funding mechanisms. Drawing on successful case studies like the Kashi Vishwanath and Mahakal corridors, this initiative presents Vrindavan as a replicable model of spiritual urban renewal. It emphasizes inclusive stakeholder participation, heritage-sensitive design, and long-term ecological and economic sustainability. The proposal reimagines the sacred landscape not only as a devotional terrain but as an evolving urban form where spiritual experience, environmental responsibility, and community well-being coexist harmoniously.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一项综合朝圣走廊计划，旨在解决印度Vrindavan因宗教旅游和商业扩张导致的城市环境问题，通过整合神圣地理、步行连通性、遗产保护和生态恢复，打造可持续朝圣城市模型。

title: Machine Learning-Assisted Photoelectrochemical Biosensor Based on In2o3@Znin2s4 Z-Scheme Heterostructures for Portable Analysis of Ascorbic Acid
affiliations: Anhui Polytechnic University, Anhui Polytechnic University, Anhui Polytechnic University, Anhui Polytechnic University, Anhui Polytechnic University, Anhui Polytechnic University, Southern University of Science and Technology and Anhui Polytechnic University

detail.title: Machine Learning-Assisted Photoelectrochemical Biosensor Based on In2o3@Znin2s4 Z-Scheme Heterostructures for Portable Analysis of Ascorbic Acid
detail.abstract: Photoelectrochemical (PEC) sensing is an emerging analytical technology prized for its high sensitivity, rapid response, and portability. Herein, In2O3@ZnIn2S4 (In2O3@ZIS) artificial Z-scheme heterostructures were synthesized via a facile in-situ epitaxial growth method. Thermodynamic and kinetic investigation of the charge transfer studies revealed that the In2O3@ZIS Z-scheme heterostructure significantly enhanced the photoelectrode's photo-generated electron-hole separation efficiency and light-harvesting capability. The optimized photoelectrode achieved a remarkable photocurrent density of 39.33 μA/cm², marking an 86.60-fold enhancement over pristine ZIS (0.454 μA/cm²). Leveraging this platform, a portable PEC detection system was self-constructed for the ultrasensitive detection of ascorbic acid (AA). The sensor demonstrated a linear response ranging from 10-7 M to 10-2 M with a low detection limit (LOD) of 29.9 nM. Furthermore, an artificial neural network (ANN) algorithm was employed to train 152 experimental data and generated a predictive regression model for AA. This model exhibited high accuracy (R² = 0.9984) and low prediction error (<10%) for the prediction of AA. This work provides a promising approach for high-accuracy, intelligent, and portable detection of AA.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于In2O3@ZnIn2S4 Z型异质结构的光电化学传感技术，显著提升了光电性能，并开发了一种便携式检测系统用于抗坏血酸的高灵敏度检测。
AI.research_question: 如何通过In2O3@ZnIn2S4 Z型异质结构提升光电化学传感性能，并实现抗坏血酸的高灵敏度检测？
AI.motivation: 光电化学传感技术因其高灵敏度、快速响应和便携性而备受关注，但现有技术的光电性能和检测精度仍有提升空间。
AI.theoretical_framework: Z型异质结构理论、光电化学传感原理、人工神经网络算法。
AI.method: 通过原位外延生长法合成In2O3@ZnIn2S4 Z型异质结构，并构建便携式光电化学检测系统，结合人工神经网络算法进行数据分析。
AI.findings: In2O3@ZnIn2S4异质结构显著提升了光电性能（光电流密度提升86.60倍），检测系统对抗坏血酸的线性响应范围为10-7 M至10-2 M，检测限低至29.9 nM。人工神经网络模型预测精度高（R²=0.9984）。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了Z型异质结构在光电化学传感中的高效性，为相关研究提供了理论支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 开发了一种高精度、智能化的便携式抗坏血酸检测系统，具有实际应用潜力。

detail.title: Fuzzy, Intuitionistic and Neutrosophic Set Theories and Their Applications in Decision Analysis Editors
detail.abstract: This book explores the development and importance of these mathematical approaches in managing uncertainty and imprecision in decision-making, and focuses on the practical applications of these theories in decision-making, demonstrating how they improve uncertainty modeling and facilitate more effective decision-making across various fields. By leveraging these frameworks, decision-makers can better navigate complexity, leading to more accurate and dependable outcomes. Ultimately, it  highlights the progression from fuzzy to intuitionistic fuzzy to neutrosophic set theories as a significant advancement in capturing and analyzing uncertainty within decision-making contexts.

AI.tldr: 本书探讨了数学方法在决策中管理不确定性和模糊性的发展与重要性，并聚焦于这些理论在决策中的实际应用，展示了它们如何改进不确定性建模并在各领域促进更有效的决策。

title: Does Exposure to POSHAN Abhiyaan Reduce the Risk of Malnutrition among Children Aged 6-23 Months: Evidence from High-Burden Districts of Malnutrition in India, 2019-21
affiliations: University of Delhi - Institute of Economic Growth (IEG) and University of Delhi - Institute of Economic Growth (IEG)

detail.title: Does Exposure to POSHAN Abhiyaan Reduce the Risk of Malnutrition among Children Aged 6-23 Months: Evidence from High-Burden Districts of Malnutrition in India, 2019-21

declarations.declarationOfInterest: Authors declare that there is no conflict of interest.
declarations.funderStatement: There is no funding for the preparation of this manuscript

detail.abstract: Childhood wasting, underweight, and anaemia are major health concerns in developing countries, especially during the critical “First 1,000 Days” from conception to age two. India’s POSHAN Abhiyaan, launched in 2018, aimed to combat undernutrition among women and children through a multisectoral approach. This study assessed its impact on children aged 6–23 months in 315 priority districts using multivariate logistic regression and Propensity Score Matching (PSM). Results showed that children exposed to the programme had 25% lower odds of wasting, 13% lower odds of being underweight, and 24% lower odds of anaemia, though no significant effect was observed on stunting. PSM estimates confirmed a significant average treatment effect on the treated for these outcomes. POSHAN Abhiyaan’s success is attributed to innovations in service delivery, skill enhancement of frontline workers through the Incremental Learning Approach (ILA), and the use of digital tools like the POSHAN Tracker for effective monitoring and accountability.

AI.tldr: 印度POSHAN Abhiyaan计划通过多部门合作和创新服务交付方式，显著降低了6-23个月儿童的消瘦、体重不足和贫血风险，但对发育迟缓无显著影响。
AI.research_question: POSHAN Abhiyaan计划对6-23个月儿童的营养状况有何影响？
AI.motivation: 解决发展中国家儿童消瘦、体重不足和贫血等健康问题，尤其是在关键的“生命最初1000天”内。
AI.theoretical_framework: 多部门合作、创新服务交付、数字工具监控。
AI.method: 采用多元逻辑回归和倾向得分匹配（PSM）分析315个优先地区的数据。
AI.findings: 计划显著降低了消瘦（25%）、体重不足（13%）和贫血（24%）的风险，但对发育迟缓无显著影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了多部门合作和创新服务交付在改善儿童营养状况中的有效性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为类似项目提供了可借鉴的创新模式，如增量学习法和数字监控工具。

title: Machine Learning for Timing: Evidence from U.S. and Chinese Stock Markets
affiliations: Guangdong University of Finance & Economics, Beijing Jiaotong University, School of Economics and Management, Hunan University and Xiamen University

detail.title: Machine Learning for Timing: Evidence from U.S. and Chinese Stock Markets
detail.abstract: This paper reevaluates the longstanding debate in finance concerning the relative importance of stock selection versus timing, in the context of the increasing adoption of machine learning and big data in asset management. Focusing on both the U.S. and Chinese stock markets, we propose a novel methodology that integrates machine learning for stock selection with price-based signals for portfolio timing. Our findings reveal that, across both markets, stock selection driven by machine learning methods demonstrates strong return predictability, whereas timing signals show limited efficacy, particularly when accounting for trading costs. We conclude that the marginal contribution of timing within a machine learning-based stock selection framework is relatively constrained, a pattern that is consistent across both the U.S. and Chinese markets. Additionally, our study delves into "learning from machine learning", examining the characteristic differences of portfolios constructed via machine learning and valuing the relative importance of various characteristics.

AI.tldr: 本文重新评估了金融领域长期争论的股票选择与择时的重要性，结合机器学习和大数据在资产管理中的应用。研究发现，机器学习驱动的股票选择具有强预测性，而择时信号效果有限。
AI.research_question: 在机器学习和大数据背景下，股票选择与择时在资产管理中的相对重要性如何？
AI.motivation: 探讨机器学习和大数据如何改变传统股票选择与择时的有效性，为资产管理提供新视角。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于金融学中的资产定价理论和机器学习方法。
AI.method: 提出一种结合机器学习股票选择和价格信号择时的新方法，应用于中美股市。
AI.findings: 机器学习驱动的股票选择具有强预测性，择时信号效果有限，尤其在考虑交易成本时。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了机器学习在股票选择中的优势，挑战了传统择时的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为资产管理提供了基于机器学习的股票选择框架，减少对择时的依赖。

title: Swap Line Dollar Supply
affiliations: University of St.Gallen

detail.title: Swap Line Dollar Supply
detail.abstract: The lack of globally representative data on OTC FX derivatives has left the transmission mechanism of Federal Reserve swap lines to offshore borrowing rates only partially understood. Using a new data source based on worldwide settlement records, I uncover the swap line supply channel: non-U.S. banks temporarily park swap line liquidity with U.S. dealers in the interbank FX market, reducing dealers' inventory funding needs in times of stress and thereby leading to narrower effective spreads charged to the real economy. I develop a simple model of trading to show the observed dynamics reflect either precautionary liquidity hoarding or arbitrage by non-U.S. banks, and propose a testable hypothesis to distinguish between the two.

AI.tldr: 本文通过全球结算记录数据揭示了美联储互换额度对离岸借款利率的传导机制，发现非美国银行在银行间外汇市场临时存放互换额度流动性，从而在压力时期减少交易商的库存融资需求，降低实体经济面临的有效利差。
AI.research_question: 美联储互换额度如何传导至离岸借款利率？
AI.motivation: 全球OTC外汇衍生品数据缺乏，导致对美联储互换额度传导机制的理解不完整。
AI.theoretical_framework: 互换额度供给渠道理论，包括流动性囤积和套利行为。
AI.method: 使用全球结算记录数据，开发交易模型分析动态。
AI.findings: 非美国银行临时存放互换额度流动性，减少交易商融资需求，降低实体经济有效利差。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出互换额度供给渠道理论，区分流动性囤积与套利行为。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供优化互换额度设计的依据。

title: Optimal Policy Design for Teacher Recruitment
affiliations: University of Toulouse 1 - Toulouse School of Economics (TSE)

detail.title: Optimal Policy Design for Teacher Recruitment
detail.abstract: This paper studies the design of higher education policies targeted at improving teacher recruitment. I leverage the introduction of a policy in Chile that aimed to raise teacher quality by crowding-in higher performing students into Education programs, while crowding-out the lower-performing ones. Exploiting the sharp assignment rule I estimate that, at the threshold, enrollment of high performing students at teacher colleges increased by 42%, with low-income students coming disproportionately from non-enrollment. The policy generated a positive composition effect of 0.25SD in test scores, which lead to an increase in 0.11SD in Teacher Value Added and 0.12SD in Teaching Skills. I develop a general equilibrium model of the higher education market. In doing so, I present a novel method for solving discrete-continuous games in large markets. Counterfactual simulations show that alternative policies can improve the distribution of students that enroll in Education programs. The distribution of college quality limits the impact on Teacher Value Added, while Targeting the policy to low-income students can yield further gains at no additional cost.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了旨在提高教师招聘质量的高等教育政策设计，利用智利的一项政策，通过吸引高分学生进入教育项目并排除低分学生来提升教师质量。研究发现，政策显著提高了高分学生的入学率，并改善了教师的教学能力和价值。
AI.research_question: 如何设计高等教育政策以提高教师招聘质量？
AI.motivation: 通过政策干预吸引高质量学生进入教育项目，从而提升教师队伍的整体水平。
AI.theoretical_framework: 利用一般均衡模型分析高等教育市场，并提出解决离散-连续博弈的新方法。
AI.method: 利用智利政策的分配规则进行估计，并开发一般均衡模型进行反事实模拟。
AI.findings: 政策使高分学生入学率增加42%，教师价值增加0.11SD，教学技能提升0.12SD。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出解决离散-连续博弈的新方法，扩展了一般均衡模型的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 政策建议包括针对低收入学生的定向干预，可在不增加成本的情况下进一步改善效果。
