title: The Personalist Penalty: Varieties of Autocracy and Economic Growth
affiliations: University of Chicago, Harris School of Public Policy, University of Chicago and Princeton University - Princeton University

detail.title: The Personalist Penalty: Varieties of Autocracy and Economic Growth

publicationDetails.detailsText: University of Chicago, Becker Friedman Institute for Economics Working Paper No. 2025-95
publicationDetails.journalName: Becker Friedman Institute for Economics Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: Studies of income and regime type typically contrast democracies and autocracies, ignoring heterogeneity in the character of authoritarian regimes. We focus on the consequences of personalist rule, where power is concentrated in an individual or small elite. Extending the dynamic panel strategy of Acemoglu, Naidu, Restrepo, and Robinson (2019), we estimate the differential growth performance of democracies, institutionalized autocracies, and personalist autocracies. Across eight GDP series, eight autocracy codings, and six measures of personalism, we observe a consistent pattern: Whenever an “autocratic penalty” emerges, it is concentrated in personalist regimes. The growth performance of institutionalized dictatorships, in contrast, is statistically indistinguishable from that of democracies. We document evidence that the “personalist penalty” is driven by some combination of low private investment, poor public-goods provision, and conflict. These findings emphasize the analytic payoff of unpacking autocracy and highlight the different incentives facing leaders with narrow and broad bases of power.

AI.tldr: 研究发现，独裁政权中的个人主义统治（权力集中在个人或小团体）对经济增长有显著负面影响，而制度化的独裁政权与民主政体的经济增长表现无显著差异。
AI.research_question: 个人主义独裁政权与制度化的独裁政权及民主政体在经济增长表现上有何差异？
AI.motivation: 现有研究通常将独裁政权视为同质化，忽略了其内部差异，尤其是个人主义统治的独特性及其对经济的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Acemoglu等人的动态面板策略，研究独裁政权的异质性对经济增长的影响。
AI.method: 使用八种GDP数据系列、八种独裁政权编码和六种个人主义衡量标准，进行统计分析。
AI.findings: 个人主义独裁政权表现出明显的“独裁惩罚”，经济增长显著低于民主政体；而制度化独裁政权的经济增长表现与民主政体无显著差异。
AI.theory_contributions: 强调了独裁政权内部异质性的重要性，尤其是个人主义统治对经济的负面影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于不同政权类型对经济增长影响的实证依据，强调了权力分配对经济表现的重要性。

title: ЦИВІЛЬНА ОБОРОНОЗДАТНІСТЬ: МІЖДИСЦИПЛІНАРНІ ВИМІРИ НАУКОВОЇ ПРОБЛЕМИ (Civil Resistance Capability: Interdisciplinary Dimensions Of A Scientific Problem)
affiliations: Hryhorii Skovoroda University in Pereiaslav

detail.title: ЦИВІЛЬНА ОБОРОНОЗДАТНІСТЬ: МІЖДИСЦИПЛІНАРНІ ВИМІРИ НАУКОВОЇ ПРОБЛЕМИ (Civil Resistance Capability: Interdisciplinary Dimensions Of A Scientific Problem)
detail.abstract:
This article substantiates the necessity of scholarly development of the concept of “civil resistance capability” in the context of the full-scale and hybrid war waged against Ukraine. The relevance of the topic stems from the growing need to conceptualize the role of the civilian population in the architecture of national resistance and in ensuring the resilience of society under prolonged threats. The aim of the study is to formulate an interdisciplinary conceptual framework for this new term and to determine its semantic content, structural components, and its connections with related categories in the fields of social, behavioral, and security sciences.

To achieve the stated objective, the research applies methods of conceptual analysis, systematization, comparative-terminological review, elements of structural-functional modeling, and interdisciplinary synthesis. Particular attention is paid to the phenomenological exploration of psychological, sociocultural, axiological, and behavioral determinants of the civilian population’s resistance capacity.

The study proposes an original definition of “civil resistance capability” as an integrative quality of individuals and communities, manifested in the ability to offer conscious, motivated, and morally grounded resistance to an aggressor by mobilizing value-based, cognitive, volitional, communicative, and socio-organizational resources. Six basic structural components of the phenomenon are outlined: value-motivational, cognitive, emotional-volitional, social, communicative, and behavioral. An adaptive-mobilizational model of their interaction is proposed. The concept is distinguished from related terms such as psychological resilience, mobilizational readiness, self-organization, and resistance by examining its semantic capacity and functional designation.

The practical value of the results lies in the applicability of the proposed conceptualization to the development of legal frameworks, educational programs, psychodiagnostic tools, and strategic documents aimed at enhancing societal resilience and organizing national resistance effectively. The study’s conclusions identify prospects for future empirical investigations focused on the operationalization of the construct, adaptation of measurement methodologies, and integration of resistance capability into broader security policies.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了在乌克兰全面战争和混合战争背景下发展“公民抵抗能力”概念的必要性，提出了一个跨学科的概念框架，并分析了其结构组成和与其他相关概念的区别。
AI.research_question: 如何在乌克兰战争背景下定义和构建‘公民抵抗能力’的概念框架？
AI.motivation: 随着平民在国家抵抗和社会韧性中的作用日益重要，需要系统化这一概念以支持相关政策和实践。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合社会、行为和安全科学的理论，分析公民抵抗能力的心理、社会文化和行为决定因素。
AI.method: 采用概念分析、系统化、比较术语学综述、结构功能建模和跨学科综合方法。
AI.findings: 提出了‘公民抵抗能力’的原创定义及其六个结构组成部分，并提出了一个适应性动员模型。
AI.theory_contributions: 为公民抵抗能力提供了跨学科的理论框架，区分了其与心理韧性、动员准备等概念的差异。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究成果可用于法律框架、教育计划和战略文件的制定，以增强社会韧性和国家抵抗能力。

title: Opacity as Authority: Arbitrariness and the Preclusion of Contestation
affiliations: University of Nantes - Faculty of Law and Political Science

detail.title: Opacity as Authority: Arbitrariness and the Preclusion of Contestation

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The author declares no financial or personal conflict of interest.
declarations.ethicsApproval: This article mentions and includes an appendix featuring an anonymized and altered excerpt of a human interaction, reconstructed solely for theoretical illustration. No formal ethics approval or written consent applies.
declarations.funderStatement: No funding was received for this study.

detail.abstract:
This article redefines arbitrariness not as a normative flaw or a symptom of domination, but as a foundational functional mechanism structuring human systems and interactions.
Diverging from critical traditions that conflate arbitrariness with injustice, it posits arbitrariness as a semiotic trait: a property enabling systems—linguistic, legal, or social—to operate effectively while withholding their internal rationale. Building on Ferdinand de Saussure’s concept of l’arbitraire du signe, the analysis extends this principle beyond language to demonstrate its cross-domain applicability, particularly in law and social dynamics.

The paper introduces the "Motivation → Constatability → Contestability" chain, arguing that motivation functions as a crucial interface rendering an act’s logic vulnerable to intersubjective contestation. When this chain is broken through mechanisms like “immotivization” or “Conflict Lateralization” (exemplified by “the blur of the wolf drowned in the fish”), acts produce binding effects without exposing their rationale, thus precluding justiciability.

This structural opacity, while appearing illogical, is a deliberate design protecting authority from accountability.

Drawing on Shannon’s entropy model, the paper formalizes arbitrariness as A = H(L∣M) (conditional entropy). It thereby proposes a modern theory of arbitrariness as a neutral operator central to control as well as care, an overlooked dimension of interpersonal relations. While primarily developed through human social systems, this framework also illuminates a new pathway for analyzing explainability in advanced artificial intelligence systems.

AI.tldr: 本文重新定义任意性，将其视为人类系统和互动的基础功能机制，而非规范性缺陷或支配症状。通过扩展索绪尔的符号任意性概念，提出任意性在语言、法律和社会动态中的跨领域适用性，并引入“动机→可观察性→可争议性”链，揭示其如何保护权威免受问责。
AI.research_question: 任意性如何作为功能机制在人类系统和互动中发挥作用？
AI.motivation: 传统批判理论将任意性与不公正混为一谈，本文试图重新定义任意性，揭示其在系统运作中的功能性作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于索绪尔的符号任意性理论，扩展至法律和社会动态领域，并引入香农的熵模型。
AI.method: 理论分析，结合符号学、法律和社会动态的跨领域研究。
AI.findings: 任意性通过“动机→可观察性→可争议性”链保护权威免受问责，是一种中性操作符。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出任意性作为功能机制的新理论框架，扩展了符号学和系统理论的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为法律和社会系统的设计提供新视角，并为人工智能系统的可解释性分析提供新路径。

title: Assessment of Electric Vehicle Charging Service Improvement Priorities Based on Online Review Mining and Sd-Kano Model
affiliations: Sichuan University, Sichuan University, Shandong University - School of Management and State Grid Shandong Electric Power Company

detail.title: Assessment of Electric Vehicle Charging Service Improvement Priorities Based on Online Review Mining and Sd-Kano Model
detail.abstract: Under the background of the rapid development of the electric vehicle industry, charging service quality has become a critical factor constraining user experience enhancement and sustainable industry development. This study, based on user online charging reviews, constructs a charging service improvement prioritization model that integrates text mining, dual importance analysis and demand classification. Firstly, natural language processing and fine-grained sentiment analysis methods are integrated to systematically deconstruct service attributes in review texts and quantify their sentiment orientation values. Then, we design a neural network-Kano joint model, revealing the nonlinear driving effects of service attribute sentiment orientations on user satisfaction through a Backpropagation Neural Network incorporating an attention mechanism, simultaneously combining an improved Kano model for service demand classification, and ultimately generating a three-dimensional Sentiment-Driver-Kano (SD-Kano) decision matrix that integrates dual importance of service attributes (emotional expression intensity, satisfaction driving effects) and Kano types. Finally, an experiments demonstrates that this model can precisely identify the positioning and user perception characteristics of different service attributes, and proposes several targeted service attribute improvement priorities and resource allocation strategies. The research outcomes provide charging service operators with a scientifically rigorous and operationally practical decision-support tool for implementing differentiated resource allocation and service efficiency enhancement.

AI.tldr: 本研究基于电动汽车用户在线充电评论，构建了一个结合文本挖掘、双重重要性分析和需求分类的充电服务改进优先级模型，为运营商提供科学决策支持。
AI.research_question: 如何基于用户在线充电评论构建一个科学的充电服务改进优先级模型？
AI.motivation: 充电服务质量是制约用户体验和行业可持续发展的关键因素，需通过科学方法识别改进优先级。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合自然语言处理、情感分析、神经网络-Kano联合模型及SD-Kano决策矩阵。
AI.method: 整合文本挖掘、双重重要性分析、需求分类，设计神经网络-Kano联合模型。
AI.findings: 模型能精准定位服务属性，提出改进优先级和资源分配策略。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出SD-Kano决策矩阵，丰富了服务改进理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为运营商提供差异化资源分配和服务效率提升的工具。

title: An Efficient Heuristic Algorithm for Stochastic Multi-Timescale Distribution Network Reconfiguration with High Renewables
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and North China Electric Power University

detail.title: An Efficient Heuristic Algorithm for Stochastic Multi-Timescale Distribution Network Reconfiguration with High Renewables

keywords.keywords: Distribution network reconfigurationMulti-timescaleStochastic optimizationModel predictive controlOptimal power flow

detail.abstract: To handle the uncertainties brought by the increasing penetration of renewable energy sources and random loads, we design a stochastic multi-timescale distribution network reconfiguration (SMTDNR) framework to coordinate diverse scheduling resources across different timescales and develop an efficient heuristic algorithm to solve this complex NP-hard combinatorial optimization problem efficiently. First, the SMTDNR problem is established, incorporating distributed renewable generators, fuel generators, energy storage systems, and controllable loads, simplified through circular constraint linearization, Jabr relaxation, and second-order cone (SOC) relaxation techniques. Then, a one-stage multi-timescale successive branch reduction (MTSBR) algorithm is developed for distribution networks with one redundant branch, which transforms the SMTDNR problem into an SMTOPF problem. This is extended to a two-stage MTSBR algorithm for general networks with multiple redundant branches, which iteratively runs the proposed one-stage MTSBR algorithm. Numerical results on modified IEEE 33-bus and 123-bus distribution networks validate the superior optimality, feasibility, and computational efficiency of the proposed algorithms, particularly under high renewable penetration and increased uncertainty scenarios, offering robust and feasible solutions where traditional methods may fail.

AI.tldr: 本文设计了一个随机多时间尺度配电网重构框架（SMTDNR），以应对可再生能源和随机负荷带来的不确定性，并提出了一种高效的启发式算法来解决这一复杂的NP难组合优化问题。
AI.research_question: 如何设计一个高效的框架和算法，以协调多时间尺度的调度资源，应对可再生能源和随机负荷带来的不确定性？
AI.motivation: 随着可再生能源渗透率的提高和随机负荷的增加，配电网面临更大的不确定性，传统方法可能无法提供鲁棒和可行的解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于循环约束线性化、Jabr松弛和二阶锥（SOC）松弛技术，简化了SMTDNR问题。
AI.method: 提出了一种单阶段多时间尺度连续分支缩减（MTSBR）算法，并将其扩展为适用于多冗余分支网络的两阶段MTSBR算法。
AI.findings: 在改进的IEEE 33总线和123总线配电网上的数值结果表明，所提算法在最优性、可行性和计算效率方面表现优越，尤其是在高可再生能源渗透率和不确定性增加的场景下。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了SMTDNR框架和MTSBR算法，为多时间尺度配电网重构问题提供了新的理论解决方案。
AI.practical_contributions: 所提算法在实际应用中能够提供鲁棒和可行的解决方案，优于传统方法。

title: Factors Influencing the Success of Smart Construction Technology
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and Korea Aerospace University

detail.title: Factors Influencing the Success of Smart Construction Technology
detail.abstract: The construction industry is introducing smart construction technology to improve productivity and ensure the safety of facilities. Smart construction technology has not spread as much as expected due to the rigidity of the traditional production system, and this study aims to analyze and present the factors affecting the success of smart construction technology. A research model was established to reflect the characteristics of smart construction technology based on the information system (IS) success theory and the technology acceptance model (TAM). An empirical analysis was conducted through the responses of 199 people surveyed online and offline for construction industry workers. It was found that variables that affect the usefulness include connection quality, systems, and services, as well as user innovation. Smart construction technology infrastructure and users' innovation and usefulness have been found to affect their intention to use, and intelligence, service quality, and user innovation suitable for field characteristics have been found to affect ease of use. Factors affecting the performance of smart construction technology were found to be both usefulness and intention to use. The results of this study confirmed a causal relationship model that explains the factors influencing the success of smart construction technology. The results suggest that smart construction technology policymakers need to establish and implement policies for the parallel development of surrounding ecosystems to lead the development of smart construction technology. Smart construction technology development and sellers need to develop incentive programs that encourage users' innovation. It was confirmed that the expansion and development of the surrounding ecosystem were necessary for the success of smart construction technology.

AI.tldr: 本研究基于信息系统成功理论和技术接受模型，分析了影响智能建造技术成功的因素，发现连接质量、系统服务、用户创新等变量对技术有用性和使用意愿有显著影响，并提出政策建议。
AI.research_question: 哪些因素影响智能建造技术的成功？
AI.motivation: 智能建造技术未如预期普及，传统生产系统的僵化是主要原因，需分析其成功因素。
AI.theoretical_framework: 信息系统成功理论（IS Success Theory）和技术接受模型（TAM）。
AI.method: 通过线上线下调查199名建筑业工人，进行实证分析。
AI.findings: 连接质量、系统服务、用户创新影响有用性；基础设施和用户创新影响使用意愿；智能化和服务质量影响易用性；有用性和使用意愿影响技术绩效。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了智能建造技术成功的因果模型，扩展了IS和TAM理论的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议政策制定者推动生态系统发展，技术开发者设计激励用户创新的方案。

title: New Trends in Neutrosophic Theories and Applications, Volume IV
affiliations: University of New Mexico and Nandalal Ghosh B.T. College

detail.title: New Trends in Neutrosophic Theories and Applications, Volume IV
detail.abstract:
The domain of neutrosophic set theory has been undergoing significant and rapid expansion. New approaches, theories, strategies, and optimization techniques are developed at a swift rate. An important development in neutrosophic theory is its integration with existing set theories, such as soft set theory, rough set theory and more. Neutrosophic set has been extended to neutrosophic hyperset which is vast and extends across multiple disciplines and problem domains, from decision support and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to data analysis and complex systems modelling. A neutrosophic hypersoft set extends the flexibility of neutrosophic logic and soft set theory by considering multidimensional or hypersoft sets to address real-world complexities where information is incomplete, uncertain, or inconsistent. Neutrosophic theories have emerged as essential tools in a diverse range of disciplines, including, MCDM, data mining, biomedical research, social studies, and beyond.

The fourth volume of “New Trends in Neutrosophic Theories and Applications” focuses on theories, strategies, optimizing techniques for MCDM within neutrosophic frameworks. Some topics deal with introducing of Pythagorean hypersoft sets with possibility degree, quadripartitioned neutrosophic Lie-ideal of Lie-algebra, quadripartitioned neutrosophic quasi coincident topological space, neutrosophic supra-open set in neutrosophic supra topological space and neutrosophic soft matrices. Some topics deal with medical diagnosis, organ transplantation success using neutrosophic superhyperstructure and artificial intelligence. Some topics deal with revenue management, social situation. Some topics deal with MCDM in single valued neutrosophic set environment, rough set environment, and interval trapezoidal neutrosophic environment.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了中智集理论的快速发展及其在多个领域的应用，特别是中智超软集在多维问题中的灵活性和实用性。第四卷聚焦于中智框架下的多准则决策（MCDM）理论和优化技术。
AI.research_question: 如何利用中智集理论（如中智超软集）解决现实世界中信息不完整、不确定或不一致的多维复杂问题？
AI.motivation: 中智集理论的快速发展和跨学科应用需求，特别是在MCDM、数据分析和复杂系统建模中的重要性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 中智集理论、软集理论、粗糙集理论、中智超软集理论。
AI.method: 理论扩展与优化技术（如Pythagorean超软集、四分区中智拓扑空间等）在MCDM和其他领域的应用。
AI.findings: 中智理论在MCDM、医疗诊断、社会研究等领域展示了强大的解决复杂问题的能力。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了中智集理论（如中智超软集）在多维问题中的应用，并提出了新的理论框架（如四分区中智拓扑空间）。
AI.practical_contributions: 为MCDM、医疗诊断、社会研究等实际问题提供了新的工具和方法。

title: Bounded Fuzzy Logic Control for Optimal Scheduling of Green Hydrogen Production and Revenue Maximisation
affiliations: Independent researcher, Ørsted AS, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Ørsted AS

detail.title: Bounded Fuzzy Logic Control for Optimal Scheduling of Green Hydrogen Production and Revenue Maximisation
detail.abstract: Hydrogen Purchase Agreements (HPAs) guarantee revenue streams that mitigate the financial risks inherent in the long-term production of green hydrogen from renewable energy sources. However, the intermittency of renewable electricity and the availability of parallel revenue opportunities in both the electricity and hydrogen markets complicate the scheduling of green hydrogen production. The scheduling should maximise the total revenue from short-term sales of electricity and hydrogen against the long-term HPA delivery obligations. This challenge is addressed by developing a Bounded Fuzzy Logic Control (BFLC) which determines the daily HPA delivery target based on day-ahead forecasts of electricity and hydrogen prices, as well as wind capacity factors. Subsequently, the daily target is imposed as a constraint in dispatch optimisation which allocates energy and hydrogen flows for each hour of the day.Revenue comparisons over several years demonstrate that the BFLC achieves total annual revenues within 9\% of optimal revenues that are based on perfect foresight. The BFLC revenues consistently exceed those of steady control, with the largest differences observed under conditions of elevated price levels and variability. The BFLC provides an effective long-term scheduling of green hydrogen production, enabling realistic revenue quantification that mitigates economic risks without overlooking economically viable projects.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种有界模糊逻辑控制（BFLC）方法，用于优化绿色氢生产的调度，以平衡短期电力与氢气销售和长期氢购买协议（HPA）交付义务的收入。BFLC基于电价、氢气价格和风能容量因子的预测，设定每日HPA交付目标，并通过调度优化实现。结果显示，BFLC的年收入接近完美预测下的最优收入，且优于稳态控制。
AI.research_question: 如何在可再生能源间歇性和电力与氢气市场并行收入机会的复杂情况下，优化绿色氢生产的调度以最大化总收入？
AI.motivation: 绿色氢生产的长期财务风险需要通过HPA缓解，但可再生能源的间歇性和多重收入机会增加了调度的复杂性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 有界模糊逻辑控制（BFLC）理论，结合调度优化方法。
AI.method: 开发BFLC方法，基于电价、氢气价格和风能容量因子的预测设定每日HPA交付目标，并通过调度优化分配能源和氢气流量。
AI.findings: BFLC的年收入接近完美预测下的最优收入（差距在9%以内），且显著优于稳态控制，尤其在价格高波动时表现更佳。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了BFLC方法，为绿色氢生产的长期调度提供了理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: BFLC能够有效量化收入，降低经济风险，同时确保经济可行的项目不被忽视。

title: Environmental, Economic, and Social Implications of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles for Last-Mile Delivery
affiliations: Zhejiang University, Zhejiang University, Zhejiang University and Zhejiang University

detail.title: Environmental, Economic, and Social Implications of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles for Last-Mile Delivery
detail.abstract: Unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) are technically appealing for last-mile parcel delivery, but its sustainability remains underexamined. Here we assess the life cycle environmental, economic and social impacts of three last-mile parcel delivery modes, namely BAU (parcels are delivered by an electric vehicle and a courier), UAV (parcels are delivered by UAVs), and CO (parcels are delivered by UAVs and electric vehicle), based on Monte Carlo simulations using real-world settings from a representative community. The results indicate that CO is the poorest-performing mode from the environmental perspective but is the best from the economic and social aspects. Our factorial analysis demonstrates that polymer lithium batteries reduce carbon emissions by 24.71% compared to lithium-ion batteries but cost 7.6 times more. We also observe that UAV generates lower carbon emissions in detached houses or for small parcels (0.10-1.99 kg and 0.0002-0.0199 m3) deliveries. Furthermore, we offer implications to guide research and practices.

AI.tldr: 本文评估了无人机（UAV）在最后一公里包裹配送中的可持续性，比较了三种配送模式（BAU、UAV、CO）的环境、经济和社会影响，发现CO模式在环境上表现最差，但在经济和社会方面表现最佳。
AI.research_question: 无人机在最后一公里包裹配送中的可持续性如何？
AI.motivation: 无人机在最后一公里配送中技术上有吸引力，但其可持续性尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 生命周期评估（LCA）和蒙特卡洛模拟。
AI.method: 基于蒙特卡洛模拟，使用真实社区数据评估三种配送模式的环境、经济和社会影响。
AI.findings: CO模式环境表现最差，但经济和社会表现最佳；聚合物锂电池比锂离子电池减少24.71%碳排放，但成本高7.6倍；无人机在独立住宅或小包裹配送中碳排放更低。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了无人机配送可持续性研究的空白，提供了生命周期评估的新视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为无人机配送的实践提供了指导，如电池选择和配送场景优化。

title: Mind the Gap! Cognitive and Structural Microfoundations in Brokerage Through International Networks
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and University of Adelaide

detail.title: Mind the Gap! Cognitive and Structural Microfoundations in Brokerage Through International Networks
detail.abstract: This study theorizes why and when brokers choose to connect foreign outsiders with local insiders, extending social exchange and power-dependence theories. In today’s complex global business environment, brokers play a key role in helping foreign entrepreneurs overcome the gap - liability of outsidership to access local networks. Yet, the cognitive and structural mechanisms behind brokers’ decisions remain underexplored. Drawing on a multiple-case study of Chinese entrepreneurs in France, we theorize a cognitive-structural framework centered on two dimensions: the relative attractiveness of outsiders (i.e., their perceived value in terms of resources, knowledge, and offerings), and the tolerance for outsider replaceability (i.e., brokers’ willingness to risk being bypassed after making an introduction). Our informants have played roles both as brokers and as outsiders, allowing us to capture how role-switching experiences shape their understanding of brokerage dynamics. While brokers are more likely to facilitate ties with highly attractive outsiders, their tolerance depends on the expected returns: it is ‘low’ when insiders offer more, ‘moderate’ when returns are in balance, and ‘high’ when outsiders are more valuable. This study thus advances international business research by revealing the microfoundations of brokerage as a strategic, power-sensitive process.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了中介者为何及何时选择将外国外来者与本地内部者连接，扩展了社会交换和权力依赖理论。通过多案例研究，提出了一个认知-结构框架，揭示了中介决策的微观基础。
AI.research_question: 中介者为何及何时选择将外国外来者与本地内部者连接？
AI.motivation: 在复杂的全球商业环境中，中介者在帮助外国企业家克服‘外来者劣势’中扮演关键角色，但其决策的认知和结构机制尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 社会交换理论和权力依赖理论。
AI.method: 基于中国企业家在法国的多案例研究。
AI.findings: 中介者更倾向于与高吸引力的外来者建立联系，但其容忍度取决于预期回报：当内部者提供更多时容忍度低，回报平衡时中等，外来者更有价值时高。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了中介作为一种战略性、权力敏感过程的微观基础。
AI.practical_contributions: 为国际商务中的中介行为提供了实践指导。

title: The Impact of Hospital Mergers & Acquisitions on the Access to Care and Health Outcomes for Medicaid Beneficiaries
affiliations: Brown University - Department of Health Services, Policy & Practice

detail.title: The Impact of Hospital Mergers & Acquisitions on the Access to Care and Health Outcomes for Medicaid Beneficiaries
detail.abstract: I investigate the short-term effects of hospital mergers & acquisitions (M&As) on (1) care access, (2) care processes, and (3) health outcomes for Medicaid beneficiaries. With ongoing hospital consolidation widening the gap between private health insurance (PHI) and Medicaid inpatient reimbursements in the US, a critical question arises: Do hospitals potentially neglect Medicaid beneficiaries in favor of the more lucrative PHI patients, or do larger hospital systems increase the efficiency and effectiveness of care for this population? Using a staggered difference-in-differences approach, I find that while hospital M&As result in an over 15.5% merger-induced increase in system market shares, they do not significantly impact care access, care processes, or health outcomes for Medicaid beneficiaries in the short term.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了医院并购对医疗补助受益人短期内的护理获取、护理流程和健康结果的影响，发现尽管并购增加了医院系统的市场份额，但对这些指标无显著影响。
AI.research_question: 医院并购是否会影响医疗补助受益人的护理获取、护理流程和健康结果？
AI.motivation: 美国医院合并加剧了私人医疗保险与医疗补助报销之间的差距，引发了对医疗补助受益人是否被忽视的担忧。
AI.theoretical_framework: 医院并购与医疗资源分配的经济学理论。
AI.method: 采用交错差分法（staggered difference-in-differences approach）进行分析。
AI.findings: 医院并购导致市场份额增加15.5%，但对医疗补助受益人的护理获取、流程或健康结果无显著短期影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 为医院并购对弱势群体影响的实证研究提供了新证据。
AI.practical_contributions: 政策制定者可参考研究结果，评估并购对医疗补助受益人的实际影响。

title: Streamflow Forecasting Based on Patch Time Series Transformer and Ensemble Learning Approaches
affiliations: University of Tabriz and University of Tabriz

detail.title: Streamflow Forecasting Based on Patch Time Series Transformer and Ensemble Learning Approaches
detail.abstract: Accurate streamflow forecasting plays a crucial role in efficient water resource management, flood mitigation, and hydrological planning. Traditional methods often face limitations in identifying and modeling the complex temporal dependencies inherent in streamflow data. Therefore, this study investigates the performance of two deep learning models— Patch Time Series Transformer (PatchTST) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) —for daily streamflow forecasting of the Sefidrud River. The LSTM model is capable of capturing sequential and long-term dependencies in time series, whereas PatchTST leverages the Transformer architecture to extract both local and global features simultaneously. To enhance forecasting accuracy, an ensemble learning approach, including Stacking and Weighted Averaging methods is proposed, aiming to exploit the complementary strengths of the two models. The number of input lags was determined using a VAR approach, with two streamflow lag terms selected as model inputs. Model performance was evaluated using both numerical metrics and graphical analyses. The results indicate that the proposed Stacking Ensemble method outperforms individual models, achieving an RMSE=1.593 m³/s, MAE=1.333 m³/s, NS=0.991, and CC= 0.998. These findings highlight the potential of the Stacking Ensemble as a robust and novel approach for hydrological forecasting, particularly for daily streamflow prediction in mountainous and semi-humid regions.

AI.tldr: 本研究比较了PatchTST和LSTM两种深度学习模型在Sefidrud河日流量预测中的表现，并提出了一种集成学习方法（Stacking和加权平均），结果显示Stacking集成方法优于单一模型。
AI.research_question: 如何利用深度学习和集成学习方法提高日流量预测的准确性？
AI.motivation: 传统方法在建模复杂时间依赖性方面存在局限性，需要更高效的预测方法以支持水资源管理和洪水防控。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于LSTM和Transformer架构的深度学习模型，以及集成学习方法（Stacking和加权平均）。
AI.method: 使用VAR方法确定输入滞后项，比较PatchTST和LSTM模型，并提出Stacking集成方法。
AI.findings: Stacking集成方法表现最佳（RMSE=1.593 m³/s，MAE=1.333 m³/s，NS=0.991，CC=0.998）。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了集成学习方法在流量预测中的有效性，为深度学习模型的应用提供了新思路。
AI.practical_contributions: 为山区和半湿润地区的日流量预测提供了一种高效、稳健的新方法。

title: A Brief Introduction to the Study of the Conceptual Development of Ethics in Early 20th-Century Egyptian Journalism
affiliations: The Autonomous University of Barcelona

detail.title: A Brief Introduction to the Study of the Conceptual Development of Ethics in Early 20th-Century Egyptian Journalism
detail.abstract: This note examines how early 20th-century Egyptian journalism reflected and reshaped ethical concepts like Amanah (honesty), highlighting changes in moral judgment amid political and cultural shifts.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了20世纪初埃及新闻业如何反映和重塑了如Amanah（诚实）等伦理概念，突出了政治和文化变迁中道德判断的变化。
AI.research_question: 20世纪初埃及新闻业如何反映和重塑伦理概念（如Amanah）？
AI.motivation: 研究政治和文化变迁对道德判断的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 伦理概念（如Amanah）及其在新闻业中的体现。
AI.method: 历史分析，聚焦早期20世纪埃及新闻业。
AI.findings: 新闻业在政治和文化变迁中重塑了伦理概念。
AI.theory_contributions: 深化了对伦理概念在动态社会背景下的理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 为现代新闻伦理提供了历史视角。

title: Public Communication and Collusion: New Screening Tools for Competition Authorities
affiliations: German Institute for Economic Research (DIW Berlin), University of Pennsylvania, German Institute for Economic Research (DIW Berlin), Students and Heinrich Heine University Dusseldorf - Duesseldorf Institute for Competition Economics (DICE)

detail.title: Public Communication and Collusion: New Screening Tools for Competition Authorities

publicationDetails.journalName: CESifo Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: Competition authorities increasingly rely on economic screening tools to identify markets where firms deviate from competitive norms. Traditional screening methods assume that collusion occurs through secret agreements. However, recent research highlights that firms can use public announcements to coordinate decisions, reducing competition while avoiding detection. We propose a novel approach to screening for collusion in public corporate statements. Using natural language processing, we analyze more than 300, 000 earnings call transcripts issued worldwide between 2004 and 2022. By identifying expressions commonly associated with collusion, our method provides competition authorities with a tool to detect potentially anticompetitive behavior in public communications. Our approach can extend beyond earnings calls to other sources, such as news articles, trade press, and industry reports. Our method informed the European Commission’s 2024 unannounced inspections in the car tire sector, prompted by concerns over price coordination through public communication.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种通过自然语言处理分析企业公开声明来检测共谋行为的新方法，为竞争监管机构提供了识别潜在反竞争行为的工具。
AI.research_question: 如何通过企业公开声明检测共谋行为？
AI.motivation: 传统筛查方法假设共谋通过秘密协议进行，但研究表明企业可能通过公开声明协调行为，避免被检测。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于自然语言处理和经济学的共谋理论。
AI.method: 分析2004年至2022年间全球30多万份财报电话会议记录，识别与共谋相关的表达。
AI.findings: 该方法成功识别出潜在的共谋行为，并为欧盟委员会2024年对汽车轮胎行业的突击检查提供了依据。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了共谋行为的检测方法，强调了公开声明在共谋中的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为监管机构提供了新的筛查工具，可应用于财报电话会议、新闻文章等多种公开信息源。

title: Individuals' Behaviour and Location Choices in High Environmental Risk Locations
affiliations: University of Naples Parthenope

detail.title: Individuals' Behaviour and Location Choices in High Environmental Risk Locations

declarations.declarationOfInterest: Gli autori dichiarano di non avere relazioni personali o finanziarie che possano essere interpretate come un potenziale conflitto di interessi in relazione a questo studio.
declarations.ethicsApproval: Lo studio ha coinvolto partecipanti umani tramite la somministrazione di un questionario completamente anonimo. È stato ottenuto il consenso informato da parte di tutti i partecipanti, i quali sono stati adeguatamente informati sulle finalità dello studio e sulla tutela della loro privacy. Non si è resa necessaria l’approvazione da parte di un comitato etico, in quanto non sono stati raccolti dati personali né sensibili.
declarations.funderStatement: La presente ricerca è stata condotta nell’ambito del dottorato di ricerca presso l’Università degli Studi di Napoli Parthenope, che ha fornito il supporto istituzionale e le risorse necessarie allo svolgimento dell’attività scientifica.

detail.abstract: The sequence of environmental disasters that has affected Italy in recent decades has influenced individuals' decisions about their location, especially in areas with high hydrogeological and seismic risk. This article aims to investigate the socioeconomic and behavioural factors that influence individuals' decisions to reside in areas of high environmental risk. Using Casamicciola Terme (Isola d'Ischia, Italy) as a case study, a multidisciplinary framework integrating environmental economics, risk perception theory and game-theoretic modelling is developed. In addition, an empirical survey was conducted to assess resident awareness, trust in institutions and preference for transfer or mitigation. The results reveal a persistent gap between perceived and actual risk, influenced by familiarity, socioeconomic resilience and institutional credibility. In addition, economic policy instruments such as insurance schemes, compensation and tax incentives can significantly influence willingness to move. The study helps to understand behavioural inertia in hazardous areas and proposes guidelines for targeted environmental policies in risk areas.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了影响个人选择居住在高环境风险区域的社会经济和行为因素，以意大利Casamicciola Terme为例，结合环境经济学、风险感知理论和博弈论模型，发现感知与实际风险间的差距受熟悉度、社会经济韧性和机构可信度影响，并提出经济政策工具可显著影响迁移意愿。

AI.method: 采用多学科框架，结合案例研究（Casamicciola Terme）和实证调查，评估居民意识、机构信任及迁移或缓解偏好。

title: Aggregate Demand Flexibility Optimization Mechanisms: Evaluation and Application in Wholesalemarkets and Smart Distribution Networks
affiliations: Polytechnic University of Valencia, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Universidad Católica de Cuenca, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Universidad de Cuenca

detail.title: Aggregate Demand Flexibility Optimization Mechanisms: Evaluation and Application in Wholesalemarkets and Smart Distribution Networks
detail.abstract: The growing integration of intermittent renewable energy sources and the evolution of electricity marketshave intensified the need for effective mechanisms to optimize aggregate demand flexibility. This study examinesvarious optimization strategies applied to wholesale electricity markets and smart distribution networks, aimingto improve the integration of demand-side flexibility into system planning and operation. A thorough analysis ofaggregation mechanisms focuses on enhancing market stability and efficiency. To support this, advanced mathematicalmodels and optimization techniques are used to assess the response of consumers to both economicand operational signals. The research also explores tools for managing demand flexibility in smart grids, highlightingpractical challenges and opportunities for implementing local energy transaction schemes. The studyincludes a comparative evaluation of different international methodologies, covering regulated and liberalizedelectricity markets. Based on these insights, recommendations are made regarding market design and incentivestructures to encourage active consumer participation in aggregate demand management. The findings showthat effectively integrating demand flexibility not only strengthens the system’s reliability but also facilitatesgreater penetration of renewable energy and reduces operational costs in wholesale markets and distributionnetworks. This work contributes to the ongoing discussion on demand-side management by offering analyticaltools and actionable proposals, helping pave the way for future applications in intelligent and sustainable energysystems.

detail.abstract: The case study of an institute upgrading to a Deemed University is analyzed in this work, and reported with more generic treatment. Though various initiatives reported have largely been a reactive response to the mandate of Deemed University framework, many situational corrections have been undertaken with strategically planned interventions firmly in place. Analysis of the case institute (name with-held because the institute remains in public (government) sector even after upgradation, and grant of autonomy), has been prescriptively built around the Joseph Juran quality model. The circumscribing objective of this work is to count how quality may be institutionalized in an academic setup. Cognizance is driven from AUM model – the acronym meaning as Alignment, Utilization and Metamorphosis, to elucidate the hierarchical progression of learner for excellent performance. Need of inculcating excellence is emphasized in this work.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析了一所学院升级为Deemed University的案例，并进行了更通用的处理。尽管许多举措是对Deemed University框架要求的被动回应，但也通过战略规划进行了情境修正。案例学院的分析基于Joseph Juran质量模型，旨在探讨如何在学术机构中制度化质量。研究强调了通过AUM模型（Alignment, Utilization, Metamorphosis）培养卓越的必要性。

AI.theoretical_framework: Joseph Juran质量模型和AUM模型（Alignment, Utilization, Metamorphosis）。

title: Comparing the Effect of Cross-Border and Domestic Mergers and Acquisitions on Acquirers' Price Reactions in the United States
affiliations: University of Bristol

detail.title: Comparing the Effect of Cross-Border and Domestic Mergers and Acquisitions on Acquirers' Price Reactions in the United States
detail.abstract: In the contemporary world, the Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A) market is remarkably dynamic, increasing in overall volume and value. Various factors influence the abnormal return of acquiring firms in M&A transactions, among which the cross-border status is particularly crucial. This study examines the effect of cross-border and domestic M&A transactions on acquirer price reactions, using a sample of 3893 M&A deals involving both public and private targets by United States listed firms, during the period 1999-2007. The results of the quantitative analysis indicate that cross-border M&A transactions generate lower stock returns for shareholders around the announcement date compared to domestic M&As. Additionally, acquirer size is negatively related to share returns, while the book-to-market ratio is positively associated with abnormal returns. Considering the public status of the target, this study finds that cross-border acquisitions of listed targets may lead to higher returns and mitigate the negative effects typically observed in cross-border M&As. With the findings, the study contributes to complementing existing literature and providing insights into M&A transactions by using comprehensive and typical M&A data. It suggests potential influencing factors for acquirers’ returns, emphasising cross-border complexity and targets’ public status. This study provides strategic insights for managers and valuable signals for individual investors, especially under today’s global market volatility. The findings bridge academic research with practical application, enriching the understanding of value creation in M&A activities, and offering a benchmark for future research on M&A.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了跨境与国内并购交易对收购方股价反应的影响，发现跨境并购在公告日附近为股东带来的股票回报低于国内并购，并分析了收购方规模、账面市值比及目标公司上市状态的影响。
AI.research_question: 跨境与国内并购交易对收购方股价反应有何不同影响？
AI.motivation: 并购市场日益动态化，跨境并购的复杂性及其对收购方回报的影响尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 并购异常回报理论，跨境并购复杂性理论。
AI.method: 定量分析，样本为1999-2007年3893笔美国上市公司的并购交易。
AI.findings: 跨境并购回报低于国内并购；收购方规模与回报负相关，账面市值比与异常回报正相关；目标公司上市状态可缓解跨境并购的负面影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 补充了并购异常回报的文献，强调了跨境复杂性和目标公司上市状态的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为管理者和投资者提供战略洞察，尤其在当前全球市场波动背景下。

title: Structural Equation Modeling of Sustainability Performance, Partnerships, and Leadership to the Global University Rankings
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Structural Equation Modeling of Sustainability Performance, Partnerships, and Leadership to the Global University Rankings
detail.abstract: This study aims to examine the relationships of sustainability performance, partnerships to achieve the 17 SDGs. and leadership competencies on global university rankings. The study is based on the theory of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR), the theory of Shareholder Value (SVT), and Transformational Leadership. This study used a cross-sectional explanatory research design involving 351 respondents from four state universities and colleges in Region VII, Philippines. The evaluation focused on 35 items, with 19 statements being eliminated after EFA and CFA. The SEM showed a satisfactory fit. The results challenge the established theories by revealing the lack of direct relationships between environmental sustainability and sustainability performance. Meanwhile, economic sustainability shows significant affect with CSR and SVT principles. The impact of social sustainability remains inconclusive, but partnerships affect sustainability performance. Leadership competencies affect the global rankings but not on sustainability performance. Acknowledging the limitations, this study recommends to expand the sample representation, incorporate empirical methods, explore the eliminated statements, conduct longitudinal and cross-cultural studies, encourage interdisciplinary collaboration, and evaluate policy impacts to develop more effective strategies for sustainability in Philippine HEIs.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了可持续发展绩效、实现17个可持续发展目标的伙伴关系以及领导力能力对全球大学排名的影响。研究发现经济可持续性与CSR和SVT原则显著相关，而环境可持续性与可持续发展绩效无直接关系。领导力能力影响全球排名，但不影响可持续发展绩效。
AI.research_question: 可持续发展绩效、伙伴关系和领导力能力如何影响全球大学排名？

AI.method: 采用横断面解释性研究设计，对菲律宾第七大区的四所州立大学和学院的351名受访者进行调查。通过EFA和CFA筛选35项指标，最终保留16项。使用SEM分析数据。

title: Machine Learning-Driven Optimization of Air Bubble Curtain Locations for Controlling Sea Water Intrusion
affiliations: Utah State University, Tarbiat Modares University, Utah State University, Tarbiat Modares University, Tarbiat Modares University and Tarbiat Modares University

detail.title: Machine Learning-Driven Optimization of Air Bubble Curtain Locations for Controlling Sea Water Intrusion
detail.abstract: Sea Water Intrusion (SWI) poses a significant threat to freshwater resources in coastal regions, and one promising mitigation strategy is the use of Air Bubble Curtains (ABCs), particularly through optimizing their discharge volume. This study conducted a total of 81 laboratory tests, varying flow rates, and salinity levels to evaluate the performance of ABCs in three distinct positions. Utilizing machine learning techniques—specifically Random Forest (RF), Extreme Gradient Boosting (XGBoost), and Support Vector Regression (SVR)—the research aims to identify the optimal locations for ABC installation (Lˊ) and their discharge (Qa). The findings indicate that the XGBoost model outperforms the others in predicting the discharge of ABCs, achieving R2 = 0.926, RMSE = 0.023, and MAE = 0.019. Utilizing XGBoost, sensitivity analysis revealed that the densimetric Froude number exerts the most significant influence on Qa. Optimization results utilizing XGBoost show that when the importance weights of objectives (ω Qa and ωLˊ) are equal, the optimal location ratio (Lˊ/Average freshwater depth) is approximately 0.52; however, as these weights change, the optimized location ratio varies accordingly. This flexible, weighted optimization approach allows decision-makers to tailor ABC positioning to their specific priorities, whether focusing on cost-effectiveness or water quality, ultimately enhancing the management of freshwater resources impacted by SWI.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过81次实验室测试和机器学习方法（RF、XGBoost、SVR）优化空气幕（ABCs）的安装位置和排放量，以应对海水入侵（SWI）。XGBoost模型表现最佳，R2=0.926，敏感性分析显示密度弗劳德数对排放量影响最大。优化结果表明，当目标权重相等时，最佳位置比为0.52。

AI.theory_contributions: 提出了基于机器学习的ABCs优化方法，验证了XGBoost模型的优越性，并揭示了密度弗劳德数的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为决策者提供了灵活的ABCs优化方案，可根据成本或水质需求调整安装位置，提升淡水资源的SWI管理效果。

title: Integrating Ai and Simulation for End-to-End Mine-to-Mill Optimisation: A Meta-Modelling Framework
affiliations: University of Adelaide, University of Adelaide and University of Adelaide

detail.title: Integrating Ai and Simulation for End-to-End Mine-to-Mill Optimisation: A Meta-Modelling Framework
detail.abstract: The growing global demand for mineral resources is challenging mining operations to maintain productivity while addressing lower-grade ore and increased extraction complexity. Despite the availability of vast datasets across mining stages, much of this information remains underused in decision-making. This study presents an integrated, knowledge-based framework that leverages artificial intelligence (AI) and high-fidelity simulation to model and optimise the full mine-to-mill process. Using publicly available data from the Barrick Cortez Mine in Nevada, USA, the mining chain from blasting to semi-autogenous grinding (SAG) was modelled using Orica’s Integrated Extraction Simulator (IES). To mitigate the computational burden of full factorial simulations, three million scenarios were generated to evaluate performance sensitivity. Machine learning models, including linear regression, decision trees, random forests, and XGBoost, were trained and validated. The models achieved an accuracy of more than 90%, underscoring their reliability for predicting fragmentation outcomes. SHapley Additive exPlanations (SHAP) were applied to interpret model predictions and quantify feature importance. The findings confirm a strong alignment between simulation and real-world data and highlight key operational parameters that affect downstream performance. This meta-model approach offers a powerful tool for real-time decision-making, enabling mining operations to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and support sustainable resource management.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于人工智能和高保真模拟的知识集成框架，用于优化从采矿到磨矿的全过程。通过机器学习模型和SHAP解释，验证了模拟与真实数据的高度一致性，并识别了影响下游性能的关键参数。

title: Conversational Ai for Inventory Optimization: Leveraging Large Language Models in Supply Chain Management
affiliations: Sidi Mohamed Ben Abdellah University Faculty of Science and Technology of Fez, Sidi Mohamed Ben Abdellah University Faculty of Science and Technology of Fez, Sidi Mohamed Ben Abdellah University Faculty of Science and Technology of Fez and Sidi Mohamed Ben Abdellah University Faculty of Science and Technology of Fez

detail.title: Conversational Ai for Inventory Optimization: Leveraging Large Language Models in Supply Chain Management
detail.abstract: The present-day business supply chains require proficient inventory management techniques to achieve operational superiority and minimize costs. Organization-wide operational delays along with inefficiencies emerge due to the absence of user-friendly real-time insights in traditional inventory systems. The research presents an advanced inventory management revolution through a new AI chatbot system based on Groq’s Large Language Model (LLM) system. Through the system interface, users can conduct natural language requests to verify inventory information and monitor stock activities while receiving practical recommendations without requiring specialized knowledge. The backend implements FastAPI to merge with CSV or NoSQL database structures while providing scalable performance. The Streamlitbased front-end delivers a user-friendly, accessible interface that solves user interaction problems effectively. Research experiments have confirmed that this solution delivers both superb precision with fast execution times and substantially better user satisfaction than typical industry systems show. The research demonstrates how LLMs establish major supply chain operation reductions through a flexible solution that connects sophisticated information systems to end users. The research further examines possible implementation methods to merge this AI system with enterprise resource planning (ERP)

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于Groq大型语言模型（LLM）的AI聊天机器人系统，用于优化库存管理，通过自然语言交互提供实时库存信息和实用建议，显著提升了操作效率和用户满意度。

title: Bidding Strategy for Building Load Aggregators Participating in Real-Time Demand Response Markets Based on Kde-Vine Copula-Td3
affiliations: Tianjin University - Department of Electrical Automation and Information Engineering, Tianjin University, Tianjin University, Tianjin University, Tianjin University, Tianjin University and Tianjin University

detail.title: Bidding Strategy for Building Load Aggregators Participating in Real-Time Demand Response Markets Based on Kde-Vine Copula-Td3
detail.abstract: This paper proposes an innovative framework to enhance the participation of building load aggregators in real-time demand response (DR) electricity markets through optimized bidding strategies. With the increasing integration of renewable energy sources introducing variability and uncertainty into power grids, buildings, as significant electricity consumers, offer substantial potential for DR by dynamically adjusting their consumption. We develop a comprehensive model for building loads, incorporating economic factors through detailed dispatch cost calculations and employing a Conditional Value at Risk (CVaR) based metric to manage uncertainties effectively. A novel training environment is constructed using Kernel Density Estimation (KDE) to fit marginal distributions of critical variables and Vine Copulas to capture their complex multivariate dependencies, providing a high-fidelity simulation of market dynamics. This environment trains a Twin Delayed Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (TD3) reinforcement learning agent to optimize quantity-price bidding decisions in continuous action spaces. The TD3 algorithm, with its twin critics and delayed policy updates, mitigates overestimation bias and ensures policy stability, outperforming traditional methods like the Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient (DDPG). Validation using ISO New England market data demonstrates that our approach significantly improves profitability and risk management for load aggregators, with the KDE-vine copula model offering superior accuracy over neural network-based alternatives and the TD3 agent achieving stable, high-reward outcomes.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种创新框架，通过优化竞价策略提升建筑负荷聚合商在实时需求响应电力市场中的参与度。结合经济因素和不确定性管理，采用CVaR指标和KDE-Vine Copula模型，训练TD3强化学习代理，显著提高了盈利能力和风险管理。
AI.research_question: 如何通过优化竞价策略提升建筑负荷聚合商在实时需求响应电力市场中的参与度和盈利能力？
AI.motivation: 随着可再生能源的并网增加了电网的波动性和不确定性，建筑作为主要电力消费者，通过动态调整用电量具有巨大的需求响应潜力。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于CVaR的风险管理理论、KDE-Vine Copula模型和TD3强化学习算法。
AI.method: 开发建筑负荷综合模型，结合经济因素和CVaR指标，构建KDE-Vine Copula训练环境，训练TD3代理优化竞价策略。
AI.findings: 验证显示，该方法显著提高了盈利能力和风险管理，KDE-Vine Copula模型优于神经网络方法，TD3代理表现稳定且高效。

detail.abstract:
Spanish Abstract: Los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible (ODS) fueron aceptados por los sectores públicos y privados de los países de la ONU incorporándolos en sus políticas sociales y estrategias de RSC. En 2020, la OMS lanzaba el Decenio del Envejecimiento Saludable, llamando la atención sobre el edadismo, discriminación por edad, sobre el grupo de los adultos mayores, grupo inexistente en los ODS, que se centra en niños y/o adultos. Esta investigación observa si esa inclusión de los mayores en las políticas de RSC en las entidades analizadas es real o, simplemente, se incorporan datos o informes sin añadir estrategias de inclusión. Por un lado, las empresas del Ibex y, en contraposición, una universidad pública (Vigo). El análisis de contenido de las webs nos muestra una escasa presencia del edadismo en general, y de la discriminación de mayores en particular, por detrás de temáticas como medioambiente, mujer o infancia. Sin embargo, la Universidad de Vigo, con la creación de la Cátedra de Edadismo con entidades como Atendo y AFAGA, única en Europa, inicia una estrategia que le otorga visibilidad y un nuevo camino dentro de su Responsabilidad Social, donde no aparece dicha temática.

English Abstract: The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) were accepted by the public and private sectors of the UN countries, which included them into their social policies and CSR strategies.  In 2020, the WHO launched the Decade of Healthy Aging, calling attention to ageism and age discrimination against the group of older adults, a group that does not exist in the SDGs, which focuses on children and/or adults. This research observes whether this inclusion of the elderly in the CSR policies of the entities analyzed is real or whether data or reports are simply incorporated without adding inclusion strategies. It compares, on the one hand, Ibex companies and, in contrast, a public university (Vigo). The content analysis of the websites shows a scarce presence of ageism in general, and discrimination of the elderly in particular, which are less relevant than topics such as the environment, women, or children. However, the University of Vigo, through the creation of the Chair of Ageism together with entities such as Atendo and AFAGA, in a unique initiative in Europe, initiates a strategy that gives it visibility and a new path within its Social Responsibility program, where this topic did not appear)

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了联合国可持续发展目标（SDGs）中老年群体被忽视的问题，分析了西班牙Ibex企业和维戈大学在CSR政策中对老年歧视（年龄歧视）的实际关注程度。研究发现，老年歧视问题在CSR政策中普遍被忽视，但维戈大学通过设立欧洲唯一的老年歧视研究机构，展现了独特的策略。

AI.theoretical_framework: 可持续发展目标（SDGs）、企业社会责任（CSR）、老年歧视（年龄歧视）。
AI.method: 内容分析法，比较Ibex企业和维戈大学的CSR政策及网站内容。

AI.theory_contributions: 填补了SDGs中老年群体研究的空白，扩展了CSR理论中对老年歧视的关注。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业和机构提供了关注老年歧视的实践案例，尤其是维戈大学的创新策略。

title: Healthcare Procurement and Firm Innovation: Evidence from Ai-Powered Equipment
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Université Côte d’Azur and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Healthcare Procurement and Firm Innovation: Evidence from Ai-Powered Equipment
detail.abstract: This paper explores whether technological learning between hospitals and supplier firms is associated with suppliers’ innovative performance. Our empirical analysis relies on a dataset combining unprecedented granular data on procurement bids and equipment with patent data measuring suppliers’ innovative performance. We identify the firm’s innovative activity relevant to the bid by using an advanced neural network algorithm for text analysis. This procedure allows us to match in an original way firm’s equipment descriptions with relevant patent documents. We then employ a difference-in-differences approach alongside a regression discontinuity design to estimate the causal effect of becoming a supplier on firms’ patents in the relevant IPC classes. Our results show that firms becoming hospital suppliers have a significantly higher propensity to innovate. About the mechanism, we show that supplying AI-powered equipment further boosts the suppliers’ innovative performance. Our results raise important policy implications in terms of the conduct and design of procurement bids in healthcare and in the precision medicine domain.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨医院与供应商企业之间的技术学习是否与供应商的创新绩效相关，通过结合采购投标数据与专利数据，利用神经网络算法分析文本，发现成为医院供应商的企业创新倾向显著更高，尤其是提供AI设备的供应商。
AI.research_question: 医院与供应商企业之间的技术学习是否与供应商的创新绩效相关？

AI.method: 结合采购投标数据与专利数据，使用神经网络算法进行文本分析，采用双重差分法和断点回归设计估计因果效应。
AI.findings: 成为医院供应商的企业创新倾向显著更高，尤其是提供AI设备的供应商。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了技术学习对创新绩效的促进作用，丰富了技术学习理论的应用场景。
AI.practical_contributions: 为医疗采购政策设计提供了实证依据，特别是在精准医疗领域的采购投标中。

title: When is Less More? Bank Arrangements for Liquidity vs Central Bank Support
affiliations: New York University (NYU) - New York University, University of Chicago - Booth School of Business and New York University (NYU)

detail.title: When is Less More? Bank Arrangements for Liquidity vs Central Bank Support

publicationDetails.detailsText: University of Chicago, Becker Friedman Institute for Economics Working Paper No. 2025-97
publicationDetails.journalName: Becker Friedman Institute for Economics Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: Theory suggests that in the face of fire-sale externalities, banks have incentives to overinvest in order to issue excessive money-like deposit liabilities. The existence of a private market for insurance such as contingent capital can eliminate the overinvestment incentives, leading to efficient outcomes. However, it does not eliminate fire sales. A central bank that can infuse liquidity cheaply may be motivated to intervene in the face of fire sales. If so, it can crowd out the private market and, if liquidity intervention is not priced at higher-than-breakeven rates, induce overinvestment. We examine various forms of public intervention to identify the least distortionary ones. Our analysis helps understand the historical prevalence of private insurance in the era preceding central banks and deposit insurance, their subsequent disappearance, as well as the continuing incidence of banking crises and speculative excesses. * We are grateful to Agustin Carstens, Anastasios Dosis, Kristin Forbes (discussant), Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas (discussant)

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了银行在面临抛售外部性时的过度投资动机，以及私人保险市场（如或有资本）如何消除这种动机。同时，分析了央行流动性干预对私人市场的挤出效应及其可能导致的过度投资问题。
AI.research_question: 在抛售外部性存在的情况下，如何设计公共干预形式以最小化扭曲效应？
AI.motivation: 理解银行过度投资动机的成因及其与私人保险市场和央行干预的关系，以解释历史上私人保险的盛行及其消失，以及银行危机的持续发生。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于抛售外部性和银行过度投资动机的理论，探讨私人保险市场和央行干预的作用。
AI.method: 理论分析，探讨不同形式的公共干预及其效果。
AI.findings: 私人保险市场可以消除过度投资动机，但无法消除抛售；央行干预可能挤出私人市场并导致过度投资。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了私人保险市场和央行干预对银行行为的影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了设计最小化扭曲的公共干预形式的理论依据。

title: [Discussion Paper]Considerations on Cross-Shareholding in the Modern Era: Focusing on the Correction of  Shareholder Capitalism
affiliations: The Chinese University of Hong Kong and Keio University - Graduate School of System Design and Management

detail.title: [Discussion Paper]Considerations on Cross-Shareholding in the Modern Era: Focusing on the Correction of  Shareholder Capitalism

declarations.funderStatement: Grant-in-Aid was provided by Keio University Academic Development Fund (H08JAK2439) in the year 2024.

detail.abstract:
The form of corporate governance can vary depending on the ideals, ideas, and values that underlie the vision for the kind of society we aim to build. Japan has designed its Corporate Governance Code based on the premise that the Anglo-American governance system, which prioritizes capital markets and shareholder interests above all else, is the global standard. However, if we aim for a corporate governance system that emphasizes the social responsibility of companies, cross-shareholding is not necessarily a flaw in corporate governance. Rather, it can function as a mechanism to protect Japan's national interests.

This paper first traces the evolution of cross-shareholding since the 1950s and confirms through literature review that the existence of stable shareholders through cross-shareholding contributed to long-term management, provided a stable environment for research and development for manufacturing companies, mitigated pressure from short-term shareholders, and contributed to management that took into account stakeholders other than shareholders, such as employees. Next, we showed that although “multi-stakeholder focus” is now a fundamental principle, individual institutional designs incorporate systems that are compatible with maximizing shareholder value in financial capital markets, and that reforms based on soft law that prioritize capital markets have taken precedence over revisions to hard law such as the Companies Act, resulting in a system design and management that favors investors.

Even today, the role of cross-shareholding in embodying the strengths of Japanese-style management remains unchanged. Rather, in the current stage where global capital flows and shareholder activism are becoming increasingly active, the paper highlights the need to recognize the necessity of a “modern version of cross-shareholding” and suggests the need to reconsider the flexible utilization of cross-shareholding while appropriately and timely implementing reforms in both soft law and hard law.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了日本交叉持股在公司治理中的作用，认为其并非缺陷而是保护国家利益的机制，并建议在现代背景下重新审视其灵活运用。
AI.research_question: 交叉持股在日本公司治理中的作用及其在现代背景下的必要性是什么？
AI.motivation: 日本公司治理以英美体系为全球标准，但若强调企业社会责任，交叉持股可能是一种保护国家利益的机制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于公司治理理论，探讨交叉持股对长期管理、研发稳定性和多利益相关者管理的影响。
AI.method: 文献综述和历史演变分析，结合软法与硬法改革的对比。
AI.findings: 交叉持股促进了长期管理、研发稳定性和多利益相关者管理，但当前治理体系更倾向于投资者利益。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了交叉持股在现代公司治理中的理论价值，强调其作为保护国家利益的机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议在软法与硬法改革中灵活运用交叉持股，以平衡资本市场需求与企业社会责任。

title: Global-Local Skeleton Constraint-Based Bim-Gis Integration Modeling Method for Railway Infrastructure
affiliations: Southwest Jiaotong University, Southwest Jiaotong University, Southwest Jiaotong University, Southwest Jiaotong University, Southwest Jiaotong University, Southwest Jiaotong University and Chengdu Normal University

detail.title: Global-Local Skeleton Constraint-Based Bim-Gis Integration Modeling Method for Railway Infrastructure
detail.abstract: As digital twin technology is increasingly integrated into intelligent operation and maintenance (O&M) for railways, achieving the efficient integration, automated deployment, and dynamic updating of BIM and GIS models has become a key challenge in railway infrastructure automation construction. Existing BIM-GIS integration methods face challenges such as low automation, inadequate spatial matching accuracy, and poor model loading efficiency. This study proposes a BIM-GIS integration modeling method based on global-local skeleton constraints. This method defines and extracts a global-local skeleton model as a geometric spatial constraint, automating BIM component layout and assembly. Simultaneously, an intelligent deployment mechanism is established to enable the automated invocation and efficient deployment of components. Verification with real-world railway infrastructure confirms that the method enhances the automation, spatial accuracy, and efficiency of BIM-GIS integration, providing strong technical support for infrastructure construction automation.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于全局-局部骨架约束的BIM-GIS集成建模方法，解决了铁路智能运维中BIM与GIS模型集成、自动化部署和动态更新的关键挑战。
AI.research_question: 如何实现BIM与GIS模型的高效集成、自动化部署和动态更新，以支持铁路基础设施的自动化建设？
AI.motivation: 现有BIM-GIS集成方法存在自动化程度低、空间匹配精度不足和模型加载效率差等问题，亟需改进。
AI.theoretical_framework: 全局-局部骨架约束理论，用于几何空间约束和BIM组件的自动化布局与装配。
AI.method: 提出了一种基于全局-局部骨架约束的BIM-GIS集成建模方法，并建立了智能部署机制。
AI.findings: 验证表明，该方法提高了BIM-GIS集成的自动化程度、空间精度和效率。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了全局-局部骨架约束理论，为BIM-GIS集成提供了新的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为铁路基础设施建设的自动化提供了技术支持，提升了运维效率。

title: Floodtransformer: Efficient Real-Time High-Resolution Flood Forecasting
affiliations: University of Technology Sydney (UTS), affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Adelaide, affiliation not provided to SSRN and University of Technology Sydney (UTS)

detail.title: Floodtransformer: Efficient Real-Time High-Resolution Flood Forecasting
detail.abstract: Flood forecasting is a critical component of disaster planning and risk management, requiring systems that are both scientifically rigorous and operationally efficient. Conventional hydrodynamic-based approaches are limited by their slow response time and are often computationally costly to achieve large-scale, high-resolution predictions. In this study, we present a hybrid framework that incorporates the traditional hydrodynamic models with an innovative, efficient FloodTransformer framework, enabling accurate, real-time, and high-resolution flood forecasting. We first schematise a 3Di hydrodynamic model based on the region’s geographical characteristics, rigorously validating and calibrating it against real-world observations. Using this model, hundreds of simulations representing a wide range of rainfall patterns, initial water depths, and boundary conditions are then generated and used to train the AI model. To address the computational limitations preventing the adoption of advanced AI techniques for large-scale, fine-grained rasterised spatiotemporal analysis, our FloodTransformer introduces: (1) novel size embeddings to directly encode variable-sized grid cells, and (2) tokenised time-sequence encodings that capture multi-modal temporal dependencies without significant computational overhead. This temporal tokenisation mechanism also ensures efficient sequential predictions in a single run, minimising error accumulation in iterative prediction approaches. Furthermore, our physics-informed multi-task optimisation further enhances water depth prediction accuracy through integrated regularisation. Extensive experiments on both simulated datasets and real-world historical flood events are conducted using widely adopted hydrographic evaluation metrics. The results demonstrate FloodTransformer as an innovative solution for managing flash flooding risks with both high accuracy and computational efficiency.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种结合传统水动力模型与创新FloodTransformer框架的混合方法，实现了高精度、实时、高分辨率的洪水预测。通过引入新型大小嵌入和时间序列编码，解决了大规模精细时空分析的AI技术应用限制。
AI.research_question: 如何结合传统水动力模型与AI技术，实现高效、高精度的实时洪水预测？
AI.motivation: 传统水动力模型响应慢且计算成本高，难以满足大规模高分辨率预测需求，亟需创新解决方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合水动力模型与AI技术（FloodTransformer），引入大小嵌入和时间序列编码。
AI.method: 1. 基于地理特征构建3Di水动力模型；2. 生成多样化模拟数据训练AI模型；3. 引入大小嵌入和时间序列编码优化计算效率。
AI.findings: FloodTransformer在模拟和真实洪水事件中表现出高精度和计算效率。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合物理模型与AI的创新框架，解决了时空分析的AI应用限制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为洪水灾害管理提供了高效、实时的预测工具，提升了风险应对能力。

title: Cognitive Castes: Artificial Intelligence, Epistemic Stratification, and the Dissolution of Democratic Discourse
affiliations: University of Exeter

detail.title: Cognitive Castes: Artificial Intelligence, Epistemic Stratification, and the Dissolution of Democratic Discourse
detail.abstract: Artificial intelligence functions not as an epistemic leveller, but as an accelerant of cognitive stratification, entrenching and formalising informational castes within liberal-democratic societies. Synthesising formal epistemology, political theory, algorithmic architecture, and economic incentive structures, the argument traces how contemporary AI systems selectively amplify the reasoning capacity of individuals equipped with recursive abstraction, symbolic logic, and adversarial interrogation-whilst simultaneously pacifying the cognitively untrained through engagement-optimised interfaces. Fluency replaces rigour, immediacy displaces reflection, and procedural reasoning is eclipsed by reactive suggestion. The result is a technocratic realignment of power: no longer grounded in material capital alone, but in the capacity to navigate, deconstruct, and manipulate systems of epistemic production. Information ceases to be a commons; it becomes the substrate through which consent is manufactured and autonomy subdued. Deliberative democracy collapses not through censorship, but through the erosion of interpretive agency. The proposed response is not technocratic regulation, nor universal access, but the reconstruction of rational autonomy as a civic mandate-codified in education, protected by epistemic rights, and structurally embedded within open cognitive infrastructure.

AI.tldr: 人工智能并非认知平等的工具，而是加速认知分层的催化剂，固化自由主义民主社会中的信息等级。论文结合形式认识论、政治理论、算法架构和经济激励结构，分析AI如何选择性增强具备递归抽象、符号逻辑和对抗性审问能力者的推理能力，同时通过优化互动界面安抚认知未受训练者。流畅性取代严谨性，即时性取代反思，程序性推理被反应性建议取代。结果是权力的技术性重构：不再仅基于物质资本，而是基于操纵认知生产系统的能力。信息不再是公共资源，而是制造同意和压制自主性的工具。审议民主的崩溃非因审查，而是解释能力的侵蚀。解决方案不是技术监管或普遍访问，而是将理性自主重建为公民义务，通过教育、认知权利和开放认知基础设施实现。
AI.research_question: 当代人工智能系统如何通过认知分层影响自由主义民主社会中的权力分配和信息获取？
AI.motivation: 探讨AI技术如何加剧认知不平等，威胁民主社会的审议能力和公民自主性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 形式认识论、政治理论、算法架构、经济激励结构。
AI.method: 理论分析，结合多学科视角（认识论、政治学、计算机科学、经济学）。
AI.findings: AI系统选择性增强部分人的认知能力，同时弱化其他人的解释能力，导致权力向技术精英转移，信息成为控制工具。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出AI作为认知分层加速器的理论框架，揭示其对民主社会的潜在威胁。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议通过教育改革、认知权利保护和开放基础设施重建公民理性自主，对抗AI驱动的认知不平等。

title: Fuzzy-Based Risk Assessment for Uav Deforestation Monitoring Under Adverse Weather
affiliations: University of Tsukuba and University of Tsukuba

detail.title: Fuzzy-Based Risk Assessment for Uav Deforestation Monitoring Under Adverse Weather
detail.abstract: Deforestation monitoring is a crucial activity to protect natural forests, conserve ecological biodiversity, and mitigate Earth’s climate change. Recently, uncrewed aerial vehicles (UAVs) have greatly enhanced deforestation monitoring by enabling high-resolution and real-time detection of illegal activities and forest fires. However, effective UAV operations are significantly hindered by adverse weather conditions such as heavy rainfall, strong winds, dense fog, and extreme heat. In order to assess external environmental risks of UAV-based monitoring and explore effective risk mitigations, this paper presents a novel risk analysis methodology. We propose Risk-Driven Failure Mode Effect Analysis (RD-FMEA) that extends the conventional FMEA by incorporating risk factors affecting the failure modes of system components. RD-FMEA introduces fuzzy logic to assign the risk scores to individual failure modes associated with the identified risk factors. We apply RD-FMEA to a UAV-based deforestation monitoring system considering the risk of adverse weather conditions. The risk analysis results suggest that heavy rainfall poses the most significant risk that can involve many failure modes. We further investigate four different mitigation approaches against adverse weather conditions and evaluate their effectiveness. Through the comparative analysis of RD-FMEA results, we find that the introduction of an intelligent water drops algorithm can significantly reduce the risk scores, by helping UAVs’ route planning to avoid heavy rainfalls. Moreover, we show that the risk scores can be further reduced by adding rules to abort missions by predefined time threshold to avoid unsafe continuous UAV operations in adverse weather conditions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为RD-FMEA的新型风险分析方法，用于评估无人机在恶劣天气条件下进行森林砍伐监测时的外部环境风险，并通过模糊逻辑和智能水滴算法提出有效的风险缓解措施。
AI.research_question: 如何评估和缓解无人机在恶劣天气条件下进行森林砍伐监测时的外部环境风险？
AI.motivation: 无人机在森林砍伐监测中具有重要作用，但恶劣天气条件会显著阻碍其有效运行，因此需要一种系统的方法来评估和缓解这些风险。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于传统的失效模式与影响分析（FMEA），扩展为风险驱动的失效模式与影响分析（RD-FMEA），并引入模糊逻辑来量化风险。
AI.method: 提出RD-FMEA方法，结合模糊逻辑对风险因素进行评分，并应用于无人机森林监测系统，评估四种缓解措施的有效性。

title: Exploring Connections between Climate Action and Regional Development in the East African Community
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine

detail.title: Exploring Connections between Climate Action and Regional Development in the East African Community
detail.abstract: There is a need to bridge policy and implementation gaps between national adaptation plans, nationally determined contributions, and sustainable development. In East Africa, rapid population growth and climate change impacts intensify demands for water, energy, and food (WEF), fuelling resource exploitation. Sustainable development plans aim to meet resource demands while building resilience, necessitating a multi-sectoral approach. This study employs a mixed-qualitative methodology to explore the interlinkages between nationally determined contributions, national adaptation plans and regional development in East Africa. Results show implied connections between policy instruments, sustainable development, and climate action form the crux of WEF interlinkages. WEF resource insecurity is worsened by incoherent national development plans, which create competition for shared resources and tradeoffs instead of fostering collaboration. For example, the focus on food security, mostly through extensification, has created tradeoffs with water and energy security, undermining development goals. Understanding the interconnectedness and interdependencies between sector policies, climate actions, and supranational development plans could catalyse and accelerate Sustainable Development Goals 1, 2, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 13 and goals related to the Paris Agreement. There are implicit interlinkages and, to a certain extent, in practice. Although insufficient, these are foundations for a bottom-up approach to implementing integrated climate action commitments. The WEF nexus approach provides an opportunity to break policy and action siloes in East Africa. Ultimately, a transdisciplinary approach focused on equity, social justice, sustainability, and a just transition is required to support development agendas.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了东非国家在适应计划、国家自主贡献与可持续发展之间的政策与实施差距，提出多部门联动方法以解决水、能源和食物（WEF）资源安全问题。

AI.method: 混合定性研究方法。

AI.practical_contributions: 提出了WEF关系方法，为东非地区打破政策孤岛、实现综合气候行动提供了实践路径。

title: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar and Social Justice
affiliations: Srinivas University

detail.title: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar and Social Justice
detail.abstract: Dr. B.R. Ambedkar, the principal architect of the Indian Constitution, was a visionary reformer and relentless advocate for social justice. Born into a Dalit community, Ambedkar's personal experiences with caste discrimination shaped his lifelong mission to dismantle social hierarchies and promote equality. Through his academic excellence, legal expertise, and political activism, he championed the rights of the marginalized, particularly the Scheduled Castes and Tribes. His concept of social justice extended beyond legal equality to encompass economic empowerment, gender justice, and the annihilation of caste. As a constitutionalist, he ensured that democratic principles and human rights were embedded in the Indian legal framework. His conversion to Buddhism represented a spiritual and social revolution, providing dignity and identity to millions. This study examines Ambedkar's life, ideology, and lasting impact on India's pursuit of an inclusive and equitable society.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了印度宪法主要起草人B.R. 安贝德卡博士的生平、思想及其对印度社会追求包容与平等的持久影响。
AI.research_question: 安贝德卡博士如何通过其思想与行动推动印度的社会正义与平等？
AI.motivation: 安贝德卡博士作为一位出身达利特社区的社会改革者，其个人经历与学术成就为研究社会正义与平等提供了独特视角。

AI.method: 通过文献分析，研究安贝德卡的著作、演讲及宪法贡献。
AI.findings: 安贝德卡通过宪法设计、社会运动及改信佛教，为印度社会奠定了民主与人权的基础。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了社会正义理论，强调法律与经济的双重平等。
AI.practical_contributions: 为印度宪法注入民主原则，推动社会改革与边缘群体赋权。

title: Fuzzy-Based Risk Assessment for Uav Deforestation Monitoring Under Adverse Weather
affiliations: University of Tsukuba and University of Tsukuba

detail.title: Fuzzy-Based Risk Assessment for Uav Deforestation Monitoring Under Adverse Weather
detail.abstract: Deforestation monitoring is a crucial activity to protect natural forests, conserve ecological biodiversity, and mitigate Earth’s climate change. Recently, uncrewed aerial vehicles (UAVs) have greatly enhanced deforestation monitoring by enabling high-resolution and real-time detection of illegal activities and forest fires. However, effective UAV operations are significantly hindered by adverse weather conditions such as heavy rainfall, strong winds, dense fog, and extreme heat. In order to assess external environmental risks of UAV-based monitoring and explore effective risk mitigations, this paper presents a novel risk analysis methodology. We propose Risk-Driven Failure Mode Effect Analysis (RD-FMEA) that extends the conventional FMEA by incorporating risk factors affecting the failure modes of system components. RD-FMEA introduces fuzzy logic to assign the risk scores to individual failure modes associated with the identified risk factors. We apply RD-FMEA to a UAV-based deforestation monitoring system considering the risk of adverse weather conditions. The risk analysis results suggest that heavy rainfall poses the most significant risk that can involve many failure modes. We further investigate four different mitigation approaches against adverse weather conditions and evaluate their effectiveness. Through the comparative analysis of RD-FMEA results, we find that the introduction of an intelligent water drops algorithm can significantly reduce the risk scores, by helping UAVs’ route planning to avoid heavy rainfalls. Moreover, we show that the risk scores can be further reduced by adding rules to abort missions by predefined time threshold to avoid unsafe continuous UAV operations in adverse weather conditions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为RD-FMEA的新型风险分析方法，用于评估无人机在恶劣天气条件下进行森林砍伐监测的外部环境风险，并通过模糊逻辑为风险因素分配风险评分。研究发现暴雨是最显著的风险，并提出智能水滴算法和任务中止规则作为有效的风险缓解措施。

AI.theoretical_framework: 本文扩展了传统的失效模式与影响分析（FMEA），提出了风险驱动的失效模式与影响分析（RD-FMEA），并结合模糊逻辑为风险因素分配评分。
AI.method: 采用RD-FMEA方法，结合模糊逻辑对无人机系统在恶劣天气条件下的失效模式进行风险评分，并评估四种缓解措施的有效性。
